rina is a very nice host. the house is great, close to the shops in piha. the kitchen is very big and well equipped: i had a very good time there and rina always checked whether everything is alright or if we were needing something .

This is a great place to stay! Starting with Rina and her helpful, relaxed and kind ways. The house is perfectly located half way between Hana and Haleakala. It is a 15 minutes drive from the airport, less than 10 minutes walk to Paia-Center with all its shops, restaurants and galleries. Beaches are also nearby. 
You can keep yourself for yourself or meet other guests from all over the world in the full equiped, handy kitchen or in the spacious TV-room. My room was comfortably large and very clean. Wifi worked well. I was provided with a parkingspace on the property. 
I can`t wait to come back again.

I exteneded my stay on Maui for a few days and wanted a simple, clean, comfortable place to stay in Paia and Mike's House suited my needs very well. Rina is very nice; very kind and helpful. I was able to leave my stuff in room on last day and picked it up early evening before catching flight home. Hana room is clean and comfortable with closed-in porch area with nice view of beach and mountains. Secure locks on doors with personalized codes. Well equipped, shared kitchen and living room. Opportunities to meet other nice travellers. Location is central and active with traffic on Baldwin Ave, roosters crowing and neighbours watching TV at night. Felt like every day, Hawaiian life and a nice way to end my visit.

We had a great stay at the Hina Room. It's very very clean and comfortable. You meet other people in the kitchen and can have a small talk. Rina is a lovely host who really care about her guests. Especially the very useful things like beachtowels and beachchairs makes it diffrent to other rooms. Highly recommend this place

The Hina Room was comfortable, spacious, and had a great breeze. The in-room bathroom is sufficient, but there is limited privacy because there is no door. I appreciated the vanity in the room. 

The shared areas where clean and in good shape. The kitchen was well stocked with supplies.

The host took care to provide the kinds of things you might want on your trip, but not might not have packed -- hair dryer, iron, beach chairs, towels, cooler, etc. That was very thoughtful and I appreciated that touch.

It was awesome, Rina and all the other people where stayed there were so friendly that we felt like it is our home.
Comfortable flat, gives you all you need for a pleasant stay during your holiday on maui.

Mahalo Rina

Rina was a delightful host and gave us all the information we needed. The kitchen was well supplied with cooking oil and condiments available. We enjoyed being within walking distance of the funky little shops of Paia which had good coffee and good restaurants. The house is also only 7 mile from the airport which helped with our early morning flight. The house was quite hot during the day but cooled quickly at night. Baldwin road traffic noise can be heard from the room but is less frequent during the night.

Rina was a fantastic host and was super accommodating! Her place is perfectly situated just down the street from town. Her place is a 5 min walk to the grocery store and the rest of all of the nice little shops and restaurants and 2 mins past there is a beautiful beach :)
We loved our private room and we felt secure and cozy in our nook :) and the kitchen is awesome! We definitely recommend putting your hat up at Rina's place if you're looking for the sweet spot in Paia ;)
Cheers!

We stayed one night in this room and it was everything we needed. Just a few blocks from great coffee and restaurants, and a clean comfortable room. Rina was very friendly and helpful. 

We appreciated having our own bathroom in the room, though it doesn't have a door. Overall we had a great stay in Paia and would recommend Rina's place!

Rina was an amazing hostess, sweet and extremely accommodating. We stayed here with our 7 month old and it was the perfect location in the beautiful town of Paia which was just a walk away. We stocked up on groceries at Mana foods which is a local version of Whole Goods - great selection. Great restaurants just a walk away. Nothing but good things to say about our 3 night stay here! Thanks Rina for all your insight and tips to make our stay so memorable!!

I had a great stay in Paia at Hoku's bed and breakfast. This location is wonderful because it's central to the Road to Hana, Mt Haleakela, and beaches on the West and Southern shores. Not to mention that the town of Paia has a very old school vibe that was fun to hang out in and be away from the touristy resort scene. Our stay with Hoku was convenient and our needs were immediately addressed. I would stay again when I come back to Maui. Mahalo!
Hoku was very informative and responsive with our communication. The room was just as we expected, nice, clean, and located a few steps from the town. Great place!
We have had a enjoyable time staying Hoku's house. The room was bright, clean and comfortable. The location is the best one in Maui. It is very convenient to main visiting points and shopping mall.
Lady who welcomed us was super nice -- room was clean, and other guests were quiet and respectful :)

name: Park Guell apartment with terrace
summary: Apartment with terrace in a quiet street of Barcelona, 5 minutes walk from Park Güell and 20 minutes by public transport to the city center. Renovated and fully equipped. HUTB-000929

host.about:
Hola, 

Somos Alexandra y Juan dos amigos que estamos enamorados de Barcelona, nuestras pasiones son viajar y conocer gente por lo que nos encantaría compartir con vosotros nuestros espacios  para que disfrutéis a vuestro gusto de toda la cultura, actualidad y diversidad de ofertas que la ciudad os ofrece.
Para nosotros lo mas importante es que nuestros huéspedes puedan aprovechar al máximo su estancia en Barcelona,  que viváis vuestra historia  reflejada en  rincones únicos de la ciudad y por supuesto nuestra mayor satisfacción es que os sintáis como en casa según lo que busquéis.

Hello, 

We are Alexandra and Juan two friends who are in love with Barcelona, our passion is to travel and meet new people so we would love to share our spaces with you and that you can enjoy the culture, the present and the diversity of offers that the city has to offer. 
For us the most important thing is that our guests can make the most of their stay in Barcelona, that you live our history full of unique places and of course our greatest satisfaction is that you feel as if you where at home according to what you are looking for.

reviews.txt:
The apartment is in a nice spot high up in the town with a great view (from til street). 
It is a 15-20 minutte uphill walk from the nearests Metro - but the area is quiet.
The outside terasse is wounderful - we enjoyed to have breakfast here. There is a nice little shop just next door.
The apartment and the bed clothes+towels was clean - so even it is a full time/only guest apartment we can recommend it.

La casa esta muy bien equipada y es realmente muy linda (solo funciona muy mal la conectividad de wife) y queda un poco alejada de los centros turísticos.  El único inconveniente fue que nuestro vuelo se demoro dos horas y al llegar 2 horas mas tarde del horario acordado, pasada las 20.00 se nos cobro 30 euro en el chec kin

Our host's friend was outside the property when we arrived, which was a bonus as travelled with our two children. We were shown around the apartment, and shown all guides personally put together by Regina. The apartment was as pictured and the children loved the apartment, we were within 5 mins walk from a local supermarket be warned parents there are a few steep hills slightly difficult with the stroller buggy but a good workout all the same. We were 10-12 mins walk from the subway Alfonso X only 4 stops from the Ramblas which was "thumbs up".

We loved our stay our two children were very comfortable in the apartment and loved the patio, there were ample playgrounds in close proximity. The neighbourhood was quiet and locals were very helpful.

SUCIO Y MUY POCO RECOMENDABLE.
Bajo con difícil accesibilidad, absoluta falta de limpieza y con fuerte olor a humedad provocada por guardar las sábanas mojadas dentro del único armario de la casa, recubierto de moho por dentro. Falta de limpieza absoluta en toda la casa que hacía muy incómoda su estancia y más con niños pequeños. El sofá donde supuestamente se podía dormir, tenía una gran mancha que ni se habían molestado en intentar limpiarla. Solo había un único armario recubierto de moho para guardar la ropa, que evidentemente no pudimos utilizar. La ducha estaba negra, picada y oxidada, lo que nos tocó limpiar a nosotros y desinfectarla un poco para poderla utilizar. La cocina llena cubierta por una capa de grasa que la hacía inútil para cocinar cualquier cosa. Escaleras hacia abajo completamente empinadas y estrechas.  Nada más llegar ni rastro de Regina o Juan, nos atendió una persona que ni siquiera sabía hablar bien castellano, por lo que dudo mucho de la existencia de Juan y Regina. Es absolutamente indignante que cuando pagas el apartamento te cobran unos gastos de limpieza que no han efectuado. Para colmo nos cobraron 30 € en concepto de checking. La zona es tranquila aunque bastante alejada del metro, dado que tienes unas cuestas muy empinadas desde la parada más cernada de metro y luego toca subir cuesta arriba unos 15 minutos. De cara a los esfuerzos por parte del anfitrión, absolutamente ninguno. La persona que nos recibió ni siquiera sabía indicarnos donde estaba la tienda más cercana, un parking donde poder dejar el coche e incluso la parada de metro más cernada. Soy usuario de esta web desde hace tiempo, he visitado otros países de Europa usándola y ha sido con creces la peor experiencia que he tenido. Me siento completamente estafado.
Authentic experience of Barcelona neighbourhood life. Friendly locals, a number of convenience and fruit/veg stores, and an incredible city view from atop the hill.
The neighbourhood was very timid and relaxing, a good contrast with the city centre and the beaches, so it provided a great haven for relaxation.

L'appartement est sympa et bien équipé, dans un quartier charmant. Il correspond assez bien à l'annonce Airbnb. Il a malheureusement une odeur d'humidité constante et il est tout de même un peu loin du métro ainsi que du parking public. L'hôte nous a donné beaucoup d'informations avant notre arrivée mais nous l'avons pas vu du tout pendant le séjour. J'ai également fait une demande de modification pour la quelle je n'ai jamais reçu un retour. Dans l'ensemble c'était une bonne expérience.

This apartment is perfect for a large family. The rooms are large, clean and cool. The kitchen is basic but serviceable and the outside space is lovely. Maks let us in and showed us around and he was quick to respond to questions throughout the stay.

L'appartement est conforme aux descriptions. C'est sympa on s'y sent presque chez soi. Une légère odeur d'humidité qui est un peu désagréable. Cependant avec les fenêtres grandes ouvertes l'odeur s'en va rapidement.

Au départ le concierge était sensé nous recevoir. Une fois arrivées, ni l'hôte, ni le concierge n'ont répondu à nos appels. Heureusement une jeune fille attendait devant le logement qui nous a expliqué que c'était elle qui était sensée nous recevoir mais nous n'étions pas au courant.
Heureusement elle était très gentille, nous a très bien reçu et nous a expliqué le déroulement du séjour.
Une fois dans le logement nous nous sommes aperçus que celui-ci était très poussiéreux et nous avons donc dû faire le ménage car une des personnes était allergique aux acariens. Nous avons également dû acheter des produits pour faire le ménage, car les produits ménagers sur place étaient très limités.
Au niveau des équipements, beaucoup de choses étaient fournies (lave-vaisselle, lave-linge, fer à repasser, sèche cheveux, etc) mais la vaisselle était très limitée pour 3 personnes (manque de verres et de couverts).
Attention il n'y a pas de volets ni de rideaux opaques sur 2 chambres sur 3. Cependant draps de lit et serviettes de toilette sont fournies. Il manque cependant un tapis de douche pour la baignoire.
Les matelas étaient confortables et le quartier très calme mis à part un voisin qui mettait parfois de la musique à fond.
Au niveau de l'emplacement, le logement est très bien situé car à 10 minutes à pied d'une ligne de métro qui dessert tous les endroits importants de la ville (plage, centre ville, quartier gothique, etc).
Par contre, attention pour les personnes qui ont des difficultés à se déplacer car le logement est tout en haut d'une côte très raide.
Malgré tout, nous avons passé un agréable séjour dans ce logement et avons apprécié la terrasse ombragée.
Muy chulo el apartamento y muy limpio todo bien
Een heel mooi en groot appartement: ideaal om met kinderen naar toe te komen! Alles heel proper en verzorgd.

Das informations Material könnte mal wieder sortiert werden ,da alles mehrfach vorhanden ist und man somit nicht mehr weis was aktuell ist .Im hinteren Schlafzimmer neben dem Bad sollte ein blickdichter Vorhang angebracht werden ,da man vom Treppenhausflur Direkt reinschauen kann ,es ist nur ein dünner durchsichtiger Vorhang dran. Leider keine Kaffeemaschine in einer Größe für 6 Personen vorhanden und die andere hat keine Kanne, Auch fehlen Weingläser für mehr als eine Person. aber am schlimmsten war der Gestank ,Moderich ,muffelig kaum zum aushalten ,wir hatten schon überlegt abzubrechen fanden aber in der Größe keine für uns bezahlbare Unterkunft .zudem konnte eine Person von uns nicht mit da sie einen Unfall hatte und Frankreich nicht verlassen durfte aber es gab keine Reduktion ,sehr schade aber was will man erwarten wenn es kommerziell ist .

5 girls living in the apartment. It is a big place and the distance between the apartment and the city center is ok (you can walk, use metro and bus). When we arrived, all of us noticed a smell all over the apartment - like kind of moldy. This sadly affected our stay in the apartment. The bedding had the smell to, and this was bad! The sink was broken among other thinks. 
Otherwise a big apartment with a little outside teresse. 
- Camilla, Andrea, Cecilie, Kia and Heidi

Une expérience mitigée.
 il est vrai que la rue est calme et que l'on peut profiter de la jolie vue sur Barcelone mais il faudra pour cela monter des pentes raides pour atteindre l'appartement. De plus, dans l'immeuble l'escalier est très étroit et il n'y pas pas d'ascenseur. L'accès peut donc être difficile pour les familles avec enfants en bas age, les personnes agées et les personnes a mobilité reduites surtout qu' il est situé dans l'étages du bas de l'immeuble, sous le rez de chaussé. 
Les photos ne sont pas très fidèle a la réalité car l'apparetement manque de luminosité, effet, a part la terrasse, il y a un manque de fenêtres et aucunes de donne sur l’extérieur. La seule autre fenêtre présente dans une des chambres donne sur l'escalier de l'immeuble.  
Du fait de ce manque de fenêtre, l'appartement n'est pas très lumineux et sens le renfermé.
Il y a de plus une mauvaise insonorisation de l'appartement mais cela n'a pas été très gênant car l'immeuble était dans l'ensemble plutôt calme. 
Point positif : hôte sympathique et disponible, proximité du parc Guell et des transports en commun 
Etant donné le rapport qualité prix, je pense qu'il convient surtout a un groupe d'amis

Regina was communicative before we stayed in the apartment and although she couldn't meet us during our stay, had arranged for someone to do so with keys and information. It's a really nice apartment in a quiet neighbourhood.
The place is spacious located in a nice area of the city

My group of four friends and I had a great stay in Regina's Airbnb. The apartment looked just as it did in the listing and was very clean. Regina was easy to communicate with before our stay and she coordinated for her friend Maks to meet us when we arrived. There was plenty of room for the group of five one the apartment. We thoroughly enjoyed the outdoor terrace and spent our mornings out there to eat the breakfast we had prepared in the well equipped kitchen. We did, however, wish there had been some basic kitchen ingredients like salt, spices, or oil there for us to use. The location was a quick walk to Park Güell and it was nice being in a non touristy area. That did however, mean that it was not as easy to reach the city center.

Regina é stata sempre molto disponibile a soddisfare le nostre richieste e qualunque problema ci fosse é stata pronta a consigliarci nel migliore dei modi.
La descrizione dell'annuncio rispecchia verosimilmente l'appartamento che è in sé molto accogliente è provvisto di tutto cioè che serve.
Il quartiere é un po' lontano dal centro, ma percorrendo un tratto a piedi e poi con la metro basta poco per raggiungere il centro città; il servizio taxi é abbastanza economico e comodo da utilizzare dopo l'orario di chiusura della metro.
Detto ciò risulta ovvio che é stata una bellissima esperienza!

The communication with Regina was perfect. The flat is not really close to the city center, but with metro was it without problem and we had great opportunity to see the sun rise in park guel. I am sure, we would not have this experience without staying here. Thanks.

name: Lachine room+Free parking+Airport
summary: A nice room with King size bed in a new condo, free parking, near to Montreal International airport. By car 1m get into highway 20,13,easy go to Downtown,Dorval,St-Laurent,Laval, include breakfast GYM,  summer pool,BBQ; Dinner,car service possible.

host.about: A mother and son

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 4 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Bright room in Spacious house close to Airport
summary: My home is close to the Airport (5.2km - no Airport noise) and St George Hospital (2.5km), it is half a block from the beach, 15 min walk to the Novotel Hotel in  Brighton Le sands where you can also find an abundance of restaurants, cafes and shops. You’ll love my place because of the light, airy room in our spacious house and your own  bathroom. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers. We are on the 3rd floor with no lift.

host.about: Hi, I am from New Zealand, Steve is from Malta, Coby is our son. We love living here in Australia and the beach nearby is a big plus for us. Coby and I love travelling, I have been to over 50 countries and Coby to 7 (not bad for a 7 yr old!)  We love the Airbnb accomodation, doing little road trips within Australia and meeting people. Steve lives close by with his two sons and is looking forward to travelling more with us when they get older.

reviews.txt: Angela was very friendly and welcoming, I had a wonderful stay in her warm house, couldn't have asked for more. Thanks Angela

Angela's place was very close to the beach, and whisper quiet from road and airport noise.

Angela keeps a beautifully kept place. It is extremely well set up for guests and very comfortable.

Coby is a real sweetie, was well behaved, and good fun.

Thanks guys for being good hosts. I would love to come back.

Angela is a great and friendly host! Had a wonderful, comfortable stay at her place. Its very clean, bed is comfortable, and the room is spacious. The room is quite with fast internet access. Very powerful hot shower, good street parking. I would definitely stay here again and caanot recommend it enough! Thank you Angela!
Very happy with my stay. Very clean and quiet. Would recommend.
Angela's house was very good. The room is clean and nice better than the pictures. And angela and her son were very kind! Nearby here, there is the brighton le sands beach. That was great also.

Angela's apartment is a great place to stay, very close to the beach, super clean, with all the convenient appliances on cooking and cleaning. Angela has good tastes on apartment decoration, such as the sweet fragrant candles and the tiny lights spread on flowers and comfortable sofa.... Angela is also a very considerate host and would like share everything with me. It's so lucky of me to meet her  when I try airbnb for the first time. Thank you, Angela
Angela is very nice. The room is very clean and the bed is very soft. Thanks for ur warm welcome. Strong recommend. I had a very nice trip in Sydney.
房东非常热情,房间非常非常干净,舒服,离海边很近,非常好,Very gool.

Was awesome! Couldn't have asked fora better stay! The room was neat and tidy with everything you could want available!! Plenty of parking and the bus stop that takes you to Sydney center is right on the corner! Thoroughly enjoyed my stay!
Everything is fantastic, more than worth!
Great communication, great location, clean and very well laid out. Angela and Cody were great hosts.

Angela was very accommodating. Place was very clean exactly as shown in the pictures. Neighborhood is nice and near to some restaurants. She even had some listings of take-away menu on the table.

Will definitely recommend to my friends who will visit Sydney.

It was great to meet Angela and be welcomed into her lovely home.  While it's not close to the city center (about 45 mins away via public transit), it's definitely close to the Airport (15 mins away) and the beach (5-10 min walk).  Uber or taxi is definitely the best way to reach this place from the airport though public transit can be an option if you have a lot of time.

Bring your strong arms as you have to take your luggage up to the third floor as they don't have a lift.  But, once you reach to her unit, you'll be rewarded with a great retreat.  The house is very clean and the room was spacious.  There's a big window besides the bed that brings in lots of natural light and there's even a TV in the room! Angela wasn't home the evening we stayed so we weren't able to converse more.  But all in all, my family and I had a very comfortable and enjoyable stay.

I am grateful to Angela for her help- I was in a rush to find a place to stay, and I am glad I found her home. She very swiftly communicated with me in regards to how to reach her home. What's more, she has a lovely, tidy, and clean home. Thank you so much for accommodating me at basically a moment's notice! Her home is not too far from the airport, which is best reached by car (I used Uber).
Very nice, clean and confortable, Angela was very nice. I did like the place.

The place is clean and cosy, I liked the  neighborhood and the bed is comfortable. You will have everything you need. Angela is a a very good host, she received us on the night quite late and was always easy to communicate with her, responsive to all my questions and give us some options to go around. You will enjoy your stay.

It was a very good stay at Angela's place. Angela was responsive and very kind to guide me the way to get to location. Place is at a good peaceful location yet with some very good views across the road. Overall a good stay!
I really enjoyed my stay at Angela's. Would strongly recommend.
Fantastic place! Location is excellent, and Angela is a great hostess. I really enjoyed staying there and would recommend it to anyone.
Angela and Coby were very accommodating and friendly. Thanks again.

name: Deniz, orman ve şehir manzaralı.
summary: 70 M2, verandalı, bahçeli müstakil konut. 1 yatak odası+salon+mutfak+banyo+teras

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Ein wunderbar magischer Ort mit einer grandiosen Aussicht, sehr ruhig und erholsam auf einer tollen Insel. Celal ist ein wunderbarer Gastgeber, der sich rührend um unser Wohlbefinden gekümmert hat und uns seine Lieblingsorte und Einkaufsgelegenheiten nahebrachte. Der beste Ort, indem wir auf den Prinzeninseln bis jetzt sein konnten.

name: Amazing NEW Food Lover Balcony, close to FIRA, MWC
summary: Set in a prized area for tapas and vermouth, you'll get the best of Barcelona and sunset views in your very own Poble Sec pad. Enjoy the cool local vibe nestled below Montjuïc and fast transport connections to beach (10 mins) and airport (30 mins). Perfectly located, close to Mobile World Congress

host.about:
Hi,

We are a very small company that is using Airbnb to share our lovely apartments with travelers and adventurers heading to Barcelona. Our  company's journey began in 2013, when we carefully selected and purchased these apartments in barrio PobleSec. Each apartment has been renovated with our own hands, with careful attention to preserving some of the original features that make Barcelona architecture, and style famous. These apartments and the PobleSec barrio will make for a perfect base, for your own Barcelona adventure. 

Barcelona is a fantastic city with a dazzling combination of beach, culture, fascinating people, architecture, unique cuisine and artisans. This is a very rewarding place to live and an exciting city to visit. There is so much to see, taste and experience.  We are excited to host your stay in Barcelona, provide recommendations and help you to have the best experience this great city has to offer!


Safe travels :)

reviews.txt: Thank you very much, Jon, for your great job, warm welcome of my co-workers Amichai and Daniel! Your apartment is situated in a comfortable place, it took them not for a long time to get Fira Gran Via . I advise this apartment especially with such good owner to everybody!

We stayed here 9 nights in April. Oscar  (the host) was great. He helped us carry our luggage to the apartment  (4th floor) and gave us plenty of Tipps and suggestions what to do during our stay. The apartment itself was nice, clean and very new. Unfortunately the recent renovation caused some inconvenience. The hallways had a strong chemical smell due to the fresh paint. Also you could still hear some construction going 0 in other parts of the building. These initial problems are likely to be sorted out soon, but as of now i can only give it 4 star. Overall we had a great time in Barcelona.
We loved our stay at John and Oscars apartment. The apartment was very clean, modern and had a great location. We would stay again if returning to Barcelona.
Parfait. Bien situé, très propre, refait a neuf. Si je retourne à Barcelone je louerai à nouveau cet appartement!

Jon's apartment is situated in a location where attractions are at a walkable distance, and lots of eateries nearby. The place is bright and comfortable, and his recommendations are totally spot on! I also appreciate that he allowed us to check out at a later timing due to our late flight. I totally would recommend this apartment :)

First of all, we have to say that Jon is a very friendly host. We had a late check-in and he waited for our appearance late at night. He gave us a lot of interesting and worth seeing tips for locations, bars and restaurants to visit. We could change our check-out in the last day of our stay without problems. Jon arranged this in an uncomplicated manner.

The flat is very nice and functional furnished. All equipment is very new. The beds have comfortable mattresses in which we could sleep very well. In striking distance you will find bars and shops frequented by residents. Even the view from the small balcony over the roofs of Barcelona is a visit worth. A breath-taking view in Barcelona’s real life!

We recommend this apartment without retention and will rent it again for our next stay in this unique town. Thanks, Jon, for making our stay in Barcelona unforgettable!

Kindest regards from Switzerland
Ivan & Nadine

Nice apartment in good area, apartment is at the back of the block so no street noise and the balcony off the living gets sun late afternoon/early evening.
Easy check in and check out.

Nice place in The center of Barcelona. Mira mar is less than 3 mins walk and you can see the best view of The city.
Good flat and Jon is a fantastic person,
Thank you

Great communication from the start - and host made us feel very welcome on arrival. Local points of interest, restaurants and bars where all pointed out. The place was exactly as it appears in the listing - very clean and new fittings, which kept noise out too. Location is as good as expected. We had a great stay and the host was brilliant.

Great apartment, nice location (close to the old city but away from the busy streets!)  and most importantly great recommendations for very good places to eat (Jon provided a list of recommendations and we loved every single one we went to!). We had a great long weekend break!

We had a great time in Barcelona. The place is extremely nice and comfortable and Jon made us feel really welcome. He was always available when we had a problem (one morning we broke a plug and blew a fuse...). We can fully recommend staying there!
Ditte and Nathalie

The apartment is lovely and in a great location; it was easy to get to/from everywhere we wanted and close to some excellent pinchos bars. Jon's recommendations were spot on, especially for paella. He was such a great host and always got back to us straight away. Thanks Jon! We'd love to come back again.
We stay one week in this apartment and everything was exactely how you can see in the pictures. Nice location and nice furnitures. Jon is very kind and always available!
Clean and modern place. Easy communication. Convenient location. Recommended.

The flat is lovely - very clean, spacious and tastefully decorated. The location is convenient - within walking distance to a number of great restaurants and bars, and about a 15 minute walk from the airport shuttle bus. Jon and his niece Olivia were fantastic hosts, very welcoming and helpful, and Jon's recommendations for places to go in the area (particularly for paella, tapas and vermouth) were great. We had a lovely time staying in the flat, and would highly recommend to others looking to have a holiday in Barcelona. Thank you!

We had a fantastic stay at the apartment. Nice and simply renovated with everything you need to have a comfortable stay. Jon gave a great detailed map and restaurant suggestions, which was a big help. Highly recommend the "Pinchos" on Carrer de Blai (La Tasqueta de Blai) and also Agust which is on Carrer del Parlament, all in easy walking distance. Be aware there is no lift and 4 flights of stairs, but this didn't bother us as we needed the exercise

Olivia - Jon's niece - was there to welcome us as Jon was away and was very warm, friendly and helpful.  She even carried my case up 4 flights of stairs as I had a knee injury.  Lots of local information and maps were provided.   The flat was just like the photographs - bright , clean and comfortable. Although small, it was well designed and felt spacious. The air con worked efficiently - much appreciated in the hot weather. It is in a fantastic friendly neighbourhood with lots of restaurants and small supermarkets - the cafe across the street was great for brunch and dinner.  We were able to walk easily to main sights or take the nearby metro. Olivia also gave us good tips and was easy to contact. we would definitely recommend Kerrisdale holdings and would stay there again if visiting Barcelona.  The stairs can feel a bit  tough at the end of the day -  but we didn't mind the exercise.
Had all the necessities, plus great location and air conditioning!! Jon was great, giving us a rundown of information on the apartment and places to go in this amazing city!

Great location & to die for apartment, everything was spot on. Jon a friendly & welcoming host, balcony is great for sipping wine & enjoying the last tantalising rays of sunshine! You cannot help but relax here. 5 star, highly recommended, we'll be back soon!!!?!
We had a great stay here! The apartment was clean and Jon is a lovely host. You can walk to everything and the airport is only 15 minutes with the cab.

name: Stylish, spacious, central, shared rooftop terrace
summary: Stylish, spacious two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment, located in the central Eixample neighbourhood, just a short walk from the Old City and from the gorgeous Art Nouveau district. Elegant contemporary design, high ceilings and parquet flooring are combined with modern comforts: Wi-Fi, satellite TV, and a fully-equipped kitchen. The apartment is decorated with bright colours and is full of natural light. A shared rooftop terrace is open to all guests and offers great views over Barcelona.

host.about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

reviews.txt: 喜欢来巴塞罗那的朋友可以考虑去他们家哦,干净､ 设施物品齐全､可以自己做简餐特别方便,附近有地铁站,或者步行到市区都很方便

시설도 위치도 모두 만족스러웠어요 
다음에 가면 또 갈꺼같아요
Great cozy apartment in a great location.  Easy access to Metro, restaurants, supermarkets and parking lot.

Great centrally located two bedroom apartment with lots of light. The second bedroom is quite tight, but for a weekend is no problem. The little enclosed balcony space is also very nice to sit in. We were also able to store our bags on site after checkout which was very useful. I'd stay again without hesitation.
Es un sitio perfecto para alojarse en Barcelona. Limpio, espacioso y bien conectado. El trato fantástico. Recomendable 100%
Great location. Modern interior, comfortable beds. This seems to be a property owned by a management company and not an individual. I could be mistaken, but I don't think so.
Convenient and centrally located appartment! can certainly recommended.
카탈루냐 광장에서 걸어서 10분 걸립니다 위치가 매우 좋았습니다 깨끗하고 안전합니다
Mas alla del alijamiento impecable y de la zona del departamento, queremos destacar la ayuda 24hs del anfitrion y su buena atencion en todo momento. Muy contentos de la eleccion
We loved this place. Great location, updated appliances, very clean. It's a beautiful apartment, but we hardly spent any time in it. Would stay here again in a heartbeat.

A beautiful, clean, well equipped apartment in a fantastic location.  Exactly as described in the listing.  Check in was swift and efficient.  We were given plenty of tips and information by our host. Within 5-10 minutes walk of Plaza Catalunya. Plenty of shops and restaurants within a minutes walk of the apartment.  You must try the restaurant below the apartment if you stay - we had two excellent meals there.  Bring ear plugs if you are a light sleeper as there is a fair bit of road noise, as is typical for well appointed apartments in Barcelona centre.

Excellent location, very clean, modern amenities, and plenty of space. This is a perfect apartment for four people. We loved staying here. The apartment management was very helpful and allowed us to check in early. We loved exploring Barcelona from here. Almost everything is just a short walk away. It's also very close to a Metro station. We could not have been happier with this apartment

This beautiful apartment was the perfect home base for our family of four. In a very quiet neighborhood situated near wonderful restaurants and shops. Grocery store was also nearby. We had a perfect visit. Other reviews have mentioned corporate apartment. This may be the case but it did not take away from our experience. They responded quickly to all of our requests and arrange a taxi to the airport.

Location is perfect, you can reach a lot of sightseeings, shops, restaurants within 10 minutes. Host was very friendly, ready to help 24 hours a day. Apartments itself really clean and cozy, you can find everything you need. Hardly recommend!

This apartment is beautiful, with old-world detailing and modern amenities. The Metro is literally a block away and there are supermarkets, restaurants and bakeries on the same block. We were glad to have a dishwasher and washing machine as well! Highly recommend this convenient and beautiful location. As others have said, it is corporate-owned so does not have the personal feel at checkin-in but the people that helped us were are very friendly and helpful.

We were only able to stay in Barcelona for a quick 2 night, one day stay, and this Airbnb worked out perfect. It was in great location to get to where we needed to go, and most of it we could do by walking. They were very professional at check in and communication and the place was clean and had everything we needed for our quick stay.  Thanks again for everything!!
A great place to stay. Highly recommended.
Great flat, good communication. Helpful for parking too. I recommend this place.
Yaiza's place was beautiful and great for our group of girls. Towels and amenities were provided and the house was very comfortable. I'd love to stay here again!
Прекрасные апартаменты. Отличное место положение. Рекомендую для краткого пребывания в Барселоне.

name: Private Cozy Bedroom in Brooklyn
summary: Your private room is located in our family's lovely 3-bedroom condo, a welcoming space for you to call home while enjoying all that New York's five boroughs have to offer. We are artists and students of culture and will be happy to help with recommendations during your stay. We also have another bedroom listing with more space: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/135393?s=8&user_id=663764&ref_device_id=834476da76042c7d3d85486a5eaac86e8cc4de3b

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: Joshua is a writer originally from the Atlantic City area and Karen is an actress,designer,improviser originally from a small town in southeastern Oklahoma. We love film, theatre, music, travel, and nyc and are always up for a lively discussion! We have been hosting on Airbnb since 2011 and really enjoy the opportunity to host such a wide variety of guests!

reviews.txt: The reservation was canceled 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This was our second time staying with Karen and her family.  As was our previous experience, Karen was a great host, the room was clean and set up for us.  Karen is super helpful, always offering great advice and her place is very close to the subway. 

We returned specifically because of our great experience last time and we would definitely do it again!
Karen & Joshua are great hosts! Very helpful, easy going, open minded and respectful. The apartment is nice and near the subway. So lovely family! Thank you!!!

We enjoyed our stay at Karen and Joshua's. They had lots of tips and advices about what to do and see.
Placed closed to the subway and Prospect Park, made it a perfect location for us.
The family was talkative, but respectfully to the need of privacy.

Karen and Joshua were great hosts. Eventhough we only booked the room a couple of hours before our check-in, everything was arranged perfectly. Everything is exactly as described. The house was clean, neat and close to the subway.

We were happy we could stay with this lovely family. When we go back to New York we would definitely stay here again! Thank you Karen and Joshua.

L'ambiance du quartier nous a au début un peu surpris mais finalement aucun problème. Nos hôtes on été très accueillant même en arrivant a 1h du matin! 2 charmants bambins et un couple disponible mais pas dans nos pattes ce qui nous a permis d'aller et venir à notre guise !
Merci à eux

Karen and Joshua were fantastic hosts! I staid a short three nights. They were flexible, kind, respectful and reliable. No problem for checking in, even if I was delayed because of the bus. No rush for the check out. The room and the bed were comfortable, clean, quite perfect for what I was looking for. And for sure, having groceries, a train station and restaurants near their place was great. Nothing to complain, I appreciated my stay.

Karen and Joshua were very welcoming, and helpful when it came to information about travel, what to do and our arrival and departure times. Despite being not that close to Manhattan, and being quite small for 2 people, it was perfect for our stay. Having WiFi also made our stay very easy.

I enjoyed my stay with Karen and Joshua. They were both very kind and helped me with directions for getting around the city when I needed it. It was my second time being in New York City and my first time using Airbnb and I'm glad everything worked out smoothly.
Everything was completely fine. Hosts were very hospitable.

Karen and Joshua could not have been more gracious hosts. As advertised, they offered a private and very cozy room and gave full access to their kitchen and facilities.  They were friendly and seemed always ready to be of help if I needed it.  Moreover, they had it worked out almost to the last detail:  when I arrived they already had neat packages, clearly labelled, of take-out menus for area restaurants, they had directions to local shops and businesses - all of which were in walking distance, and they had clear directions to the nearby subways, and there was a list of house rules - none of which were unacceptable. Overall, it was like spending a weekend at a friend's place.  The neighborhood was quite busy with people and shops until late into the night, but the room was quiet, clean and comfortable.  I slept like a baby.  I would only suggest that you confirm your check in and check out times with them in advance so as to avoid any confusion. I would stay here again if I needed to take another trip to NYC in the future - for sure.

Me and my friend had a very pleasant stay with Karen and Joshua and their two lovely children. It was very special to mingle with this beautiful American family and household. The bed we slept in was more than comfortable and we experienced a lot of space in sharing the kitchen and bathroom. Highly recommended! Great neighborhood too!

My Mom and I had a stop over in NY and stayed at Karen's for one night and it was very nice. I already stayed at Karens place last year and so it was my first choice. The room is clean and the bed is very comfortable. The neighborhood has some nice places to eat and the subway is just around the corner. Karen and Joshua are super nice and Belle and Crockett are really adorable. We enjoyed our short stay and I would definitely stay there again.

Karen and her husband are very nice people and it was a pleasure to stay with them. They were very friendly, helpful and easy-going.

Everything was the way they had depicted it in the description. No bad surprises. The room and the apartment were clean and cosy.

If I should come back to NY, I would try to stay with them again.

Karen had a very quick reaction time when we needed a place to stay last-minute. The room, while small for two people, is inexpensive for the New York area. We were up and about every day we were there though, so it was not a problem. If you are not planning on staying indoors for too long, we would definitely recommend this place!

When we first exited the subway, we found the neighborhood to be somewhat intimidating, though it was later at night. Nothing happened to us, even though we came home late every night. Could be that we just needed to get used to it a little at first.

Karen and Josh were great hosts, talking to us at length on the 
subject of New York and other destinations. Very friendly people.

The room was exactly as described. A nice cozy, comfortable bed to rest my head in between venturing out into Brooklyn and beyond. Karen and Josh were very hospitable and gracious and their kids were awesome too! 
Thanks so much!!!
Appartement très proche du métro et donc très pratique ,hôtes sympatiques et accueillants .Grand lit confortable mais qui occupe presque toute la chambre ...

I stayed 3 nights at Karen and was really happy with my stay. The bedroom was tiny but nice and clean and the apartment very close to the subway and grocery / drugstore / etc. Karen and her husband are kind, respectful and helpful. I would definitely go back and recommend staying with them! 

Je suis restée 3 nuits et j'ai beaucoup apprécié mon séjour. La chambre était petite mais propre et charmante et l'appartement vraiment près du métro et des services. Karen et son maris sont gentils, respectueux et très serviables. J'y retournerais et recommanderais de rester avec eux!

I had a great stay at Karen place and her family. She is very kind and available. She makes you really confortable. Her family is really lovely!
It's easy to go to Manhattan from her place.
I recommend this place to everyone who want to visit New-York.
Thanks

Our stay at Karen´s place was totally with no problems. She was very helpfull, the room was clean and the whole family is friendly. Have no negative feedback, it is also good reachable with the subway. We also come to Newark and left from JFK airport and went to two NHL games in NJ and Nassau, all with no need of cab, everything can be done with cheap and quick transport ;)

name: cozy house and garden in the heart of Montréal
summary: House at the heart of Montréal. Cosy apartment, 2 bedrooms, one living room, calme street, close to Downtown, the Plateau-Mt Royal and Hochelaga. Métro, café and stores 10m away. A HUGE garden. Cat present! :)

host.about: Je suis originaire de Roumanie, maintenant à Montréal depuis 8 ans. Je suis infirmière, reconvertie après une mini-carrière dans les festivals de cinéma montréalais. J'aime partager et rencontrer de nouvelles personnes.

reviews.txt:
Teodora was a great host! She contacted me before we arrived to prepare us for the checking in process. She was very accommodating our rushed arrival (we had dinner res.!) and had a great printout regarding any questions we might have about her home. 

We really enjoyed her cat Tsitsou. I have a cat allergy but she was so friendly and hospitable that I even managed to give her a few good pats. Teodora's place is very clean, so my allergic reaction was minimal. 

The location is great. It's less than a 10 min walk to the Metro and very easy to find street parking. We enjoyed the garden space very much. We sat out there one late afternoon and felt as though we were truly Montreal residents!

One suggestion I make (which is NOT a deal breaker) is perhaps a small fan in the guest room. The windows are not very big, and we kept the door closed, to keep Tsitsou out, and it got stuffy pretty quickly. 

I will be giving Teodora a 10/10 and we hope to come back to visit soon!
On a eu un excellent séjour chez (Website hidden by Airbnb) maison est jolie et accueillante et elle a tout ce qu'on a besoin...en plus elle est proche de tout!

Teodora was very friendly and showed us around her home and garden. Her home was in the perfect spot and it was very easy to get around in her neighborhood. Her home was very clean and exceeded our expectations. It was the perfect place to stay for a few nights!
The host canceled this reservation 15 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Fantastic place and host, Teodora was very helpful listing some great places for us to checkout. Would certainly come back again! Tsi-Tsu was also adorable and great company

name: Sunny appartment on the Plateau
summary: Great apartment located in the heart the Plateau/Mile-end neighbourhood.  The perfect place to relax AND enjoy all of what Montreal has to offer :) !!  I look forward sharing with you my favorite spots and perspectives about this town and province!

host.about: From Montreal, Sabrina works as a trainer and consultant with non-profit organisations. On a more personal level, she cultivate a secret passion for social change theatre, traveling, yoga, cycling, cooking, harmony and... social gatherings! Marc-André adores sciences but spend the majority of his free time cycling, travelling and enjoying what the city has to offer!

reviews.txt: Staying at Sabrina's place in the Plateau neigborhood was the best experience I've ever had as my second time visiting Montreal because she was resourceful and helpful in suggesting to my mother and I for us to go to such as trendy restaurants and places to see in Montreal but most of all her apartment was clean and had everything I needed. I would strongly recommend others to stay at her place. Thank you Sabrina for everything.

Sabrina was a very nice woman who was extremely helpful. Her apartment is in a very safe neighborhood and was close to shops restaurants. I was told I could choose a room. When we arrived she had placed us in the less apealing room, which was the guest room.  I was more then happy to be there as we were right next to the bathroom and I would have felt very odd taking over her bedroom.  She let us use her condiments which was greatly appreciated. We cooked a lot and she was very respectful of giving us space that we were seeking.  Overall the price was awesome the area was great Sabrina was very cool and so is her decor in her home!  Ten times better than a hotel. Home away from home!

This is a tidy and nice place in the Montreal downtown. The apartment is in a calm and quiet street. However by 5 minutes walking you can experience the French essence of Montreal, cafe bistros, restaurants, bars, etc. Sabrina is a great host, very friendly with a nice personality. I recommend staying in her place.

Sabrina is an AMAZING host! The apartment is clean and in a great neighborhood (it is very close to downtown, old montreal, etc.) She was very helpful in providing us with information about the city, places we can go, etc. Overall staying with Sabrina was hassle free and super easy which allowed us to enjoy the beautiful city of Montreal!

Sabrina was such an excellent and warm host! She was very helpful in giving us details of places to go, to eat, etc., and she even left a map for us to use. Her place is really clean and beautiful. It is near Park LaFointaine and the colorful and interesting stretch of Mont Royal. We really enjoyed our stay at her place and more than that, we really enjoyed meeting her! Merci beacoup Sabrina! : )

The apt is very comfortable. I have everything I need even the condiments. Sabrina is a passionate, inspiring host. With a art history degree and humain system invention degree, she has extend knowledge of cuture difference which is very helpful for a new immigrant to Quebec. Thank a lot Sabrina.

Foi excelente a minha hospedagem no apartamento de Sabrina, ela é bastante acolhedora e foi muito gentil, me apresentou um pouco da cidade e do bairro. Eu não conhecia Montreal e Sabrina me ajudou muito, passeando comigo em algumas ruas e me dando atenção e informações importantes!  
Recomendo a todos (as) hospedarem-se em seu apartamento, o qual é muito limpo e fica em uma rua tranquila.

Isabel Lima - BRASIL

Sabrina is an incredible hostess! Her apt is so lovely, really comfortable, super clean, and perfectly located in the best part of Montreal. Sabrina was incredibly friendly and helpful with suggesting wonderful things to do and places to go during our stay. She gave us a map with lots of highlighted spots of places to visit. We really enjoyed visiting with her and would love to come stay with her again! Thank you Sabrina for a wonderful Montreal experience!

Sabrina has a very pretty apartment. She takes good care of it, and the apartment was clean. She was very accommodating to us, giving us a big well-thought out list of everything we need to know and do. She sent out emails and reminder or how to get to the apartment, and gave us some helpful tips on places to eat and whatnot. She even provided us with a second clean pair of bed sheets and allowed us to use pans and spices to cook (as eating out can get quite expensive!) Everything was excellent, and I would definitely recommend anyone who stays in Montreal to stay with Sabrina!
The reservation was canceled 36 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Super endroit Sabrina est une hôte sympa et très gentille et l'appartement est très bien calme et bien situé
Stylish apartment in a good location! Perhaps the only downside was the smell of cigarette smoke that filtered into the apartment. Sabrina was friendly and made check in/out easy.
Accueil super sympa! Très belle appart!

Bonjour,

Pendant ces 4 nuits chez Sabrina, on se sentait vraiment chez nous. Quand elle était là, on avait possibilité de discuter et de nous informer sur plein de choses à Montréal. 
Elle nous a bien aidé à préparer notre année ici et nous a même convié à aller faire du sport avec elle!

Merci Sabrina,

Lauriane et Julien

Sabrina et sa colocataire sont vraiment sympathique.
La chambre est super confortable et l'appartement a tout le nécessaire.
Très bon séjour pour nous.

Super séjour chez Sabrina !

L'appartement est fantastique, la chambre est assez grande, confortable.
Sabrina a été une hôte très prévenante et grâce à ces indications j'ai trouvé l'appartement vraiment très facilement.
Il est très bien situé, et très accessible, à 15 min du métro en marchant et 5 min avec le bus 97 qui passe toutes les 10 minutes.
Tous commerces à proximité.

Je recommande !
This place is great! Perfect place to stay in Montreal. Thank you Sabrina!
Wonderful apartment - even better host!! Absolutely recommend!
My experience Sabrina Mc Fadden was awesome I really enjoy it. She is a great Host.

I have spent an all week at Sabrina's home. It was a wonderful time in Montreal for me. The flat is really looks like as at the photos, it is well connected to the city centre. The zone is amazing with all the beautiful stairs which you find at almost every building.
Sabrina was very kind and helpful, she answered all my "important" questions when she returned home at the evening, gave me some very valuable tips. A rainy day, she left me an umbrella, too!! :)I am sure if I have the opportunity to return to Montreal, I will choose this appartment again :-) Thank you very much again, Sabrina! Cheers ;)

name: Mike's House- Uilani Room
summary: Our home is a 4bd older style home that has been in the family since 1935. Private room, with full size bed and partial bathroom. We are 7-10 walking distance to Paia town with lots to see and eat. There is off street parking and WIFI.

host.about: We are born and raised in Hawaii; and part Hawaiian.  My husband was born and raised in Maui all his life.  I was born on Oahu and raised there and the Big Island before moving to Maui about 30 years ago.  We love and treasure our beautiful Hawaiian Islands. Our family includes our 3 beautiful children; Maikala, Nainoa, and Iwalani.  We love our life and never take for granted for what we have.  Live life to the fullest because life is precious and should be appreciated everyday!!!

reviews.txt: Mike's house is a great and budget friendly place to stay, very close to the cool and relaxed downtown of Paia, away from any resort and big tourism area. Best of all Rina is a very nice person who helps you with any question and makes you really feel at home! She helped a lot for our children with many toys and stroller. Now as we are gone our daughter wants to go back to the lanai with the toys. Thanks Rina for everything!

We stayed one week in Mike's House and really enjoyed every second of it. Our room was spacious and nice and the balcony was perfect to have breakfast in the Hawaiian sun. 
The location is great for all kind of trips, and Paia downtown is in walking distance.
Rina provided us with everything we needed, including towels, guides and even a barbecue :)

Thanks again, Rina!!
Rina is wonderful. it is a beautiful place in Paia. It`s the best house to make holiday. Price and service is top!

Our 3-night stay at Mike's House to end our trip in Maui was perfect. Rina is very kind and helping, and the location is great, especially if you want to see the big waves of the north shore or drive the road to Hana. The restaurants and shops of Paia are a short walk away. Our room was well equipped and clean. Thanks Rina!

My husband and I enjoyed 3 nights at Mike's House.  We highly recommend staying there as it was clean, affordable, and walking distance to the beach, shops and restaurants.  Most importantly, however, was the Aloha Spirit that we felt from Rina.  Thanks for a great stay.  We'll be back!

Rina was simply a great host. Like supplying some of the little items that make a big difference when traveling. In our case beach towels, beach chairs, back pack, and bag cooler.

The house was clean and well looked after. The friendly atmosphere was also a plus.

Paia is centrally located and close to the airport. It is a young vibrant area.

The only con I can think of was the bed was a double bed and we are used to something bigger.

Bruce and Shelley

Rina was an excellent host and provided everything I needed, and so was the place, great location, plenty of space and all the amenities I needed. Will definitely come to Rina again when back in Paia.

It was very nice to stay at Mike`s House. Rina is very friendly and she does so much that the people feel well at her place. 
I would definitely come back to this place… 
Thank you so much for everything Rina

Der 6 tägige Aufenthalt in Mike's House war sehr angenehm. Wir würden jederzeit wieder dort wohnen. Das Zimmer war sauber und kann jedem weiter empfohlen werden, sofern einem kleinere Lärmbelastungen nicht stören (z.B. krähender Hahn).

Rina war eine sehr nette und hilfsbereite Gastgeberin. Bei unserem Trip auf den Haleakala stellte sie uns sogar Fliesdecken zur Verfügung.

Unser Zimmer verfügte über eine eigene Toilette, Lavabo, Kühlschrank und Mikrowelle. Die Dusche befand sich in einem Gemeinschaftsbad. 

Nebst Badetüchern und Strandstühlen waren auch Shampoo und Douche bereitgestellt.

Für Dollar 1.50 konnte man die Maschmaschine inkl. Maschmittel benützen. Gedeckter Parkplatz vorhanden. 5-minütiger Fussmarsch bis ins Zentrum von Paia.

It was nice.  It would have been nice to have an air conditioner in the room though.  It gets very hot in Maui, even at night, starting in early May and on.  The rooster in the neighbors yard woke us up in the morning.  If we had an AC we could have shut the door instead of leave it open for the breeze.

But Rina was great and super helpful.  They had a big fridge in the common kitchen we could use, tons of cookware and stuff.  They also left us some beach towels and picnic bags we used for our trips.  That was super helpful!

Staying at Rina's place was very nice. We loved Paia with the little shops, supermarket and restaurants. Especially that you can walk to these places from home is very good.
The double bed we had was a little too small for two adults so we shared the bed with our daughter. 
Rina was very helpfull with tips and every day we saw her in case we had any questions.
Ho'okipa was our favorite beach were green sea turtles coma ashore almost every day to rest.
Mike's House is a really great place to stay. Rina was very friendly and helpful. The  location of the house is really good to travel around the island. I recommend it :)

We really much enjoyed staying at Rinas place! The room was clean and Rina provided us with everthing we needed. They helped us with everything we needed help with and even when our car broke down Rina and her husband were more than helpful! Paia is a cute little town, everything is within walking distance (grocery, restaurants, beach, yoga...) Thank you very much for the late check out end everything, we would definetely stay here again!

très bonne adresse, pas loin à pieds du centre de paia et de sa jolie plage.
chambres propres et fonctionnelles, cuisine bien équipé, internet efficace.
rina est extrêmement gentille et hospitalière.
encore une fois, une très bonne adresse.
Hoku is a very thoughtful and kind host. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at his/her place.

Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Rina, qui est aux petits soins avec ses visiteurs. La chambre est agréable et l'emplacement idéal pour accéder  Paia à pied, tout en étant à l'écart de la circulation.

Rina is a great host and we enjoyed our stay there. The location is very easy to find and has everything we need. The house itself is an old one but the rooms are relatively clean, great value for the money.
매우 깨끗하고 모든게 잘 갖춰져있는 집이였어요~ 호스트도 매우 친절하고 기쁘게 맞이해주었습니다!

Rina was an amazing host, she did everything to help me with clear indications to find the bnb. The house was very very clean, she work's hard! I had such a great time there and talking with her.
The house is very well located, close from the boutiques, Mana grocery which is great, beaches, restaurants. 
Felt very safe in the place too and it was calm and cozy :-)
Wish I will be able to go back!

Everything you need to feel at home. Our room had a half bathroom (toilet) and sink. Big room and a private patio to boot. Hoku had everything ready and the communication was excellent. 

The house is located in the small town of Paia, a small little place with food a quick walk down the street. Paia is in the middle of the island so equally convenient to get to Lahaina or Hana.

Amenities for everything you can need. Full kitchen, clean towels, coolers, etc 

Great value and comfy living. Thanks Hoku!

name: Large railroad style 3 bedroom apt in Manhattan!
summary: Spacious 3 bedroom apartment. 2 are railroad style (must go through one to get to the next) and the additional bedroom is at opposite end of the apartment for extra privacy. Well equipped open kitchen. Large living room with additional fold out couch. Great apt for a weekend in NYC.  10 min walk to Central Park.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: Spectacular, the host was so kind and his apartment is beautiful, I enjoyed be there, the bed is so comfortable and the apartment is really clean...

Vict's apartment is very nice and the supermarket just next to it! It is very convenient for us to buy anything that we need. The only problem is the apartment is little far from midtown, so if we take Uber to go home, it usually costs a lot.

L.appartement de Vick est très (Website hidden by Airbnb) décoration symphonie et très bien entretenu. Il ne manquait rien pour nous 4 et nous avons passé un agréable séjour et appartement bien situé pour visiter New York.
Vick was very friendly, flexible and welcoming. The apartment has very good connection to the city center (bus, subway) and a shopping mall is in close neighborhood. We enjoyed our stay in NY!

Vick was a great host very understanding and helpful. The place certainly took some getting used as it is quite narrow but the space was big enough for 9 of us. The place had a fully stocked kitchen, bathroom with shower and bath, a mac and a tv with apple tv. The neighborhood was good it was a 10 minute walk to the nearest subway station and a short walk to central park.
The apartment was very nice, clean and near to the metro. It was really great to stay at this place.

Vick was an excellent host. he was very flexible with my last minute changes and made sure I had everything I needed. he's pretty laid back so everything went smoothly. 
The appartment was nice, very close to grocery stores and transportation.  
I spent an excellent time in NYC and loved Vick's place. 
Thank you man. 
Joad
Overall great location and experience for what we were looking for. Surrounding area is slightly questionable late at night. No complaints about the space.

Vick was easy to contact.  We aligned on a time to arrive and leave and there was a lot of flexibility.  Great host, apartment was described well and really quiet inside despite being in a city.  Thanks

Vick was very easy to communicate and has been honest from the first contact to the last. His house was clean and had enough space for 7 people. He was also very flexible with our last minute changes. He was kind to check-in with us throughout our visit. His house is great for large groups with good service and affordable price in NYC. Overall, he made our first Airbnb experience great. I'd love to stay again.

Our stay at Vicks apartment was amazing. Vick always responded quickly to any questions I had and was very helpful with everything. His apartment looks exactly how it does in pictures but even nicer in person. He was also very flexible with check-in and check-out times. I would definitely stay here again.
Vick's place is really nice and spacious. Vick is really a nice person and he has a flexible check in and out time.
Was a great host. Got everything we needed!

Vick's place was just as described in the pictures. We were so happy that the space was clean and in a decent neighborhood. I traveled with three other guest and we all had plenty of room to sretch out. The two living areas were used as additional sleeping place which we ended up using. Rooms in the house were on separate ends making for more privacy. 
My flight had been delayed multiple times, Vick was nice enough to allow my guest to check in without me. He and his sister, Maria were very fast in responding to our needs and even checking on us to make sure we were okay. 
Due to late flight departure, both Vick and Maria allowed later check out times to accommodate us. I would recommend this spot for small groups and I would love to stay here again! 
Thanks so much! Trip successful!

Great Location with supermarkets close by and only 5-10 minutes walk to the subway station. Two bedrooms with comfy beds and towels. Good shower and a living room. Old building with little light but that was no problem for us. We enjoyed our stay very much.
A great apartment for groups and wonderful communication from the hosts.
Vick was a great host.  Extremely easy to get a hold of and immediately responded to any questions.

We loved this place! Very clean and slept 3 very comfortably. There’s a shopping center across the street with a Costco, Marshall’s, Old Navy which was great. Will definitely try to stay again next time I’m in the area.
整体来说一般,地段位置还算不错,距离市中心和景点二十多分钟车程｡房子本身感觉不好,房屋格局就像走廊一样的,长条形,只有两端两个房间有门,私密性一般｡只有一个很小的浴室,非常不方便,不适合大家庭入住｡床单和毛巾显得老旧,而且房屋没有洗衣机,对于多日入住的旅客,毛巾不能换洗很麻烦｡我们住的房间床单有黄色痕迹｡房东还算不错吧｡价格并不便宜,性价比很低,个人觉得酒店会好很多｡要求不高的可以尝试｡

Vick was an AMAZING host. He checked in frequently, quickly responded to any questions, and was super nice. The air bnb is very cozy & has plenty of bed space. I would definitely stay at this air bnb again.

name: Sydney Olympic Park High Level Stunning View Apt
summary: This brand new two-bedroom apartment with 2 bathroom at high level of the iconic Australia Tower in the heart of Sydney Olympic Park. Our place is welcoming. It contains 2 urban design bedrooms with buitl-in wardrobes. It could accommodate up to six adults, the ensuite room and the second room are both with band new Queen size bed can fit two people comfortably, the sofa bed in the living room can convert to Queen size bed, if necessary.

reviews.txt: Our crew stayed here for a business trip for Supanova Popculture event. It was great, spacious and walking distance to everything. Parking was a breeze, restaurants around the area and a convenience store. You even get 10% off at the restaurants when you mention your a resident.

Nicole was an amazing host. The apartment was perfect and even better than the pictures. Excellent location to see a show at Sydney Olympic Park. 
Highly recommended

From the first email to Nicole, it felt like I was talking to a friend. She was so welcoming and helpful, and responded quickly to every request. On arrival I was met at the elevator with a big smile and the key. My surprise when I walked in the door was immense! The apartment is beautifully appointed, fresh spotless linen, a bowl of fruit, chocolates, and even an array of teabags and biscuits to have with my coffee. Such a lovely surprise. It's a spacious apartment with two beautiful bathrooms and amazing views. Even a large balcony with deck chairs. This apartment truly had everything we needed. There was a chemist near the ground floor doors, and a convenience store as well; coffee shops and cafes are nearby, and an excellent DFO shopping centre nearby (within walking distance; 1.3km I think).  I recommend this apartment to you without hesitation. Thanks Nicole! We'll be back!

For a family of 5 the apartment was excellent with a fantastic view.   Everything you need is supplied and Nicole is a perfect host.  It is close to restaurants, public transport and sporting events. Highly recommend.
Really nice apartment - everything was clean & comfortable!

A great place to stay. Close to everything in Olympic Park (including being around the corner from the train station), and a phenomenal view. From the lounge room as well as both bedrooms and balcony you can clearly see every major sporting venue. And what's better is it's only roughly a 10 min walk to any one of them, making it incredibly easy to access any one of them with ease. 

The apartment itself was very clean, with a modern look and feel, and had everything we needed. And whilst we didn't actually meet Nicole, her communication was excellent and she was very accommodating when we had a couple of extra guests show up at late notice wanting to stay, and she allowed us to have a late checkout.

All of this for a great price.

Thanks Nicole. I would definitely stay there again.

We stayed in the apartment for an even held at Qudods Bank Arena. It was the perfect location, we were able to duck out for a quick shop to the DFOs and a quick easy walk to our event. 
The apartment was excellent the beds were really comfy and having 2x bathrooms suited us well.

Nice touches with fresh fruit, porridge and sweets.  Not set up with cooking ingredients or milk etc.  Lovely modern unit, far better than staying at one of the nearby expensive hotels.  Lots of restaurants in walking distance.  Host was easily contactable and understanding when we left the key in the wrong mailbox.
Was really good staying with Nicole, whe was very easy to conect with and her housr was very clear and organized with everything I needed and well located, super happy, thanks Nicole x

Good location but no supermarkets nearby - only expensive convenience stores. There was a fire alarm on one of the days which shut down the elevator all day requiring us to climb 18 flights of stairs. Other than that we had a good stay.
This is a lovely 2 bedroom apartment on the 11th floor overlooking Sydney's Olympic Park. Plenty of room and nice amenities.
Definitely a great place to stay, such a beautiful apartment. Thank you so much for ur kindly host Nicole :)

Really enjoyed our stay.  The apartment was clean and comfortable with great facilities and had everything we needed.  Very convenient location.  Host was easy to contact and deal with.  Will definitely be staying again when next in the area.
Great communication! Great location with great price! Thank you Nicole and Vicky!
Everything good^^

Nicole had fantastic communication leading up to and during our stay. The apartment was much bigger than represented in the photos and was in a perfect location accessing event venues around Olympic Park. Would easily recommend and stay again... Thanks for making our trip so easy Nicole !!

On entering the apartment we knew straight away we would have a great stay. There was fruit and chocolates in a little bowl, a large and after our journey from Adelaide and working out the train system to get to the apartment we were exhausted and instantly felt welcomed, exactly what we needed. We were there for the Australia Dance Festival which was exactly what Nicole had said just a short 10min walk, so fantastic for our needs. Perfect location with a couple of great places to eat a pharmacy and a convenience store just at the bottom of the apartment building.
We would definitely stay again when visiting Olympic Park.
Thanks Nicole!!

Loved arriving to a wonderful view, top notch apartment with everything you could need on hand. It was very well kept, immaculate and well stocked with tea, coffee, basic pantry items, bathroom and laundry products.  We were 2 families staying together and needed to co-ordinate our outings as there is only one car parking key, that is the only downside.

Apartment was really well positioned and nicely appointed. Could not fault anything during our stay and the nice touches like fresh fruit on arrival was appreciated. 
Thanks Nicole we will be back.
I would highly recommend this apartment. Clean, modern, comfortable and better than expected. Friendly host who spoilt us with biscuits and great communication at all time. We will be back!

name: Hibiscus Hideaway in Kihei
summary: This beautiful one bedroom one bathroom cottage is completely brand new and is kept immaculate. Tile floors throughout, granite counter tops in the progressive yet traditional fully appointed kitchen and state of the art appliances.

reviews.txt: Loved staying here! My first time to Hawaii and Maui Island so I really didn't have much of an idea where everything was apart from approximations using a map. The location is perfect! Right near the ocean/ beach, key spot to get to the airport or other parts of the island. Additionally, Samantha thought of everything right down to ensuring there is a hookup for a hose off the driveway so you can wash the sand off your feet. I will definitely stay here again!
Hibiscus Hideaway is a great place to stay. It's very well located and it has everything you need for a pleasant stay in Maui. Aloha.

In a few words perfect, in a great location and reasonably priced.  The pictures do not do it justice.   It is truly an oasis. Before you enter at the cottage, there is a beautiful stamped concrete patio complete with outdoor dining area and separate sitting area for relaxing with your morning coffee or afternoon cocktail.    There is a very nice feeling of privacy provided by a privacy wall and a line of small palm trees that separates the property from the property next-door. There is a full kitchen, a beautiful bathroom, separate bedroom, and living room with flatscreen television and pull out couch.    They provided boogie boards, a cooler, two beach chairs, a Sunbrella,. Everything was clean, even the barbecue.   I would certainly stay there again if I had the opportunity to return.
We had a very pleasant stay in this apartment. Very comfortable. Convenient location. We loved it!

Samantha's little hideaway is fantastic!  Very cozy!  The place has been updated with all of the amenities you need.  Plus, all of the little touches make it a great say.  From the island magazines to help find good recommendations to the island map sitting out to help you find your way, Samantha put a lot of effort to make the stay very welcoming.  The place is on a small side street in north Kihei which is out little outside of the main town area, perfect for what we were looking for.  A short walk from the beach where you can see the sunset, but also very central on the island to get around.  Definitely would stay here again.

Mahalo!

This place was absolutely perfect! Everything was just as shown in the pictures. The cottage is very clean and comfortable. All that you could need was provided (towels, beach chairs, washer/dryer, kitchen items, etc.) The neighborhood is very peaceful and I enjoyed having breakfast on the private patio. On my last day I went to the big beach in Makena that was recommended by Samantha and it was wonderful. I would definitely stay here again!
Good place to stay.
Perfect location. Beautiful place, excellent host.
Great place in a beautiful location

It was our first visit to Maui, Hibiscus hideaway is an excellent place as pictured, with everything thought of as mentioned in other reviews and conveniently located to all places in Maui. Despite last minute booking the place was ready and Samantha responded within few minutes to all clarifications.

name: Stunning Oceanfront. Amazing Views. 2 Bed 2 Baths
summary: Experience Stunning Views in a large 2 bedroom private Oceanfront condo in Maui.  Property amenities include:  Beautiful Beach, 2 Pools, Hot Tub, Restaurant, Board Rentals, Tennis Courts, Mini Golf, BBQs, Washer and Dryer, 2 Gyms, and Concierge.

reviews.txt:
Raj was the perfect host from "start-to-finish!" During our stay there was never a need to contact him as his Lahaina condo was perfect. Prior to our stay, I sent Raj a couple logistical questions and he responded to each immediately plus he called twice offering assistance. 

We felt very welcome and comfortable due to Raj's warm hospitality. He sent us a detailed "Welcome Packet" which included very useful tips for our Maui adventure. The condo was 100% clean and included everything one may need to prepare meals and have an enjoyable and relaxing stay. Prior to our arrival, he actually replaced most all the kitchen items such as silverware, dishes, cooking utensils, pots and pans, etc. The furnishings (including the beds) were extremely comfortable and the panoramic view, condo grounds and beach were SPECTACULAR!!! It was especially nice having a casual open-air restaurant on the property. Served breakfast, lunch and dinner.

We're already looking forward to returning :-)

Nancy, Rich, Jeff & Robbie

Excellent views and very comfortable. Rajeev is extremely welcoming and provides excellent recommendations for dining and activities. Great communication and smooth Check-in/out process. Highly recommended!

We totally loved our stay here. Perfect spot for lots of activities and sights around Lahaina. 
The view was sensational and Raj made everything easy before and during our stay with his comprehensive guide and responsiveness. We can't wait to come back!!!
Place was awesome! Had everything posted and more

This condo was fantastic.  I love how the master has huge sliding doors that you can open up for more space or close for privacy.

Rajeev was a excellent and very personable host.  He gave us super recommendations.  I only wish we could have done them all.

We had a glitch with my name on checkin and he called me directly a short time after to check and make sure everything was taken care of.

He always responded very quickly after any email, text or phone call.  Such a great host.

The grounds were also fantastic, great pool and hot tub.  The cafe on the grounds was a great place to eat dinner or breakfast if you didn't want to drive anywhere and the beach is beautiful.

Because it's not part of the huge resorts it feels much more private, but only minutes away from great shops, restaurants and water fun.

If we ever get back to Maui, we will definitely be looking this one up again.
Rajeev's place was beautiful and he was very responsive to questions.

Rajeev's place was as depicted in the pictures and even better. The view from the private lanai was AMAZING! The unit was nicely decorated and very clean. The kitchen was fully stocked with every appliance/utensil you could imagine and more.  You had full use of beach chairs, towels,  laundry, etc. We would definitely stay here again.
