The condo was the perfect location for our vacation in Maui. We thoroughly enjoyed staying here and Raj was very helpful with information before we arrived. We will most definitely stay here again, which hopefully won't be too long from now.

We really enjoyed our stay at Rajeev's airbnb. The beach was very private and filled with many opportunities to see turtles. The location was walking distance to a delicious sushi place and Maui's Brewery (highly recommend both). We were able to check in earlier than expected and the place was very clean. Rajeev was a great host and we really enjoyed our stay.

What a beautiful experience!  Raj and family were fantastic hosts to our family and we are grateful to them for sharing their beautiful home in this gorgeous resort. It's the perfect setting for a fun yet peaceful vacation. 
Raj is very responsive and thoughtful as he provided a valuable welcome packet before we arrived. It was put to good use in creating our family's itinerary! 
We were giddy from the moment we arrived to the family home and found it was exactly as illustrated in the description and more! The views are absolutely AMAZING!!! We spent many hours on the patio simply taking in the spectacular views... The family home is truly lovely and very clean.  We appreciated the notes regarding the access to wifi, the use of the laundry machines in the home, storage of beach supplies, and even check out process. A fabulous host that provided my family with everything we needed to make our stay comfortable and enjoyable!  The check-in process was so easy and convenient, the staff so warm & friendly, wonderful resort amenities. This was our first trip to Maui, and we know we will be back! This is largely due to our memorable experience staying here! 
Raj-- a huge MAHALO for sharing your beautiful home with us. Can't wait to come back!
This place was everything the pictures "describe"!! Raj was great with communication and everything was perfect! We will definitely be back!!!

Great location , great communication , great tips on where to eat and things to do.   Rajeev Went above and beyond.    Would highly recommend to anyone for a great value we felt.     Only compliant was tight parking under building but u can park out side where we had no issues.
What a beautiful place! We really enjoyed our stay in Raj's apartment!

Rajeev's place is exactly as depicted in the pictures. Clean, accessible, beautiful and calm environment. He makes it very convenient for his guests by providing coolers, beach chairs, etc. We had a great time and will definitely be back.
Raj made us feel welcome from the moment we arrived in Maui. Our family loved the room at Sands of Kahana. Beautiful room and great location. We will be back. Mahalo!

This is an EXCELLENT condo to rent. Perfect location, beautiful grounds, right on the beach, on site RESTAURANT (which serves excellent food) and that is a HUGE plus especially in the AM. Fabulous views and a beach with VERY few people. Quiet and peaceful. 8th floor provides spectacular views and a wonderful breeze and the sounds of the waves at night. Would DEFINITLY rent again!

The condo was a PERFECT place to spend a week on Maui.  The property has great amenities complete with hot tub/ pool, daily cleaned  grills for BBQing, a full serve restaurant/bar  and paddle board/Kayak/snorkel gear rentals.  

The condo's oceanfront bedroom was heavenly for hearing the waves through the screen doors and evenings on the lanai at sunset were magical.  Our 8th floor view had to be the best on the island.  Rajeev was a grest host....very attentive in his communications and recommendations.  We are excited to return again next year!!

Rajeev's condo was absolutely wonderful. It has everything you need for a comfortable stay, and the space itself is huge and very well looked after. It was spotless and we felt right at home. There are plenty of beach towels supplied which was very useful and Raj gave us great tips about local places to check out. 

The condo has THE MOST spectacular views of the beach and ocean and we spent a huge portion of our holiday soaking in the sunsets from the balcony. Just incredible. 

We also loved swimming at the beach and happy hour at the restaurant/bar downstairs. 

Can't recommend this place enough, please visit and see for yourself! Thanks Raj!

The condo is spacious and well appointed. The view is amazing! It was great having access to the pools, hot tub, tennis courts and bar/grill. We would love to go back. The owner’s communication was excellent and he provided a lot of useful info. Loved Maui!!

Everything about our stay went above and beyond our expectations.  The condo is lovely and in such a wonderful location.  We were able to whale watch, paddle board, snorkel, and hang with turtles all at the condo.  It was our favorite place to be.  Thanks for helping to make our dream vacation come true!

name: Mouzinho 244 Ap4 by RUA Apartments
summary: Ap4 is  located at Mouzinho da Silveira Street, in downtown, and in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage Center. This apartment is on the 2th floor  and it's an apartment full of light. For privacy windows don't allow outside visibility. It has 1 bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, a dining area and a cozy living room. whith TV cable and free wi-fi. São Bento's Train Station and the Subway are just a 2 minute walk away You can see and choose  other apartments "cliking" on myprofile page.

host.about:
Somos pessoas comunicativas, gostamos de conviver com outras pessoas,  adoramos viajar e conhecer novos países e novas realidades.
Também gostamos muito da nossa cidade natal, o Porto e de a dar a conhecer.

reviews.txt: Fantastische plek, super centraal, compleet nieuw en fris appartement.  En niet te vergeten hele lieve verhuurders!
Todo perfecto

Manuela and Pedro were very welcoming! We arrived late but there was no problem, they offered us a glass of Porto and gave us a lot of tips to discover the city. The appartment is all renovated so it is very clean, functional and above all, very well located in the historical center. I recommend this place without any doubt!
Thanks again!

This appartment was perfect : clean, very well located (very centered in porto) and spacious. For sure if I come back to Porto, I'll take the same.
The host was very nice and found a solution for all of our requests.
Super appartment.

The apartment is great, excellent location and everything is brand new !
Pedro checked us in, he was very kind, told us everything we needed to know, and we even had some Porto wine at our arrival. 
The only downside was the occasional noise outside (people shouting).
Would definitely recommend !
This is a really good place to stay in Porto. Manuela's flat is very nice, well cleaned and close to the main city attractions. I'd strongly recommend it the ones visiting Porto.

Apartamento bonito y acogedor en el centro de Oporto, muy bien situado cerca de todas las atracciones de la ciudad: monumentos, barrio de la Ribera, metro, etc. Muy nuevo y limpio. Las únicas pegas: no hay ascensor ni climatización (aire acondicionado ni calefacción). Pero seguro que Manuela se encargará de acondicionarlo pronto. Es una estupenda anfitriona.

En el apartamento de Manuela y Pedro nos sentimos genial.
Una ubicación perfecta para poder llegar a todos los puntos de la ciudad de Oporto.
Manuela fue encantadora y nos esperó y nos enseñó el apartamento. Muy simpática y agradable. Las fotos corresponden con la realidad, está todo muy nuevo y limpio. 100% recomendable!

Un apartamento céntrico, limpísimo y decorado con buen gusto. Una botella de Porto te está esperando, nada más entrar. Manuela nos atendió muy amablemente en todo momento. Lo recomiendo a todo el mundo

Très bon séjour dans cet appartement parfaitement situé au centre ville. Manuela a gentillement ajouté un lit bébé pour nous et les voyageurs suivants. Pas de clim et quelques bruits dans la rue piétonne le soir, mais rien de grave. Très bon appartement.

Nous avons passé un super séjour à Porto, l'appartement est bien aménagé et est situé au cœur du quartier historique il y a donc pas besoin de voiture.
Notre hôte travail dans un magasin en bas de l'immeuble ce qui a facilité notre arrivée.

Great apartment! Ideal location in the centre of Porto: a few steps from Sao Bento station, and a few minutes' walk from Ribeira on one side, and all other main attractions on the other (Sé, Torre dos Clérigos...).
The apartment is stylish and comfortable, Manuela is a very kind host. I would definitely recommend this to anyone visiting Porto!

Our apartment was located in a renovated building that only contains airbnb properties. Its location is central, it is perfect to visit Porto, everything can be done on foot. 

Manuela was waiting for us on the tin store located on the ground floor. She was quite nice and offered us helpful advise on parking and local restaurants.

The apartment itself looks exactly like the pictures and it is big enough for a couple and a kid. It is modern and nicely decorated. The kitchen is basically equipped, don't expect to cook there but you have everything for breakfast (do buy/bring tea and coffee). The 
bedroom is comfortable. Though it doesn't overlook Muzinho da Silveira street, which is quite a busy, you can still hear some noise at night and in the morning evening but nothing too bothering.

We though it was a good price for money, especially as we booked it shortly before our arrival.
Very nice place, great location and kind host!

El apartamento es tal como muestra las fotos, esta muy limpio y muy céntrico. Manuela estuvo pendiente de nuestra llegada y al alojarnos nos recomendo sitios a los que ir y donde comer. Repetiriamos seguro.

Excelente localização, próxima do metro e pontos de interesse, confortável. Corresponde às fotos publicadas. Anfitriã nos ofereceu vinho do Porto na chegada, muito gentil, nos deu dicas e informações úteis.

L'appartement est très agréable : immeuble refait à neuf, appartement très fonctionnel, très propre, et super bien placé dans Porto. Manuela est très gentille et prend le temps de nous accueillir. Son magasin - situé en bas de l'immeuble - permet de laisser ses affaires le jour de l'arrivée ou du départ. Le seul bémol concerne la cour intérieure sur laquelle donnent les appartements 2 et 4 : elle est squattée par quelques marginaux un peu bruyants certains soirs. Nous sommes tout de même ravis par notre séjour et retournerons chez Manuela !

Everything was as described, very clean and close to the city center. 
Manuela was very kind.

Everything was excellent from the very beginning. We found the place very easily. It really is centrally located and has everything in it. We got the place polished. Manuela was very flexible with the checkin&out. The shower is fantastic, and the bed is perfect. Great place !!!

name: Wander to the Beach from a Cozy Wailea Condo
summary: Mix a cocktail in the kitchenette at this studio-style apartment, decorated in warm, earthy tones. Sip it on the private deck as geckos scuttle around banana palms, or amid lush greenery at the complex’s shared poolside dining area with BBQ grills.

host.about: Tamara and Steve have lived on Maui since 1996 and our two young children were born and raised here. Steve is a Firefighter for Maui county and works at the Kihei fire station. Tamara is a stay-at-home mom and helps run our vacation rental business.  We have enjoyed owning our homes for their lovely tropical settings, great pool areas, and proximity to the wonderful beaches in Kihei and Wailea. We live five minutes from our properties and take great care to ensure our guests are happy. If you need anything while you are staying in our rentals we are here to help you. We hope to have you as our guests, The Farwig Family

reviews.txt: DO NOT TRUST THESE HOSTS. TERRIBLE RACISTS. We loved the location but the room was so small and smelt so bad. Room got no sunlight. The shower only ran cold water. The pools were all dirty and had lots of kids. Originally the post said "flexible checkout" but then it was changed randomly to 10am when the racist couple Steve and Tamara kicked us out on our last day in Maui. We had no where to go with our luggage and our flight back home was at 3pm
Great host

We absolutely LOVED this location and space. It was WAY better than we expected and the location is walking distance to the prettiest beaches, restaurants and yoga! We stayed in 4 airbnb's on Maui and this was our fave! Please drive to Makena and hang out at the gorgeous beach or take the boardwalk walks in front of the fancy hotels walking distance from Tamara and Steve's place:)
This Airbnb was absolutely perfect for us. Steve is very responsive and the flat is convenient and has everything needed for an amazing stay in Maui!
Loved the place! Amazing location! Short walk to the shops and some really nice beaches.
Great location and great home!  Highly recommend

Everything was great while staying at this cozy studio.  The condo was very clean and well kept.  There was also nice touches such as allowing us to borrow beach chairs, boogie board, etc.  And there is a washer/dryer in the condo which was great!  The complex is minutes away from the beach and a grocery store.  Pretty much everything you would need.

Our room was clean and very roomy. I greatly appreciated all the little extras that were available: beach chairs, blankets, umbrella, lunch box, ice packs, little packets of mustard for sandwiches, tupperwear, snacks, etc. We loved watching the little geckos scuttle around on the banana tree outside and listening to the birds in the morning/evening. Such a great little space, I would go back and stay there in a heart beat! (:

Amazing place to stay.  The "studio" is HUGE.  The lanai is in the back which makes it extremely private.  It was truly like having another room.  The front door also has a screen door which allows for a cross draft with the tradewinds.  The pool and grills are essentially across the driveway.   The grounds are beautifully landscaped.  The complex is extremely quiet.  The location was perfect for walking to Ulua Beach, the shops at Wailea, Wailea Center and Monkey Pod. Tamara and Steve are lightning fast to respond.  Loved staying here.

name: Nice condo close to the subway
summary: Nice condo at the second floor, well equipped, two bedroom with queen size bed, size bathroom with a skyview, complet kitchen, heating floor.

reviews.txt: Propre , efficace hésiter pas pour réserver !
Pleasant and comfortable, Jason was helpful in providing all the help we needed in a timely fashion.
Excellent
Jason's place was perfect, spacious, updated and clean! Would gladly stay there again should my travels bring me back to Montreal!
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Highly recommend this place, super luxurious feel with an excellent host! Would definitely do it again!
L'appartement est bien situé, il est propre et très fonctionnel, on y dort sur nos 2 oreilles!
Everything is just great! Perfect condo!

rapport qualité prix super !
Propreté impeccable du lieu
Endroit très tranquille situé à 5 minutes du metro !
Je vous recommande vivement cet appartement !

The location of the apartment is very convenient, there is a metro station very close to it.  The  apartment in general is comfortable, the kitchen and the bathroom are very nice! Jason answers your questions immediately, we had a great time in Montreal !

Great place! Loads of space! Free parking! Decent price!
Was a short walk to the metro, so getting to mont Royal and the old town was easy. Comfortable place to stay.
Only suggestion would be to get and groceries before you arrive as there isn't a supermarket close by.

Jason was super nice from the beginning! He answered all of my phone calls every time I had doubts with the housing. He was able to help me out and even tell me nice suggestions of where to go in Montreal.

Jason's place was great. The space is very large and the bathroom and kitchen were fabulous and well equipped. Very modern and recently updated. Ample storage space for your belongings and the area was away from traffic. Jason provided check in details in a timely manner. Would stay again.

Fantastic place, very comfortable. Very true to the pictures. Neighborhood typical and beautiful, only about a 15 minute drive from downtown and closer to other neighborhoods like Little Italy and Mile End.
Thanks Jason.
Comfy beds, great shower and lots of room and closet space.  Would recommend this place.   Neigbourhood is quiet.

Jason is an awesome host. Supportive and clear with communication. The place is close to transit and well equipped!! Much better than the presentation in photos!! 
We really appreciate his generosity!!
Great place would stay again
Apartamento amplo, bem decorado, belo banheiro com 2 pias e chuveiro fantástico, ótima cozinha. Bairro residencial, alguns minutos de caminhada até o metrô.
Nice place! Everything is clean! Near to the Subway & another buses! The grocery store is near to the place! The department has a lot of helpful services.

name: Cozy Hell's Kitchen Apt
summary: 1 bedroom Apt in Hell's Kitchen/Midtown West area . Close to Broadway Theaters & Times Sq. Walk to Central Park or West Side Highway . Apt faces the building courtyard which makes it quiet & serine. It's a small apartment adequate for solo, business travelers, or couples. There is no elevator, the apartment is located on the 4th floor ( must climb stairs)The building was built in 1920.

host.location: New York, New York, United States

reviews.txt: The apt is wonderfully quiet and serine even though it's in the middle of a vibrant, bustling, hip location since it is located facing an inner courtyard.  The only sounds beside the soft murmur of the city was the occasional wail of a distant siren. The apt is very small but adequate for a couple. There is no elevator.  We loved Tiger, the cat, and he kept to  himself, but some visitors may be allergic to cats. Karen was very solicitous and kind. The bagels were a treat. The restaurant scene, two-blocks away, is world-class, whether expensive or inexpensive, great value: wonderful places to eat, drink and walk. Theater district is right there. We will definitely return...

Karen was a gratuitous host!  We had everything we needed for our weekend in the city!   Room was exactly what we needed to catch the Global Citizens festival in Central Park concerts on Saturday and Eddie Vedder at the Beacon theater on Sunday...  Great places to eat near by!  TV in bedroom had access to Hulu and Netflix, which was great because like to sleep in and watch TV in the mornings... Will repeat again!   Thanks for everything Karen!!!!
Karen was very welcoming. Her apartment is in a quieter part of the city which was nice and only a short walk from all the main action.

Karen was extremely helpful, and her place, though very small and tight, was quite comfy. I just have to remind myself that this is Manhattan and not some sort of 5star hotel, space is limited and everything was developed hundreds years ago, so didn't expect anything out of ordinary NY living.  Karen is a GREAT host! She made sure me and my wife had everything we needed and practicality had the entire place to ourselves.  Thank you for allowing us to crash at ur place Karen! :)
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The location is great, walking distance to Time Square, the bed is cozy. Karen was helpful and kind.

This apartment is in a great location.  Just outside of the hustle and bustle of the middle of the city, but close enough to be able to walk anywhere and everywhere with ease!  Just a few blocks away from the public running path along the Hudson, which will take you up to Central Park, made this location a plus for me, being an active runner.  Karen is a great hostess and I would recommend this location to anyone looking to stay in NYC!

Karen's place was very cozy and cute, perfect for our short stay. There are essentially two rooms, a kitchen/dining and a bedroom, which was fine us. The place was clean and well kept. The bedroom contains a TV with Netflix and other apps, which was plus.  Karen was kind enough to provide plenty of bottled water and even bought us cereal and milk. She was also very communicative and quick to answer any of my questions. Though it was not awfully close to the subway, you are a 15 min walk to times square. Overall, lovely stay and a friendly host.

Great location, walking distance to bars and restaurants in Hell's Kitchen and near to Central Park and Times Square. Simple apartment with everything you need. A great place to stay for a weekend city break!
great location, cosy place

Karen was so fine always answer and she is helpful
It's was nice to stay in her house everything was so close (central park ,Times Square)

Exactly as advertised. Karen was wonderfully responsive and helpful with any questions I had. There was a little work being done during the day in the building (or in the neighboring one), but as I was out for most of my  time in NYC, it wasn't a problem.  

While it was noted, I totally missed the fact that there was  a resident cat in the apartment's description (note to those who are allergic), but he kept to himself and didn't shed as far as I noticed:) Karen left me her entire apartment, which was wonderful! 

I definitely recommend Karen's place to those who want a quiet night, about a 12-15min walk from Times Square:)

This was my wife and I's very first Air Bnb experience and it was the best outcome we could have hoped for. Karen was helpful from the moment we asked to stay in her place, to even after we left as she returned something we forgot. Her place was extremely clean and cozy, and has a really friendly cat who only comes around every now and then. The bed was so comfortable .. lol. The area is perfect, you can literally go up one block and you're on a street with so many restaurants. (5 Napkin Burger is amazing. Otto's Tacos are perfect for a late night snack.) Central Park and Times Square were only about a 15-20 minute walk, and the surrounding streets were really quiet. I highly recommend this place to anyone looking for a short, comfortable, fun  and inexpensive NYC stay. Thank you for everything Karen, you're a great host.
The apartment is in a very convenient spot, easily walkable to restaurants and public transportation. It was clean and cozy. Karen was also communicative, with a straightforward check-in/out process.
Great place and great value
Nice stay

Karen's place was perfect for a trip to the city. Within walking distance to Times Square and other tourist attractions. Karen's place was very clean and was very accommodating to our needs. Would definitely recommend!

Karen was very communicative and flexible throughout the checkin process. The apartment is very cozy and in an absolutely amazing location. It was perfect for my boyfriend and I and I would love to stay here again next time I'm in the city!

Karen cozy place is perfect place to stay If you want to visit all the touristy areas in NY everything is walkable ! We walked the whole time we stayed there! Tiger is such a friendly cat couldn't get enough of him !

My stay at Karen's was perfect, it was just what I was looking for. Here place was close to everything. I was able to walk to Time Square, Rockefeller plaza and the Intrepid Museum. Here place is also close to Subway location for further locations. The place was clean and Karen made the whole process from check in to checking  out very easy. I would definitely recommend her place.

name: Spacious, bright, central. AC. Rambla Catalunya
summary: Spacious bright and stylish 4-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment in the very central Eixample area, ideal for seeing the whole city. Reception open daily 9AM - 10PM with large terrace for all guests. Wi-Fi, satellite TV and well-equipped kitchen. The apartment is spacious and full of natural light. The double glazing keeps it nice and quiet. Modern decor, comfortable furnishings, wooden floor. The living room has 2 balconies onto a lively street. 3 bedrooms look onto an inner terrace.

host.about:
I live in Barcelona, a city that has captivated me from the start for its culture, history and beauty. I work as a full-time host for Aspasios and couldn’t think of a better job: at Aspasios we love to make our guests feel at home. A big part of our job is listening carefully to our visitors: we learn so much from them every day. We enjoy meeting each and every person who comes to stay with us, and want them to come back because of us. We pride ourselves on being professional and friendly at the same time. At Aspasios, we are passionate about hospitality.

My colleagues Jesus, Vanessa, Yenai, Paola and I are always on hand to help you make the most of your trip to Barcelona. We know this lovely city inside out, so can recommend plenty of restaurants, bars and activities that you might not find in the guide books!

reviews.txt: The place is absolutely amazing. It was very spacious and it was in the perfect location to everything. Wouldn't have wanted to stay anywhere else.
This place was so amazing! Superb location and was very big, spacious and beautiful!

Great place for families, big, really spacious. Also for a business group, as it has many places for privacy and group meeting at the living room. Location is extraordinary!! Everything you can need is in less than 100 meters. Great hospitality.

This is an amazing apartment.  Spacious, clean and tidy and most importantly to us, very quiet considering it is in one of the busiest areas.  Two minutes walk from the metro station that goes to the airport.  Lockers for left luggage.  What more could you wish for.

name: Small Room w Bathroom Flamengo Rio de Janeiro
summary: Small room! It's a backdoor bedroom that it has its own bathroom for better privacy and also there is an equipped kitchen for you to use. Our apartment is very close to the subway, so in 10min you arrive in Copacabana and 15min in Ipanema.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Fernanda propose deux chambres. J'étais dans la plus petite, une chambre de service. En fait une cabine. Mais c'était les JO, c'était central, je ne voulais pas payer cher... Et j'avais ma propre salle demain

name: Great studio opp. Narrabeen Lake
summary: Great studio apartment freshly painted and decorated.  Queen bed also with a pull-out sofa bed  Separate bathroom with fully equipped laundry.  Located across from Narrabeen Lake.  8km walk around lake - or borrow our bikes. Kayak/stand-up paddle boards available for hire. Short walk to Narrabeen beaches/Woollies/shops and main bus line to the city on Pittwater Road. 20 minutes to Manly and Manly wharf or take a stunning ferry ride to Sydney city or the new express B-line double-decker bus.

reviews.txt: Very happy with my stay here. Tracy was really friendly and everything went smoothly. It's a great little place in a fantastic spot. The lake is sublime. Highly recommended.
Great welcome
This was a terrific studio, with every little detail considered. Beautiful location across from the lake and a very private studio. Made to feel very welcome by Tracey and would highly recommend!
Lovely place! Very friendly and accomodating

We enjoyed our stay at Tracy's house. It was spotlessly clean, and we loved swimming in her lovely pool.
It is located close to the beach, lakes and parks. So perfect for people who want to chill out and relax.
We also made a new friend with her Hungarian Vizsla dog.
Thank you for having us.

This is a fantastic situation. Located right across the street from the lake. Tracy offered us bicycles to use on the lake path. The apartment has everything you need and is very spacious. Short drive to the ocean beach for surfing and swimming. Kitchen well equipped. 
Tracy was very informative and engaging. 
We really enjoyed our stay!

This was my first time staying in an AirBnB, and it couldn't have been better. Lovely, clean and quiet accommodation, welcoming host and many little things that made the experience enjoyable. 

As an AirBnB newbie, I wasn't really sure on the protocols for communicating etc. However, Tracy made me feel relaxed and at home. She has a gorgeous, friendly dog and the place is immaculate - she had also left some fresh fruit, juice and water which was super-welcome after arriving on a fairly late flight. All the linens, towels etc were of high quality, and the shower is fantastic!  No air-con, but it's a shady spot and the fan was fine, even on two warm summer evenings.

If you are in Narrabeen to stay for any length of time, I can highly recommend this as your perfect home away from home.
Tracy and her husband were very welcoming and the room was very comfortable.

This was my first AirBnB experience and I am glad it was a good one. I couldn't have picked a better host and apartment.
Tracy and her family are great hosts. 
The space was as described - the bed was comfy and the pool area was very relaxing. Could have stayed by the pool all day! 
There was a lovely selection of teas and some Orange Juice and fruit. While I didn't use much of the kitchen utensils - looked like there was everything you needed to make a nice meal if you were staying longer or wanted to cook.
The location is beautiful - easy to walk by Narrabeen lake. Tracy was very flexible and welcoming and easy to communicate with. A very easy experience overall.

Perfect studio for a beachy getaway. Went away with the girlfriend and was well suited for a couple. The studio had everything you could need. Had foxtel with IQ which was was a supprise. Was close enough to walk to the beach or pub. Quick to respond to questions. Nothing to fault!

Thank you Tracy.  We had a most enjoyable stay. You live in a beautiful area with great access to the lake, the surf, public transport and all the wonderful facilities of Narrabeen.  The apartment is neat, clean and well appointed . We especially enjoyed eating our breakfast on the balcony while enjoying views of the lake and the beautiful tropical garden.  A great stay, thank you
Absolutely perfect! Great location opposite the lake, bikes to borrow and Tracy went out of her way to accommodate me! Thank-you, I loved it.
My in laws had a pleasant stay. The place was clean, well equipped, has really comfy bed. Thanks.

The place was gorgeous, Tracy was so helpful and brought me down a blanket when I was cold. The area was lovely and in a very safe suburb. Everything you need was there and the bed and couch were super comfy. Thanks Tracy!

Really enjoyed our stay- the place was lovely and close to the lake, which we went for a walk around following the track-8k walk in total.Couple of restaurants and cafes near by. We had a hire car so ideal Location for us to explore all the northern beaches and near by Dee why. Tracey was friendly and thoughtful sending through a wonderful recommendation to a place in Newport for dinner/drinks when we were passing through the area!
Great trip

Had another lovely and relaxing stay. Everything I needed was there and Tracy even thought to put an extra blanket in my bed before I came to make sure I was warm during the night. Had a lovely walk along the lake and was close to everything I needed. Thanks again Tracy!

Great Studio, perfect location, had everything we needed. Tracy was lovely, really welcoming. The directions were great, it was easy to find. Would certainly look to book if we ever needed to stay in the area again.

Fantastic apartment in beautiful Narrabeen. We stayed here while moving out of our nearby apartment and it was perfect. had everything you would need for a fantastic holiday stay just footsteps from the lake. Quiet spot and very private and inside was clean modern and well equipped. Tracy was really easy to communicate with and a great host :) we would definitely stay again.

Tracy and Rod were brilliant hosts and pre-trip and during my stay made sure I had everything I needed. The apartment was fantastic and had everything I needed. Wonderful location and completely private. Would stay there again!

Tracy is a great host, very accomodating and friendly! This place is amazing, your own one bedroom apartment, right across from Narrabeen lake and 10 minute walk to Narrabeen beach and shops. It has everything you need to stay in with a kitchenette, lounge area, heater and extra blankets, even wifi and foxtel! Thanks for having us, we really enjoyed your place. It's perfection :)

name: Cruisy apartment by the sea
summary: Self-contained studio apartment 3 minute walk from the best beach in Sydney, Bungan Beach. Open plan, north facing, so very well lit by natural light. Warm in winter, cool in summer. Ocean view, veggie garden, backyard for picnics etc.

host.about: My name is Dean, I'm a musician who lives next to the ocean on the Northern Beaches of Sydney, Australia. I enjoy the company of genuine and unique people, the journeys and discoveries of adventuring, and the time I spend listening to and creating music.

reviews.txt: When we first arrived Leslie and Roy made us feel very welcome, explaining everything in detail so we had a really relaxed and smooth stay without any issues. Excellent access to the beach and local shops, highly recommended.

The hosts were absolutely amazing - dean's place is a perfect studio and everything exactly as promised in the listing. The communication was impeccable and everything was like new. Personally thought it was a little expensive but as long as the price is suitable for you, you can't go wrong with staying here. Honestly one of the best Airbnb's I've stayed at - the cleanliness, the treatment and communication from the hosts, the overall ambience of the place and the facilities offered - honestly fantastic.

name: Little New York on Riley - 1BR Darlinghurst
summary: With the CBD within walking distance, this brand new, fully self-contained 1BR apartment is the perfect choice for executives or holiday makers. Stylishly decked out and fully equipped, this is Sydney apartment accommodation at its finest. Please note, this is a duplicate listing, set up to attract longer bookings with weekly and monthly discounts.

host.about: We live in Sydney and run an executive accommodation business in Sydney and Brisbane. All our apartments are located in high-demand inner-city locations, a short distance from the CBD. Whether you’re on a business trip or vacation for a few days, or are after a longer stay due to relocating or home renovations, we have executive accommodation to suit your needs. Our apartments offer everything you require for a short-term or long-term stay. All our apartments are fully furnished and have a fully equipped kitchen (complete with all kitchenware), a washing machine and dryer, a brand new flatscreen tv and a Nespresso coffee machine, along with an initial supply of capsules for you to enjoy. We provide linen and towels, platinum Foxtel (cable tv) access and free wifi in every apartment. We pride ourselves on our customer service, ensuring that your stay is a uniquely positive experience. We encourage guests to provide feedback, and regularly update our apartments and services based on your recommendations. We look forward to having you to stay and aim to ensure you keep coming back.

reviews.txt: The location was very convenient, and the apartment was clean and new - perfect for my girlfriend and I. My only issue was that the sink was quite small, which made rinsing plates, pots and pans quite difficult before putting them in the dishwasher. Overall, it was a great stay, and dealing with Nicki before the stay was a pleasure. Recommended for someone who wants to stay within walking distance to the city.
Unit was amazing, a few small issues here and there but otherwise very well thought out and beautiful home. Would stay again.

Nice flat, centrally located in an elevator building. It was very easy to check in and get settled. I stayed for 3 nights while traveling for business and the listing was a great base camp in the city where I could catch up on work and sleep. Sydney was experiencing a heatwave that week and I was very thankful for the air conditioning.

Nicki and Dave are great hosts! They always responded me in a swift manner with good solutions to all of my minor issues (including the early arrival, coffee machine repair, cleaning service question and light bulb request). 
I liked the apartment very much. It was convenient to do anything in the city and quiet and comfortable to sleep at night. To highlight the convenience, I want to note that the nearest supermarket is just one or two blocks away (to the north) and pubs and restaurants are also a block away (to the south). Some may worry about bugs at such location, but during my 40-day stay, I did not have any bug issues. 
The only possible setbacks I can think of are the tiny kitchen sink and occasional odor from outside. 
The kitchen sink is certainly small although this place has a dishwasher. So, for a short stay and people who do not cook very much will not have any problems. However, if you want to do dishes during your stay, you will probably find the sink space cramped. 
The outside smell was very occasional during my stay in a rainy summer (I think it was related to the weather). When I noticed the weird smell, I just needed to close the windows to shut it out. The AC works very well. So, it was not a big deal for me to do so. 
Overall, I am happy with the values and qualities I got here, and I would highly recommend this place to anybody who wants to enjoy the city activities and have good rests in the same time.

Unfortunately very disappointed with the overall listing description which does not accurately reflect any similarities to the actual apartment at all.. 'Uptown' property management state that they offer PLATNIUM Foxtel in all their properties - in this case; the Foxtel box was present but the network connection was not. We could not even manage to watch starred TV.. & it was more frustrating to also realise that most of the Foxtel channels were not subscribed to, therefore there isn't anything PLATNIUM about this packgage! This is not a 1br, it is an older style, but externally refurbished block, there was no room to move & even if we did get the TV working, there was no chance of watching it due to the dining setting blocking the view. Please update the listing description :(
Great location, great place, felt really comfortable here. Would recommend to anyone staying in town for a few days

The check-in was really easy, a big relief as we arrived late at night. Extremely clean and had all the kitchen facilities, washer, dryer, big table (used as our working desk), big long sofa (easily converted to an extra bed for a tall person). The bed was a bit too soft for my preference and I had body ache the next mornings. Not a problem as we are sports masseurs. Other than this, the stay was great.

Very modern apartment in a great location.  It's particularly convenient to Oxford St.  Lots of cute local restaurants in the area.  Easy to walk to the wharf, downtown, botanical gardens, and opera house.  The owners were immediately responsive when I had a question at check in.  Definitely recommend this apartment.

The apartment was great overall. Fantastic location in Darlinghurst, right off of Williams St, a 10 minute walk to Town Hall station. 5 minutes to Hyde Park and 10 minutes to King's Cross. The studio is very well designed, with a nice large living area and floor to ceiling windows. The furniture could use an upgrade, as the chairs are a bit shabby, but they do the job.
Fantastic location, 5 min walk to city and surrounded by cafes, restaurants and such. Apartment fit out was very new and nice.

name: Feel like home
summary: Comfortable studio apartment in the heart of downtown...  3 minutes walk to place des artes (metro station,Jazz festival,just for laughs festival,...)yet very quiet! very clean building. Everything u need is included!!Tv,fast internet;all possible stores in a few minutes walk.

reviews.txt: I had a lovely stay in Montreal. Titi's studio is cute, clean, cosy and warm. It is right by Place des Arts' tube station and it is close to a supermarket, shops, cafes, etc. The bus going to and from the airport stops just down the road, it is a 10 minutes straight walk. Titi was prompt to reply to my queries when booking the place and also remained available throughout my stay. Titi had left some space in the drawers so I could unpack and I had the fridge to put my week's supplies. It felt very homely. Wifi also worked very well. I will happily book  Titi's place again should I go back to Montreal.

Our host was excellent and very accommodating.  She and a friend met us to let us in and give us the keys fairly late which was very much appreciated. The location is awesome, the decor super cute. Everything you need is here! Towels, wifi password, everything was easily accessible. Thanks so much! We will stay here again for sure.

I had a great time in Montreal and it was compounded by this awesome corner unit apartment that was conveniently close to a lot of the main hubs of Montreal. It's 2 blocks away from the Metro and less than a mile walking distance from most places as well.  The apartment overall was very cozy, well heated during my winter stay and neighbors are very quiet. Would definitely recommend.

Excellent accueil, Titi est très arrangeant. Je me suis réellement sentie à la maison. Je recommande ! Et location excellente, plein de bons restaurants à proximité, on peut tout faire à pied, très proche du centre ville. In love !!!

Our experience was great. The apartment is small but very cozy and located in a great area. There were so many great places to grab a drink, eat, and even shop. Without a doubt, I would stay here again.
Titi was very welcoming and so incredibly helpful during my stay. Loved the place and location. I Would definitely stay there again.

Titi's apartment was just perfect for our weekend trip to Montreal! The location was fabulous, with amazing restaurants and 2 natural food stores within blocks, and downtown right there. Titi was so helpful! We needed to switch places, and with less than 24 hours notice she made it work for us to stay there. She was friendly and welcoming, and was timely with responses to our questions. Her place was inviting, bright and cozy. Everything was clean, parking tended to be pretty easy (although confusing in Montreal!), and the kitchen was stocked enough for us to cook up quick meals. The bed was a full sized futon-like bed, which was comfy yet pretty firm. Overall, a great place to stay! We will definitely be back. Thank you Titi!

The location is just perfect - in the center of EVERYTHING! The apartment is very cosy, charmingly decorated, and has a little balcony looking out to a beautiful street. Titi is very nice, responsive and helpful. Thank you so much Titi, I had a wonderful stay and would love to go back :)
Titi's apartment makes for a very genuine Airbnb experience. It was very nice to get to spend a couple of days in her environment. :)
Hôte sympathique et bel appartement, très bien situé.

Titi was extremely nice, her apartment is beautiful! It is small, but perfect for a city trip, we walked to all major city attractions (about a 30 min walk to old Montreal) and it's a nice neighborhood. Titi was very approachable to us!

We loved staying at Titi's. She was very understanding about us arriving later than expected, and when we did arrive she even came out to help us find a parking spot. Her apartment is clean, beautifully decorated, and has everything you need for an enjoyable stay. The location of the neighborhood is perfect. It is quaint and residential but very close to everything you need. Just a few short blocks to the metro gives you acces to the full city. Also within walking distance is the park and shopping streets like Saint Laurant. Titi was available for anything that we needed, and always responded promptly. Thank you, Titi, for the wonderful hospitality! We would love to stay again in the future.
Wonderful location and comfortable place for our visit to Montreal! So easy to walk wherever you need to go from this place. Great balcony and relaxing apartment. Highly recommend!

The experience was very comfortable and Titi's little apartment is cozy with bright, welcoming colours. The place is basically a 5 minute walk from downtown, and parking was not too difficult to find either. We had access to wifi and the tv monitor which I easily connected to my computer with an HDMI. Titi was always there, a call away, if we had any questions. Although we weren't able to see her during check-in because we arrived quite late in the evening, she had turned on the AC and a fan so that we would have a cool room in the heat of the summer. Also, there's a lovely balcony which is a nice addition if you're visiting during the spring or summer.
Had a great visit in Montreal. Titi's place was clean, comfortable, and was in a great location. Meeting up to get the key was easy. I'd recommend her place for sure.

Had no problems checking in or checking out, Titi was around and fast at responding to any questions. The apartment was in a great location within walking distance to most of the places we wanted to go. The room was comfortable and neat/tidy. Wifi was fast.

Thanks again!
Nice location, good apartment.

Titi was a fantastic host! She was kind, helpful and very friendly. We loved the decor of this apartment, and especially enjoyed the little balcony. The location however was UNBEATABLE. Very close to Mount Royal Park, Parc avenue, St. Laurent Street and a close Bixi bike ride to Old Montreal and Jean Talon Market. We had a fantastic stay and would absolutely come back and stay at Titi's place again, 5-stars!

My girlfriend and I had a fantastic stay at Titi's apartment. It was in a perfect location, close walking distance to almost all the wonderful parts of Montreal. She was extremely hospitable when it came to us bringing along our dog too which made the trip so much easier for us. The apartment itself was very clean and comfortable. Would highly recommend it to anyone heading to Montreal!

Great location. Walking distance to many of the sights in Montreal. Also a very short walk to a metro station. Restaurants, cafés, and grocery stores nearby as well. Overall, enjoyed my stay at the apartment.

name: East Village Living
summary: Welcome to my little oasis in the heart of NYC's vibrate east village.  You'll have the city at your finger tips.  Walking distance to some of the most popular bars, restaurants, and shops!  My studio apt is newly renovated!  Enjoy a queen size Tempurpedic bed accompanied with modern Bo Concept and West Elm decor.  There's plenty of space to unpack and unwind.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: I enjoy traveling and experiencing new things. I'll try anything twice!

reviews.txt: The host canceled this reservation 34 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Erica's East Village studio is great. The apartment is very nicely decorated, exactly as pictured, with lush amenities and a comfortable layout. Neighborhood is cool for exploring. As a host, Erica is top notch. She's proactive, genuinely helpful and gracious. She went above and beyond before, during and even after our stay---mailing something I'd left behind back to me so promptly, I didn't even have a chance to realize I'd left it behind! Def. recommend.

Erica was fantastic and very helpful! She provided a lot of information before we arrived and was very helpful with the checkin process!

The apartment is great and exactly like the photos. Very cute apartment in a great neighborhood. Erica provided a lot of great suggestions for restaurants and things to do in the neighborhood.

Erica's place is adorable. It's actually perfect for a New York apartment. Very clean, comfortable, & in a super accessible location! Erica herself is so sweet and loving. I was fortunate enough to meet her and found her to have a wonderful honest energy. I definitely recommend Erica as a host!
Very cute place.  Host was really responsive and nice.  Definitely recommend this place!

The apartment was wonderful.  The bed is super comfortable, and the apartments' location is fantastic.  The only thing I wasn't expecting was, there were no towels.  I never contacted Erica to let her know or ask her where they were because we had a packed schedule.  So there might actually be towels.  But other than that, my boyfriend and I LOVED the apartment.

Expérience incroyable !!!!! Erica s'est rendu disponible à tout moments pour répondre à nos questions. Elle nous a mis à l'aise dès le début. 
Elle nous a également conseillé de très bonnes adresses de restos et de boutiques de prêt à porter originales près de l'appart. Tout est à proximité. C'est un quartier qui bouge, un quartier d'artistes.
On a passé un merveilleux séjour.
Sans hésitation je recommande cette endroit et j'espère y revenir très bientôt:)
Merci à toi Erica pour cette incroyable accueil :)

Erica's studio was great! Perfect location within walking distance to many restaurants and bars, as well as a subway stop. The place was comfortable and exactly as described. Erica was also quick with her responses and catered to anything we needed. Definitely recommend her place for anyone looking to stay in a prime location for Manhattan.

Had a great experience with Erica and her place.  Extremely responsive and made the whole process extremely seamless.  Her place is in a great location - it is noisy outside on the road but it is NYC so to be expected!
Erica was a fantastic communicator and her apartment is beautiful, clean, comfy!  I would absolutely stay here again when I need a place in the East Village.
Erica was very responsive and her apartment is very clean, cosy and comfortable, great location. Instructions for check in process were perfect and easy! I recommand this place! Many thanks Erica

We loved our stay in Erica's apartment! The listing is exactly how the apartment is. We felt comfortable in her place and it was clean. For a NYC apartment it felt very nice. Erica does a good job of making her space as efficient as possible and provides all of the necessities to stay. The location is great. Close to coffee shops, subway lines and fun neighborhoods and shopping. The process for getting keys couldn't be easier. Highly recommended! Thanks Erica!

Erica's place was a wonderful homebase for my New York City vacation.  A cute apartment with a very comfortable bed, it was located conveniently both for walking adventures & for access to the subway.

we had a wonderfull stay in Erica's place for 7 days in New Year's time!
The apartment is nice and cosy and super well located to enjoy the big City in the best way!
Great restaurant and bar also in the neighborhood!
The only little inconvenience we found is the low pressure in the shower (a little hard for women with long hair ;-)) but everything else was perfect so you'll fast forget it!
we didn't get the chance to meet Erica but everything was perfectly planned for our coming and Erica was more than ever there for us to answer our questions by email even if she was at the other end of the world! 
Don't hesitate and come, you won't regret it!

Beautiful small space in a recently renovated building. Wonderful location. Clean. Erica was very attentive and accommodating host! Would definitely stay here again. Close to everything in the heart of the East Village.

Erica has a beautiful apartment. I had a great time and if I decide to come back to NYC again in future, I know exactly where I will staying! :) I specially liked an amazing list of restaurants and places to go nearby complied by Erica. It helped me so much and saved so much time for me. I absolutely loved Erica's apartment. Its a great location, beautiful decor, clean and comfortable in all aspects. 
Erica was incredibly helpful.
Rekha
Erica has a lovely home in a great location. Communication was great and everything went smoothly. Thanks again Erica!

Erica's place was great!
It was super clean, cozy and in a great location.
On top of that, she was available to answer any questions that we may have had.

El departamento de Erica es hermoso. Muy bien ubicado y cómodo!
La comunicación con ella fue excelente desde el momento en que reservamos el lugar, siempre atenta.

Simply great, safely and strategically situated, comfortable and very sweet home.
Erica is a lovely person.

name: Privately Gated Oceanfront Estate
summary: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). A Piece of Maui Paradise HAWAII TAX ID is #W(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) We do not rent for weddings or large gatherings but we are happy to make suggestions to our booked guests (URL HIDDEN)

reviews.txt: Amazing property.  Could not be happier with this stay.  The house is beautiful, the surrounding front and back outdoor area is very spacious, interior is tastefully decorated, and the ocean is just yards away.  This was a perfect stay for our 2 yr old daughter who had lots of room to run around and absolutely loved the outside trampoline. The location is central to driving to Kihei, Lahaina, Paia or Kahalui. One of the best places my family has stayed.  There are charming ducks and chickens roaming around on the property - the only slight downside was the great amount of duck poop on the porch every morning but it was an easy cleanup with the outside hose.  It was a small thing compared to our wonderful stay.

Despite the fact that there is not that much in the walking distance (yes, there is a beach and some small stores), this location is a great one as you are in the central position of the island and nothing is more than 20 minutes away. Property itself looks even better than in the pictures and it is quite large. House is very nice and you will probably find everything you need even though if you plan to cook every day you might be somewhat limited. Biggest problem we encountered is something that looked cool at the beginning - ducks walking around the property. They would constantly poop at the front deck and the deck would quickly become disgusting and unusable. Even if you wash it out with the hose, it will take them no time to make the mess again. However, somehow they decided to leave the back (ocean side) deck alone so we were able to truly enjoy the beautiful view.  I would recommend the place to couples or families with older children - not babies or small kids as the bedrooms are awkwardly placed (one is right at the entrance door) so you have to walk through the whole house to get to second bedroom. The host vas very helpful and responded quickly to all our questions.
Awesome place! Rented as two couples and had a blast.

This house is amazing. The view, style and amenities suited our family of four for relaxation, cooking, and fun. All in a great location. The Ma'alaea General Store nearby, which Kristine also owns, is a great stop for food, smoothies and basic supplies. The only downside is the duck poop on the front porch, but everything else well made up for that small detail. We had a great time and would do it again.
Absolutely beautiful property.   Even on an extremely cold and stormy day, the house was a beautiful place to relax.  Communication with Kristine was great.  We had a wonderful stay.

A beautiful quiet and relaxing home away from the crowds and walking distance to the beach. A perfect home for our family of 4.  We all enjoyed the in ground trampoline, the resident ducks, and the turtles swimming along the shore. We hope to return soon! ❤️

The home is perfect, exactly what I dreamed of from every aspect. Central location, right on the water, great areas to hang out from hammocks to daybeds to loungers and couches. Incredible open kitchen has everything a chef needs with a great floor plan that keeps you part of the action in the house and still connected to the ocean. 
The bedding was exquisitely comfortable, especially with the sound of the oceans outside the window.
Very tastefully decorated with old and new, laid back and luxury touches. The outdoor direct entryway to the shower is a genius idea. 

We will be back!

This home is spectacular in every way. The view, the space, the amenities and surprises, the proximity to attractions, the privacy, and the adorable ducks! We saw sea turtles from the bay right in the backyard. We snorkeled, kayaked, grilled out, relaxed in the hot tub (we also rented the guest house on the property) and hammocks, and cooked in the gourmet kitchen. It was heartbreaking to leave. Many great memories were made! Thanks Kristine!

Elegant.
Tranquil.
Little piece of heaven.
This home is a must stay for for anyone thinking about traveling during whale watching season. We saw tons of whales in the bay. Great location too close drive to the airport as while as many other must see sights.
Waking up to watch the sunrise every morning with tea on the deck overlooking the ocean was the most wonderful highlight of our stay here.
You will be greeted by the birds on the property every morning they are so friendly and will come right up to you.
Kristine is an amazing and thoughtful host they have thought of everything and have a binder filled with info about the house places to visit and places to eat be sure to look thru it because it sent us some amazing places we never would have thought about otherwise.
There are tons of amenities for the water on the back deck, a cooler cane in handed for day trips to the beach, aloe and aftersun lotion for those sunburn recovery days, all bathroom amenities you could ever need of vacation. The bed were so cozy and bathrooms were pristine. This is one of the best and most accurate Airbnb ever and I highly recommend staying here. 
To put a little icing on the cake communication with our host was prompt and very helpful they really want your stay to be the best possible!

This place was amaxing!! My fiancee and I had the pleasure of staying here for our enganment. From the fresh flowers to the extremely accomadating host Kristine, this experience could not have been better. Everything was truly perfect!

Great place, very beautiful home. I really loved hanging bad outside of the house. Home has ducks and chickens, my girlfriend had great time feeding them. Location is great as well. Very good house, amazing ocean view. Great place!
This house is a wonderful place to experience the luxury Maui life.

One of the most beautiful places I have ever stayed - the location is perfect, with the beach 2 mins away and turtles feeding in the water right next to the property!

The house itself is stunning, with lots of little extra touches like sunscreen and snorkel gear and kayaks available to borrow. Oh and there are adorable pet ducks and a trampoline!! A truly idyllic location for a vacation.
One of the most beautiful homes and locations. I’d definitely recommend this for anyone visiting Maui. Very classy and picturesque.
This was an amazing place to stay. Pictures do not do justice, you have to be there!!! We will definitely stay here again. It is a 5+ star for sure.
This house is beautiful.  The pictures are accurate.  The place looks even better in person.  We enjoyed every minute of our stay in paradise and are planning to go again in the future.
This place is flawless really offering an amazing experience that only supplements the beauty of Maui! Came here for our honeymoon and we can't wait to be back again!
We had an excellent stay.  The photographs were accurate and Kristine was very responsive to our questions and requests.  Highly recommend.

The view, the house and the surrounding property is truly beautiful. In addition to the view, we also loved the large yard with lush green grass, beautiful tropical plants & trees, a bunch of large hammocks on the property and a huge trampoline to play with. The ducks and chickens were a fun addition to the property (though they did poop all over the entryway). 

Unfortunately, there were some difficulties that were hard to overlook particularly at this price point. The general house cleanliness was quite poor.. floors were super dusty and needed a good mopping. Some of the kitchenware had crusty dust or rust on them. Other things were broken.. kitchen/scissors/blenders/glassware/kitchen gas downdraft. Also, only the living room ac worked, the bedrooms got rather hot. We really weren't expecting these issues at this price point hence the 3* review. 

The house had a lot of geckos. We expected these outside or on the deck- but we spotted these just about everywhere you don't want to see one... in the bathroom, on our towels, on our clothes, on the chair, on the bed.

This place is heaven!   We stayed for 9 days and I think it may be my favorite place to stay ever.  The place is so much better than the pictures.   You can jump in the water if you walk down the rocks and we used the kayaks.   The outside bed is amazing and the upstairs sun deck is cool.  The location is good- the town is meh (no good restaurants), but you are right in the middle of Kihei and Wailea- both are 15 minutes away.  The kitchen is perfect for cooking and is well stocked.  It says it has a hot tub and it does, but it is attached to the other unit on the property and we felt weird as their outdoor shower is right there.  I was concerned about the other unit on the property as we didn’t rent it, but we never saw anyone (just their car)- and it is a huge property so you don’t even realize it is there.  

Honestly if you are looking for a beautiful home right on the water- this place is more than perfect.

name: Clarence House Apartment 1
summary: My place is fantastic for couples, solo adventurers and business travellers.

host.about:
Joanne – I’ve always loved to travel and even though my three boys now keep me closer to my home in Sydney’s Inner West, I take every opportunity to enjoy family holidays in apartments and houses booked online throughout Australia and New Zealand.

Ali – I’ve been living in the Blue Mountains since 1993, so I could be called a local! This means I have a wealth of knowledge about this amazing part of Australia that I have decided to call home. It also means that I have the opportunity to stay in some of the most beautiful and unique houses in the world.

reviews.txt: Joanna and Ali's place is nicely located in the CBD and close to anything you need. The home is neatly kept and well presented. My interstate guest enjoyed the stay and any issue that came up was quickly looked after.
El apartamento es amplio y está muy bien ubicado ya que está en el centro, además tiene una parada de tren a 3 minutos caminando.
Really nice apartment with an excellent location in Sydney, I totally recommend it! Also Joanne and Ali are really nice, as they solved all my questions really fast.

Location was excellent and perfect for the places I had to visit during my stay.  Apartment was clean and tidy with sufficient amenities.  7 Eleven across the road was convenient and Commonwealth bank on the corner was handy.  Couple of small issues but sorted with the Hosts.

A lovely little apartment! Comfy bed and everything that we needed for our stay in Sydney. This isn't flash - staying here is about location, not amenities. Super close (walking distance) to everything you might want to visit. Some slight issues with the shower and a little cramped - this is a place for two people for a couple of days maximum! We didn't meet Joanne and Ali but they were great arranging flexible options for our stay.

Very good location!
I just thought the place had an old smell that irritated my allergic nose. :( But may be just me...

The apartment is in a great location. It  does not have wifi and as I was spending two week for work it was an inconvenience so do bare this in mind. I tried to contact the hosts about this and did not get a reply from them. After an issue a week later to do with cleanliness Rob their property manager did reply to me and was very kind in offering me a meal for free for the inconvenience and got a cleaner to come in. 
A nice apartment on the whole which  just needs some TLC.

It's a convenient one bedroom apt for one person, if you don't need wifi (which is rare and unbelievable), neither a long and relaxing hot bath (there's prob with hot water, I kept it low to avoid running out of hot water at the end of my shower), nor a quiet sleep in the morning (massive noise in the neighborhood due to tram construction). This apt is all about location in the city.

The place was spacious and comfortable but the best part about it is the location. It's in the center of town, making all the major destinations easily accessible. In addition, Ali and Joanne were very accommodating with our early check in. The amenities, however, were lacking. We were hoping to shower after our long flight but there were no bath towels when we arrived. I texted Ali and the towels were delivered while we were out for lunch. There was only one tube of shampoo and conditioner provided that were clearly taken from hotels. There was a bar of soap for bathing and it had obviously been used before. The previous things I can deal with, but for our 5 night stay for 2 people, there was only one and a half rolls of toilet paper. I texted Ali for toilet paper, shampoo, and soap twice, but received no response.

I loved the apartment, but it needs to be better stocked.
The host was very helpful, and all went smoothly.
We stayed here for a family of four. Fantastic location! Hot water pressure could have been stronger but otherwise it's fantastic accomodation for a short weekend away.
Great location,  clean and hosts very friendly.

Communication with the hosts was great and immediate. The apartment is very centrally located and within walking distance of all galleries, shops etc. Perfect for a couple or two friends happy to share a room.

Great place, central and quiet. The actual building is quite old, but the apartment itself is fine. Internet is provided in the form of a 4G dongle. All the cook wear was very useable. The hot water pressure is low, like some of the other guests have mentioned but overall useable.

The location is great, for both business travellers and tourists.
The place is easy to find, great location, very close to westfield and supermarket coles. But there is no shampoo and shower gel in the apartment.

This cozy apartment had everything we needed for our new years holiday in Sydney. All the main touristic spots are literally walking distance (Darling Harbour, Circular Quay, Sydney Town Hall, main shopping centres). When we needed to use the train, Wynyard Station was just a couple of blocks away. Savings time and money with this prime location was definitely a bonus.
The flat feels bigger than in the pictures. The building feels old but once you get inside the flat everything is well kept. The main bed and the sofa bed were comfy and with white crisp linens. Had plenty bath and face towels. Did not find a problem with the hot water pressure as previously stated (might have been fixed). There are washing and drying machines in perfect working condition. The bedroom has a ceiling fan that was enough to sleep, there were a couple of pretty hot nights outside but we only needed to turn on the aircon for a couple of hours and the entire flat would cool off. The kitchen has everything needed to prepare all meals.
Dealing with the host was also a pleasant experience. All the information requested was given in a straightforward manner without delay. 
Overall, a great experience! Highly recommended

The apartment is nice and perfect for city stays. 

My disappointment came when my 70yr old parents we kept awake all night from major reconstruction. Bins are also collected at 130am from outside the apartment. We were not told this was happening.

My mum recleaned on moving in. The dust on top of units and cupboard and under the bed was terrible. Expect a light clean and sheet change on arrival

My parents left 4 nights early and i moved onto my couch. 

No response when feedback was given after stay. 

I would recommend the apartment when Sydney tram works is complete in 2018.

My stay got of to a bumpy start as the room had not been prepare for my arrival, I assume there was a communication issue between the cleaner and the owner, but the owners rectified the problems the following day, and also offered $60 to cover a couple of meals for the inconvenience .

overall my stay was good and description and pictures where accurate, location was great, 5 mins walk to wynyard station,15 mins  to darling harbour & 3mins to woolies.
I may stay again and would ask for confirmation on the room been ready  before my arrival.

A great one week holiday in Sydney for 1st time ....... certainly not the last time, would come again to stay and will recommend to others! Very comfortable and well equipped should you wish to make your own break, lunch to dinner.
Great place to stay in. Clean and well equipped overall. Very near to darling harbour and to nearest train station.

name: ❤️SUPERHOST-Single Ensuite Room@ 1min MTR
summary: Newly-renovated Ensuite Single Bedroom is furnished with everything you need for a comfortable stay.  It is located at the heart of Kowloon; 1 minute walk to the Mongkok MTR station, 2 minutes to the airport bus station, and 3 mins to the “East Rail Line,” which will take you to Mainland China (Lo Wu and Futian) and the New Territories. Feel free to send me a message if you have any questions or requests. ★★★ Don't forget to add the listing in your Wishlist ★★★

host.about:
I have lived and worked at many places around the world and nothing enhance my experience more than a comfortable home away from home; somewhere I can work, study, relax and recharge. This is why I aim to make my place a clean, safe, comfortable and convenient home for you. 

You can expect arrive to a clean, well maintained and equipped accommodation, where you can settle in right away. 

My accommodations are strategically located at heart of the city; it is minutes to major transportation like MTR and buses stations, shops, restaurants and supermarkets etc., which makes living and commuting so much more effortless. 

My accommodations are fairly new and have mostly been under long term rental, hence the relatively few reviews; however, you can see more guests experience with other accommodations that I have.

reviews.txt: Located in the heart of Mongkok, extremely convenient. Jack was very nice and prompt with his responses. Would recommend you to stay here, if you are looking for a economical spot in HK.

I really like this place it's cosy clean and has all the things you need around the neighbourhood, including being very close to Mongkok MTR which makes commuting really convenient. Jack is also a really helpful host who will go out of the way to ensure your stay is comfortable. Definitely recommend this room and Jack's services!

Jack was a fantastic host! The place was great, cleaned regularly, and if I ever had a question or concern Jack would reply in mere minutes! He was hospitable, friendly, and made a genuine effort to make you feel welcome. Everything was efficient and made transitioning to Hong Kong a lot easier. Highly recommend having him as your next host!

Jack’s place is perfect. Not spacious as most HK rooms but contains everything you may need. The room is clean and new.
The location is perfect for shopping lovers. It is at the centre of Mongkok, a few steps to mall, food and MTR. However, totally avoid the noise of the street.
The flat is fully equipped with cooking, washing and drying facilities.
Very good living experience.
Jack was an amazing host! Great location - the heart of Mong Kok

name: INSTAGRAM HOME *MTR*ELEMENT MALL*NEW TRAIN KOWLOON
summary: Fresh eyes on Kowloon and Upper House!! That is the place from where you want to explore an always exciting Hong Kong on Kowloon side. Elements Mall is just a 4 mins walk over the safe pedestrian bridge- always a glamorous distraction far away from home.   *Book 5 nights of stay and get 1 night FREE*   Promo period ends on December 2018

host.about: New mother of a healthy baby boy who loves to travel around the world. Been mostly to Asia and planning to venture to other places like London, Paris, and Rome.

reviews.txt: 出入方便,房东沟通无缝对接｡

This is a nice condo in Kawloon area. There are plenty of bars and restaurants walking distance and a Welcome supermarket open 24 hours, just one block away.
The unit is nicely decorated and Jessa Marie was very kind and helpful during the booking proccess. Mrs. Via, who welcomed us, was always available, as well.
The only  things we missed were some closets, because the bedrooms are tiny and there are not closets, although Via kindly brought us some hangers that we could hang on the wall hooks.
Also, the second bathroom has not a "real shower": there is a hand shower but no glass closure, which means that you are using all the toilette as a shower. If you are many guests, you can count only on one shower which can be a little insuficient.
All in all, we had a nice stay. Thank you Jessa Marie
房子的地理位置非常不错,离柯士甸地铁站很近,在文英街的文辉楼｡就在住宅区有一个点点心餐厅,里面的餐点非常棒!离廟街夜市也非常的近,去迪士尼,尖沙咀等都很方便!房屋的装修很现代,三个卧室两个卫生间一个厨房,一个大厅,住起来很舒适,特别适合家庭旅游租住｡房屋主人很热情,待人很热情,唯一遗憾的是不会中文,倒也问题不大!希望我的评论能为要租住这个房屋的游客有帮助,推荐入住!

convenient location. close to jordan mtr station, monkon station and tsim tsha tsui station. clean and quiet. especially latex mattress was good and comfortable.
very satisfied for everything. 
i will come again.
Beautiful place and good location. 100% recommended

My parents-in-law, husband and I had a wonderful time at the apartment. It was great to have the space to relax at home when it was raining and to have access to two bathrooms. The location is wonderful, with lots of great hole-in-the-wall restaurants nearby (which offer some relief from Hong Kong's crazy prices!). If you stay here, be sure to check out Dim Dim Sum and the Biang Biang noodles at Yau Yuen Siu Tsui (a michelin guide restaurant just across the street from the apartment)-- the best noodles I've ever eaten. 

The apartment is small but nicely furnished. Very clean. One thing to note is that the small kitchen has a stovetop and microwave, but no oven. Perfect for cooking a simple breakfast, but not really set up to cook an elaborate meal.

I'd definitely recommend this apartment as a great place to stay in Hong Kong, especially if you're looking for a less touristy location.

Spacious and extremely conveniently located. Had everything that I needed, comfortable begs and linens. During the typhoon we've had some issues with the toilets not flushing and the AC not working (most likely user error) and Jessa and her team were extremely prompt with responding and sending someone over. Issues were resolved within hours!! Fantastic place to stay
房东肯定是个很懂生活的人,房子装修的风格很美,厨房所需应有尽有,想得很周到,特别是床垫很舒服,非常适合一家人出行,服务很周到,房东也很耐心,很满意

It's a great experience living in Jessa's apartment in Hongkong and our family enjoyed a lot during the trip. The location is very convenient and close to the harbour city. The apartment is very clean and there's no problem in communicating with Jessa and her manager Kris. They are very warmhearted and polite. We had a good time in Jessa's apartment and wanna thank them again!
The owner is friendly and the booking process was so fast. I booked day -1 and yet she is okay with it. The place is clean and definetely will stay there when I get back!

It was really a pleasure having stayed at Jessa's apartment. Me and my family had a comfortable stay. Jesse and Kris have been very responsive to my concerns and made sure things were properly communicated. 

Special thanks to Kris who has been so accommodating and approachable.

Good points:
1) Apartment is conveniently located near MTR exit (less than 5-min walk)
2) A nearby supermarket to get your daily needs like water
3) A LOT of restaurants nearby including local eateries. There's even a Korean resto! (Seng Seng)
4) Strong water supply with instant hot water
5) Comfy beds and pillows
6) Well-equipped kitchen with a complete set of glassware
7) Umbrellas. It was raining on our 2nd day and the umbrellas came in handy.

Room for improvement:
1) Directions on how to get to the meeting place e.g. which exit to take from MTR exit as there were lots of exits
2) Standardised ON/OFF light switches
3) Working clock in at least one of the rooms, if not all

Thanks again Jessa and Kris! We would definitely recommend your apartment/s to our families and friends.

The apt is in the residental area but still near the metro station. There are many places for eating. The decoration and electronic appliance are convenient and comfortable. My cousin played PS3 everyday.  Enjoy the trip in HK very much.
位于庙街附近,出门非常方便,但是由于位于闹市区,周围的环境不是很好,是香港非常传统的住房｡房东布置的很漂亮,很用心,但希望卫生方面能再注意一点细节,例如厕所门口的地垫就不是很干净｡
We booked in at the last minute just before traveling, but Jessa was kind to give us a quick reply, so we were able to book in. The place and location was great! Thank you very much!

这间公寓很棒,无论是从前期沟通以及交通以及公寓环境来说,都比预设好一些｡交通很便利,乘坐机场快线到九龙,打个车就三十来块,所以非常ok｡环境也很好,虽然香港的大楼和电梯看着破旧(香港都这样几乎),但公寓里面很赞哦!!两个卫生间,三个房间,空间非常大!也很干净,厨房也很棒,但我们没机会用到,因为楼下很多很多吃的,点心店很多 哈哈哈!jessa是个非常nice的人,前期沟通回复很快,接待的经理kris也很不错,在指定地点等我们,也把公寓情况介绍很仔细｡总之体验不错哦,下次去人多的话还是会选择这里入住滴~

Jessa is very responsive and easy to work with! Our flight was delayed and we arrived rather late, but the apartment manager, Kris, kindly waited for us at the meeting point, which was quite easy to look up in the uber app. The location is great, very close to MTR. Because it is in a bustling area of the city, guests should have reasonable expectation for noise. We had a situation where our flight was very late in the evening of our checkout & another guest was coming so we couldn't leave our luggage. However, Jessa & Kris gave us a very smart recommendation to drop the luggage at the in city airport check-in, extremely convenient! Thank you Jessa and Kris!

Nous avons passé un très bon séjour à Hong Kong logeant à l'appartement de Jessa dans le quartier de Kowloon. Ce dernier est idéalement placé (proche de 2 stations de métro, restaurants et commerçants à profusion autour de l'immeuble). L'appartement en lui-même est très fonctionnel, la literie en latex très confortable. 
Les points négatifs ont été l'absence de rideaux occultants dans les chambres (il fait jour vers 7h du matin). À cela s'est ajouté la présence d'un chantier au pied de l'immeuble, causant du bruit du lundi au samedi à partir de 8h du matin.
We spent a very nice time in Hong Kong sleeping in Jessa's flat in Kowloon. It is really well situated next to 2 tube stations, and restaurants and shops run all around the building. The flat in itself is really functional, the latex beds are very comfortable.
The only bad points were the lack of thick curtains in the bedrooms (sun rises à 7 o'clock in the morning). There were also a construction site next to the building, making noise starting at 8 o'clock in the morning, from mondays to saturdays.
房间干净整洁,设备齐全,地理位置优越,下楼就能吃到东西,离海港城比较近,步行过去就可以!

Jessa Marie is an amazing host! She was so helpful in so many ways to make our experience in Hong Kong the best it could be. She had someone meet us and run us through the whole apartment which was very helpful.
