The apartment is amazing and we are a family of five and we have plenty of rooms and bathrooms to accomodate us all. The apartment is very centrally located and there are so many great restaurants and things to do close by. There were lovely little touches in the apartment with snacks and flowers as well, and it was very clean and stylish. We would definitely stay here again and Jessa Marie made our stay fantastic.

Great apartment. It’s really big apartment for Hong Kong. Really good furniture and design. There are heaters in case it gets too cold. Because Hong Kong isn’t nice during winter.Good location. Mtr is near. Fresh market just round the corner.
I recommend the place.

name: 1+1 (4 PERSON) Flat in Central İstanbul
summary: Clean and useful flat. Center of Kocamustafapaşa. Near to Taksim-Beyoğlu, Eminönü, Beyazıt, Sultanahmet, Sirkeci, Bosprous.  5 minutes to walk sea and hospital. 24 hours taxi bus Taksim - Kocamustafapaşa  (end of the our Street),

host.about: I am 29 years old. 112 emergency service ambulance driver. Laptop technical service owner. Likes to travel by motorcycle

reviews.txt: Le logement est bien équipé. .Proche de tous bus corniche  le marché. ..endroit très calme et stratégique pour les courses et les autres stations de transport. ..C'est 2mn pour les bus et 25mn pour arriver au tramway  à (Website hidden by Airbnb) la famille  de Mehmet très gentille. ..
La estancia con Mehmet fue muy buena! Mis amigas y yo disfrutamos del lugar, es bueno tener el departamento solo y el transporte público está a tan solo 2 minutos caminando. Lo recomendamos!

Mehmet's flat is very comfortable for living in Istanbul. It is located close center of Istanbul. If you go to Istanbul to see main places this flat is best option. Living in this flat you can get on a bus and go to Ayasofya in 25-30 minutes for example. There are many good place for eating and shopping near the house.
When we arrived in Istanbul Mehmet's parents met us and show the apartament. They live in this house on the next floor and they are very nice people. 
I advice you to choose Mehmet's fat if you will go to Istanbul.

name: Triple room Barcelona Guell park
summary: Private room in damily home

host.about:
Mi nombre es Núria, mis amigos me llaman Maminú.
Me encanta tener gente en casa.
Cuando mi hija era pequeña todos sus amigos venian a casa antes de ir al cole, despues se marchaban juntos.
Lo que más me gusta es ir a patinar sobre hielo, cuando me pongo los patines parece que voy a volar.
Me gusta mucho leer
Amo a los animales, soy ecologista y casi vegetariana.

reviews.txt: Nice and cozy place to stay. We couldn't enjoy the terrace much as it was raining but house was warm and Nurnia was lovely. X

Nuria was a nice host, she is very easygoing and kind.  The apartment is very close to the metro and center. The area is quite lively and there are many restaurants and services (via Verdi), at the same time very quiet and we slept really well. One thing which could be improved is the cleaning, as I found the room quite dusty. I had a baby with me and so it was a bit inconvenient. The toilet on the contrary was very clean, but to my perception, the whole apartment needs better maintenance.

We had a great time in Barcelona. Nuria was very friendly. The room and bathroom was clean and also very quiet. The room was near Metro Lesseps (L3) and near Sagrada Familia, Parc Guell and Passeig de Gracia (big shopping street). Thank you!
We had a lovely stay at Nuria's, the location and accessibility was amazing.

Nuria was very kind and accommodating. The room was comfortable for the three of us, and it was very good to be able to enjoy the terrace. The house is a bit cluttered, though. And we could not shower after 10 pm, which was an inconvenience on the day of our arrival.
Apart from that, the place is very well located, on a lively neighbourhood, with plenty of access to buses and subway.

We enjoyed a two-night stay with Nuria in Barcelona.  Her listing is very accurate and we found everything as advertised.  Her apartment is in a good location, only a 10-minute walk from Lesseps Metro Station.  The Gaudi Guell Park is an uphill walk of about 900 meters.  Our room and bathroom were clean and the beds comfortable for our family of three.  The internet worked well and her rooftop terrace was pleasant for afternoon tea and breakfast.  In fact, Nuria offered us tea on the roof upon our arrival.  We enjoyed having use of the kitchen during our stay.  The elevator in her building was nice for carrying luggage up and down.  Our Spanish and Nuria’s English were minimal, but we were able to communicate.  This is certainly not a luxurious place, but good for those traveling within a budget.
Aunque fue una visita relámpago a Barcelona, cumplió todas las expectativas. El piso es bonito y cómodo, ubicación en una zona tranquila y con el metro cerca para todo lo demás.

We was live in Nuria's place for 9 days ! 
The location and room was good for short days to stay .
But! !if you want live more longer like us , you should think about this , because when we live there , the first day , she can speak a little bit English to us . But the rest 8 days , she only spoke Spanish to us .When we couldn't understand what she talk about, and she will spoke more louder voice in Spanish , look like she's angry , let us feel uncomfortable  . 
And the wash machine not for free , need pay 4euro for once !

Nuria was great! The space she had was spacious (even though 3 people were staying in it) and she was kind enough to help us with anything we needed! I loved staying with her and would stay if I ever come back to visit :) The location is great too!

La casa estaba genial,  tiene una terraza increíble y está muy bien situada. 
 Nuria fue muy amable tanto durante nuestra estancia como con pequeños problemillas antes del viaje. Repetiría sin dudarlo!

Well organised and nice place with lovely terrace. Area is also great. 

Host is friendly and helpful.

Nuria collected my parents and I from Barcelona airport for 25€. Our flight was delayed and we didn't arrive until 10pm, but I was able to notify her through (Hidden by Airbnb) just before we took off and she was fine about it. She  has a small VW Pollo which we just managed to fit all 3 of our big bags in to, plus us 3 and Nuria! She pointed out the closest metro station (Lesseps) on the way to her house and made us tea on the Terrace upon arrival to her home. She doesn't speak English so we communicated in Spanish. The room was fine for us, a very narrow apartment, as are most apartments in Barcelona. A small lift was good to take our luggage up as the apartment is the top of 6 or so levels. We had a fan in our room and a big open window which was great as it was hot! Shower is either hot or cold and bathroom shared with another guest room. Towels provided. Showers between 7:00 and 22:00 as bathroom is inbetween the 2 guest rooms and that rule is to help keep noise levels to a minimum for any guests who might prefer to sleep from 10pm. Approx 15 mins walk to Park Guell which was great! And about 25 mins walk to La Sagrada Familia. A really great fruit/vegetable/organic produce with the best of everything just a few streets away. Access to fridge available on request. Access to cutlery, crockery and microwave (not oven or stove). Great strong wifi connection. A few barking dogs in the neighborhood, but otherwise quiet. Nuria kindly offered for us to leave our luggage for the day as we were checking out, but we didn't need to. Nuria seemed to do a bit of work from home, she kept out of our way, but was around if we had needed to ask her anything. Over all our stay was good. Muchas Gracias Nuria!
Everything was so good!) We are very happy that chose Nuria's apartment. Thanks a lot!

Nice room, and she was able to provide an extra mattress to us when we requested. It is situated in a calm area, but close to the metro station Lesseps.
Núria provided towels and sheets and keys to the house.
tot molt bé
agréable séjour chez Nuria qui a été très accueillante

Gracias Nuria para la semana en tu casa.
The room were really  clean and the terrace is very pleasant.
The only thing is the neighborhood's dogs during the night.
So a beautifull travel for us.

la ubicación era inmejorable para el proposito de nuestro viaje, los barrios de alrededor eran una pasada para salir a cenar. La habitacion era comoda y Nuria nos lo puso todo bastante fácil.
Me hubiese gustado saber con antelación que tendría que pagar un extra "turistico" y creo que eso deberia ir incluido en el precio total... pero bueno. fue un placer hospedarnos en su casa.

Todo fue muy bien. Llegamos tarde asi que espero para poder entregarnos la llave. Habitacion comoda, tranquila, todo muy limpio. Cerca a la estacion de metro y un buen barrio. No tuve mucha interaccion con Nuria dado que saliamos temprano y llegabamos tarde. Solo me queda la duda del impuesto de 1€por pax por dia de estadia, no tenia ningun inconveniente en pagarlo pero no aun sigo sin entender el porque.

La habitacion era comoda, tranquila y todo muy limpio. La ubicación del apartamento es super bien, cerca de la estatión del metro y se puede obtener todo muy bien. Nuriá era muy amable, solícita y en total una anfitriona recomendable =)

name: ➳ Logement  4 1/2 Rosemont ❤️
summary: Chers Glob-trotteurs, travailleurs, vacanciers ou qui que vous soyez :)  Notre demeure est au dernier étage d’un petit immeuble (3 étages), situé à 20 min du centre ville.   L’appartement possède un salon double avec chambre ,balcon donnant sur une rue passante, deux chambres dont une fermée, une salle de bain ainsi qu’une cuisine avec un second balcon donnant cette fois sur une vue panoramique.  Les rues Beaubien et Masson regorgent de petits cafés, restaurants et commerces en tout genre !

reviews.txt:
Nous n'avons pas rencontré Rebekah, c'est un ami à elle qui nous a donné et repris les clés. Nous étions une famille de 4 (un bébé et un enfant de 4 ans).
Nous avons aimé : la proximité des commerces (supermarché, pharmacie, fruiterie, le chaleureux Rose Café), le bus au pied de l'immeuble, la taille de l'appartement confortable pour 4, 
Nous avons moins aimé : l'appartement pas très propre (odeur de cigarette, cendrier pas vidé, mégot dans la chambre - pour un logement non fumeur !!- le parquet qui noircit les genoux de notre fille à quatre pattes, le frigo pas vidé, la poussière sous les coussins des canapés ... et j'en passe), le manque d'équipement (balai, aspirateur, vaisselle pour préparer à manger), la machine à laver défectueuse (elle est tombée en panne après 2 utilisations, nous avons du aller en laverie), les lumières cassées dans les 2 chambres (que nous avons réparées), la TV qui est en fait un écran pour regarder des DVD, le couchage pour la 3e personne dans la petite chambre fermée est en fait un canapé non convertible de 1 mètre de long (notre fils de 4 ans ne pouvait pas dormir dessus ...). Rebekah nous a donc fait passer un matelas gonflable.
C'est un appartement à moindre cout, certes, mais pas conforme à la description. Bien pour un couple qui aime manger à l’extérieur.

name: Colourful apt in Plateau/Mile End
summary: Located on the border of two of Montreal’s hippest neighbourhoods (Mile End and the Plateau Mont Royal), this apartment is only a minute away from your choice of restaurants, bars, shops, boutiques, grocery stores, an SAQ (for buying wines and liquor) and pretty much everything you could possibly want. There are also several parks nearby, including Mont Royal, for which the city is name. NOTE: The bedroom sleeps 2 (double bed) and the living room can sleep another 2 (queen-size air mattress).

host.about: I am a single mother of two.  I love to travel and have been many places, using airbnb and other sites.  I also used to have an airbnb listing.

reviews.txt: Great price and location! I was in contact with Libby (Toby's sister). She was very attentive and replied quickly to any questions I had. My friend slept in the bed and I asked to use the queen size air mattress (took less than 5 min to inflate with the provided electric device), but I ended up sleeping on the couch - it was super comfy (at least for my 5'4 height). Great experience here.

L'appartement est tout à fait conforme au descriptif. Il n'y manque vraiment rien. Libby, en l'absence de Toby a tout prévu pour que l'on se sente chez soi, jusqu'à la brosse à dent, au cas où on l'aurait oubliée. Parfaitement situé pour avoir tout à portée de main (commerces, restaurants, transports) dans mon quartier préféré. Je n'ai pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Libby et Toby mais la documentation était extrêmement précise et Libby était particulièrement réactive lors de nos échanges. J'y retournerai les yeux fermés et peut-être rencontrerai-je filles ?

Comfortable apartment in a fabulous neighborhood!  My husband and I loved staying here, walking and riding bikes in the neighborhood, and the convenient location. The apt. is close to shops, cafes and restaurants, Bixi bike stands, the park, main streets, and metro station. 

We did not get to meet the host but she communicated via email and text, arranged for a smooth arrival, and left lots of information about Montreal. There were maps, brochures, etc. for us to peruse. 

She even left some fruit and treats in the freezer for us to make us feel welcome and we enjoyed pretending we were locals by "living" in her apt. 

Good space, comfortable bed and couch, and outside balcony to sit on made the apt. perfect. 

We plan to return to Montreal as it is probably our favorite city and we would definitely choose to stay here again.

I had great communication with Libby. Good, clear information and smooth check-in arrangements. The apartment is cozy and comfortable and feels very homey. It's in a great area of Montreal and even though there are many wonderful restaurants, the kitchen is well equipped for making a family dinner. Thanks Libby, we had a great time.
11/10! Perfectly located (try Lili.co for brunch, Guillame for croissants and Green Panther if you're veggie!!) and super cute and cosy. Libby is a super host, absolutely recommend!!

Libby was great at communicating with us prior to and during the reservation. While she wasn't present in the apartment, she made herself available through phone and text, and left plenty of information in the apartment itself, including lots of tourist info, which was very helpful!

The colorful apartment is located in a really great neighborhood with lots of restaurants, bars, and stuff going on, all within walking distance to the building. It was also easily accessible to the metro, which made getting around the city a breeze.

The apartment itself is charming, and like the listing says, very colorful and with decorations from all over the world! Overall, it's a great place to stay and you won't be let down!

I dealt with Libby who was great. Very nice and welcoming. Their cleaner Rose waited an hour to welcome me as I was delayed in a nasty ice storm.  Thank her again for me Libby. The apartment is very nice clean and comfortable. The Plateau neighborhood is great with all the eateries cafes  shops and bars. Had a great time!

Cozy and bright apartment in the best neighbourhood in Montreal!
Bigger than expected with lots of light and nice well equipped kitchen.
Apartment feels very much like home.
Absolutely recommend, Libby is a great host!
She has everything that guests might need in the apartment including tourist guides, washer/dryer and coffee.
10/10

Toby was an amazing host. Very kind and thoughtful.
Her place is perfectly located, clean, and with many little details to make your stay perfect. Definitely recommended +++

My husband, 11 year old son and I had a great stay at Toby and her sister Libby's place. The apartment is as advertised--very sweet with two small balconies, a full service kitchen (including spices), and an air-conditioner, as some of the stand-outs (and the latter was very helpful in July). The thing is that you won't want to spend that much time there because the neighborhood is amazing--which was also accurately advertised. We walked or took the metro everywhere and never used our car (we lucked out and found a parking spot right after the street had been cleaned and all the other cars had to move). There are so many great restaurants, cafes and boutiques nearby, and also a sweet park right at the top of the street. We walked to Mont Royal (and then walked to the top for an amazing view), and walked to the Metro stop to get to downtown (for free concerts at the Jazz Festival), the old port, and the Jean Talon market. Also, Libby was very helpful and available via email (and if my phone worked, I assume text as well); has lots of maps and brochures in the apartment for you to look at and use; and her housecleaner, who met us and gave us the keys, was lovely and full of tips about the city. We can't wait to come back and explore more!
Best location and most gracious host I have ever had!

We love Mile End, so this was a perfect location for us. The apartment was bright, charming, and completely comfortable. Nice bed, cute kitchen with everything you need. Toby and her sister Libby were very responsive and  communicative. Great place to stay.

Libby was very available and helpful thoughtout our entire stay. Her apartment is very cosy and perfectly located in the best neighborhood of Montreal, the kitchen is fully equipped with every you might need and the bed is comfortable. 
I would definitely recommend! 
Thanks again Libby.

Toby and Libby's place was perfect for our long weekend in Montreal. They were extremely kind, thoughtful and accommodating. When we got delayed at the border and arrived much later than expected, they were very helpful to find a way to check us in. The place is very comfortable, has all what you need (well-equipped kitchen, washer, coffee machine, etc ), is well-located and definitely makes you feel like home. I absolutely recommend it!!

The perfect place to visit Montreal! Lovely, fully equipped, amazingly located apartment with a great and supportive host that leaves nothing to be desired! The place lies in the heart of the “Le Plateau / Mile End” neighbourhood(s); A great vibe, access to a supreme number of cute café's and unique bars, really great food, supermarkets, bakeries and anything you could possibly need…in a short walking distance. It’s minutes away from the Mont-Royal Metro station which in turn gets you to Old Town and Downtown in 5-10 minutes. Libby (Toby’s sister) and Hannah (who basically runs the place in Toby’s absence) went above and beyond what should be expected from an AirBnB host. Very nice and helpful…thank you so much! L'endroit idéal pour explorer Montréal et profiter du large choix de magasins, bars et de restaurants qu'offre le quartier du Plateau Mont-Royal/Mile End. Tout comme promis et décrit.
We had a great stay here. Toby, Libby, and Hannah were helpful, clear, and responsive throughout. The apartment was very comfortable and well-located.
Great apartment and location and all communication was easy and smooth.
Great place to stay if you want to check out Montreal!

This is a great spot to stay and feel like you're living in the city.  The location is convenient even for a longer-term stay (nearby groceries, etc.), and the host is very kind and communicative– would recommend!

C’est la première fois que nous prenons un airbnb  et Libby etais super nous avons eux la chances de la rencontrer elle nous a donner de bons conseils!

L’appartement est parfaitement bien équiper agencée ! Nous etions 4, 2 adulte 1 enfant et un bébé ! Libby esr tres bien équiper pour des adultes comme pour des enfants ! Son lit parapluie nous a beaucoup servi! 

Son appartement ne manque vraiment de rien! Il est très bien situer au centre de tout! 2 arrêt de bus son proche de chez elle. Vraiment foncez y les yeux fermer ! L’appartement étais très propre .

Libby étais très disponible à chaque question elle repondais rapidement malgré quelle n’étais pas au pays , très sérieuse!

name: Cosy penthouse close to Barra beach
summary: This explendid penthouse has 4.400 ft2, with 5 cosy bedrooms, sauna, pool, parking for 6 cars and is located at one of the best points of the Barra da Tijuca beach, with the best restaurants and bars of the neighborhood (subway station 15 minutes walk)

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Close to the metro (Jardim Oceanico, 1.2km, 15-20 walk). Really nice, 2-level brand new penthouse in a quiet residential area, just one block from the beach.  Various good restaurants nearby and a convenient supermarket on the corner.  Accommodates 12 persons (adults only, apartment is not exactly child friendly because of the 2 levels and the swimming pool on the 2 floor) with more than enough space to relax and feel like in a spa environment.

name: Large Studio with Harbour glimpses, City Fringe
summary: Fully Furnished, spacious studio apartment, on the 14th floor with partial distant views to Sydney Harbour.  The apartment hotel is located on the Darlinghurst side of Hyde Park, just a few minutes walk across Hyde Park and you will be in the heart of the Sydney CBD.

host.about:
Hello and thanks for taking the time to read my profile. I am a roaming New Zealander now settled in Australia's most picturesque city of Sydney. I am delighted to become an Airbnb host of apartment/condominium/self-contained/flat style of accommodation right here in Sydney. 

45 years old, I have been a travel agent since my early twenties, this job experience coupled with my own extensive travel around the world (including many successful stays booked via Airbnb) plus meeting my travel client expectations has armed me with extensive knowledge base of what guests require of their stay.

Please do not hesitate to contact me with any questions you may have in regards to the property you will be staying in, transport, activities, events, Sydney itself, I will be very happy to help with any information I can.

reviews.txt:
The location of this property was central to transport - an easy train ride in from the airport and short walk from museum station

Lots of communication from the host.

The property was nothing special - served its purpose - wouldn't rush back in a hurry - hosts could do a lot more to make the property more accommodating for business guests

Nice apartment located in Darlinghurst. Central to many touristic places. Close to little Italy. 
Many cafes and restaurants around. 
The place was clean and good for a family of four. Second bed is a convertible that is ok for young kids if to be shared. 
Easy to check in and check out. Andrea is very helpful and available. Communication by email only.
It was god and a perfect location

This place was a great location if you want a simple place to sleep. The place overall was a bit run-down compared to the photos, but was the perfect location if you are interested in walking to the water such as Darling Harbour. Andrea was a very responsive host. Our only complaints were some bathroom bugs and hearing the elevator operating throughout the night since we were right next door.

name: sunny 2 bedroom close to Bosphorus
summary: The apartment is located at the very best location in Arnavutköy, not so close to the noise on the seaside but a bit inside. The building has a terrace for many uses.

host.about:
Başar Family

Gülder (mother): Owner of ARBA Food. Ltd. Co., Ankara. Graduate: Management, Middle East Technical University
Arda (son): Unemployed. Graduate: Civil Engineering, Boğaziçi University
Aras (son): Works at The Princeton Review, Ankara. Graduate: Civil Engineering, İstanbul Technical University-State University of New York
Fırat (father): Co-owner of ARBA Food Co. Ltd. Graduate: English Language and Literature, Hacettepe University


We have together and individually traveled to a lot of countries all around the world. We love interacting with locals for local foods, traditions, music etc. to further understand ourselves and import new meanings to our own lives, which, in turn, enriches everybody around us.

We have hosted wonderful people. None caused big issues, and none had issues with us. We are more prone to sharing experiences, rather than doing business, because, I guess we are early adopters of Airbnb. Our house is not like an hotel room. With us generally around, you will make the most out of the neighborhood, perhaps İstanbul and maybe even Turkey.

We are also very understanding guests with usually basic needs; but with the taste of certain sociocultural rules, mixed with a certain amount of humor. We basically expect what is written on your page to be correct; because then, we will be aware of the shortcomings as well, and act accordingly.

reviews.txt: The district was very calm, and there were two supermarkets within a minute of walking which can provide whatever you lack. Arda was very kind and helpful, and the house has everything you may need during your accomodation. My only concern was the cat, but she ignores you unless you call her :)
Tek kelimeyle mükemmel diyebilirim, evin toplu taşımaya ve sahile yakın oluşu çok büyük bir avantaj.
A silent room near the Bosphorus. Aras very helpful person. Thank you Aras.

name: Mezzos Studio in Sydney CBD
summary: An ENTIRE studio ALL TO YOURSELF at Circular Quay in Sydney's CBD marks this inner-city home a must for any weekenders, interstaters or holiday makers. Fully furnished with FREE Wi-Fi! BOOK NOW and receive 15% OFF car rentals with Europcar across Australia, New Zealand & UK wide!

host.about:
Your trusted international host across major cities. Feel at home wherever you are! LIVE · LOVE · EXPLORE

- Melbourne
- Sydney
- Gold Coast
- Auckland
- London
- Kuala Lumpur
- George Town
- Johor Bahru

I speak fluent English, Cantonese (广东话), Mandarin (普通话), Bahasa Melayu, Bahasa Indonesia & Tagalog.

If the dates you're after are available on my calendars, you may proceed to "INSTANT-BOOK" em'.

My calendars on AirBnb are always up to date, so if they're blocked and you can't select them, it pretty much means someone else has already booked em'.

Happy stays & safe travels :)

View more properties HERE (JL1) > https://www.airbnb.com.au/users/8530753/listings
 
OR HERE (JL1) > https://www.airbnb.com.au/s/homes?host_id=8530753
 
OR HERE (JL3) > https://www.airbnb.com.au/s/homes?host_id=114384153
 
OR HERE (JLMY) > https://www.airbnb.com.au/s/homes?host_id=177114776

OR HERE (JLMY2) > https://www.airbnb.com.au/s/homes?host_id=217495299

OR HERE (JLMY3) > https://www.airbnb.com.au/s/homes?host_id=228789871

reviews.txt: A great comfortable little place right smack bang in the centre of circular quay. Contact with host/s was quick and easy too

Our stay in Jared's apartment was exactly what we needed. It's a very comfortable space for two people. There is a big window that provides a nice view of the surroundings and a lovely breeze. We didn't use the rooftop pool (too cold) but it was gorgeous! The kitchen is very small but it's well set out so there is still plenty of bench space. Being on a high floor the hot water doesn't run for particularly long but it's fine if you leave a bit of time between showers. Checking in and out was super easy! The building is in a wonderful location, we walked easily to Haymarket, Darling Harbour, the Rocks, and Circular Quay. TIP: If you are driving into the city, this is not the place to stay. Parking was a nightmare. Jared does warn that parking is expensive (he mentions $69 in the apartment description) but what I didn't realise is it's not just a $69 flat rate for more than three hours, it's $69 the first day, $50 overnight, then $69 for the next day. In the end we just gave up trying to find cheaper parking and paid. Other than that our stay was wonderful. Thank you Jared for being a wonderful host!

The studio's location is very accessible. Its a few minutes walk from both Wynyard and Circular Quay train stations. That was a major win for us. We were able to visit one place in the morning, then return and feed the kids and visit another place in the evening/night. Jared provided us plenty of everything described in the listing.

You can even see Sydney Eye Tower from one of the windows. No balcony though.
很干净,结构布局都很喜欢,如果check in的时间能在灵活一点就好了
It was a great place to stay, awesome location for a good price, and it was a good size for the four of us for four nights. Nice view out the window of the city too

Nice and clean place to stay int he middle of the city
Really recommended!
The location is okay and safe.
Great great location! Lovely little thank you note too. The place was spotless and had everything we needed!
Good Host
房东非常热情和友好,公寓的地理位置也很好,走路就可以到很多景区,公寓有厨房,可以自己做饭｡一次不错的居住体验｡

Great communication from Jared at the time of booking and leading up to our stay.  The apartment was perfect for us as our weekend was spent mainly in the Rocks and Circular Quay area which was about a 5 minute walk.

Pub across the road has all the sports channels (perfect during finals footy) and does a pretty good meal as well.

There is a little noise in the morning from the Light Rail project works but overall value for money and location were perfect.
Great place in the middle of the CBD. Checking in was super easy and communication with the host was spot on. Great value when you consider what a room of similar size in a nearby hotel would cost.

The location was great for our interests.  We literally walked everywhere we wanted to go and we got around.  There are so many great things to see near Mezzo's Studio.  Our check-in and check-out were easy and our requests were handled in a helpful and friendly manner.  I highly suggest this location and the price can't be beat!
房东的房子在悉尼cbd｡位置非常好｡我们转了几天才发现他四通八达｡大门非常有范儿｡房间内设施齐全｡是个好房子!

Thank you for consistent communication and reliable contact. 
The presentation and location of this property is excellent.
Given the location, it was good value for the cost. We had issues with the elevator, but that can't be fixed by the host.

A smooth pre-stay process with an easy check-in and out procedure. We were a bit late arriving due to flight delays but that was no problem. There were a couple of hiccups that were dealt with quickly and I believe will be sorted for future guests as a result. 
Fabulous location (a bit of street noise, but that's what you get being in the centre of the city!) and I felt safe in the apartment which was comfortable.

If your are spending time in circular quay or the rocks this place is well located for the price. It accommodates 4 people with the fold out bed and has everything you need. Our arrival was easy and communication was great. The place does need a really good clean, other than that this was a great pick.

Location was good and price was reasonable, but I would not stay here again.

The television only had three channels that worked and none of the lights in the kitchen were functional (so I didn't even try to cook or use anything in the kitchen, thus can't be sure if the appliances work). The bathroom flooded when you took a shower no matter how careful you were, which is probably why there was a lot of mold in the bathroom, particular between the sink and shower. In general, the unit was quite dirty.

The location is unbeatable. Bathroom needs an update but other than that we truly enjoyed our stay. 
Ate breakfast looking out to the city and enjoyed some sunshine at the rooftop pool. Quiet building mostly businesses so no waiting for elevator. And it was more than enough room when my parents joined us for a few days.
Host was very prompt to respond to inquiries and worked with us on our early arrival. 2 big thumbs up!

name: 26/3 rd Casa da Música
summary: Apartamento situado em Cedofeita, à Boavista. Casa com as comodidades essenciais e  traços minimalistas, é um espaço de cidade.  Situa-se numa área habitacional, fora da zona turística.  Verifiquem por favor a localização antes de reservar. Caminhar até à baixa demora 25 min, como alternativas metro "Casa da Música" a 7 min do alojamento são 3 paragens até ao centro ou 10min há também o bus nº 602 a 1 min do alojamento para a Cordoaria (15m)

host.about: Hello

reviews.txt: Margarida was a great host, she met us from the station and made sure we had settled in, saying we could contact her for advice about the area. She made us feel welcome in her apartment.

Margarida nos acogió fenomenal en nuestra llegada, estuvo siempre atenta a nuestras necesidades y nos informó de la oferta cultural y gastronómica alrededor del apartamento. 
Este se encuentra en una zona residencial muy tranquila, donde no encontramos problemas de aparcamiento. Estaba muy limpio y todo acorde a lo descrito por Margarida, lo que nos gustó fue sobre todo la luz y el aire fresquito (han sido días calurosos) que entraban.
En cuanto a limpieza y comodidad, muy bien también! 

Muy cerca de la casa probamos dos cafeterías que nos encantaron para desayunar (rico y barato): Porto Rico, ubicada en Rua de Oliveira Monteiro, 491-497; y Regata, enRua de Nossa Senhora de Fátima, 421.

(Podéis encontrar info sobre restaurantes en esta página (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

Ubicado a 10min de la Casa de la Música, donde la oferta cultural es amplia, y del Mercado del Bom Sucesso (opción ideal para picar algo cerca del apartamento aunque no la única). 
Al centro normalmente íbamos andando (alrededor de 20min) pero otra opción es coger el metro desde el centro y andar los últimos minutos; el trayecto que realizamos fue: De Sao Bento>Trindade> Casa da Musica (Carolina Michaelis también está cerca).

La opción más corta para ir andando (o eso nos parece) es Dr Carlos Cal Brandao (e ir callejeando) aunque también se puede ir hacia la Rotonda de Boavista y bajar hacia Jardins do Palacio de Cristal (buena opción para ver atardecer).

La verdad que ha sido una estancia perfecta y repetiríamos encantados :)

Margarida was very helpful and she made us feel welcome. She explained everything about the apartment very well. She even gave us loads of tips on where we can go for good restaurants, bars etc. We could always ask her anything during our stay about anything in Porto, it was really helpful. I would defenitely recommend this place to others.
Margarida is a very nice person and has a nice apartment!

Margarida was very nice when we arrived and gave us good advice of what to do. The appartment was in a good neighbourhood. Easy to walk to the center of the city. Everything was clean. We really loved our stay at her appartment!

Margarida es una persona atenta y siempre dispuesta a ayudar; Oporto una ciudad hermosa llena de rincones en los que perderse. Lamentablemente, es difícil llevarse una imagen positiva después de que te roben. El día antes de nuestra partida encontramos la luna del coche rota, y todo lo que había de valor, sustraído. Es una práctica habitual, no fue una excepción. La consiguiente desesperación, al estar "abandonados" en otro país, sólo la conoce quien la padece. Además, no habíamos aparcado en una zona  conflictiva, sino en un barrio residencial, muy cerca del apartamento. 
Lo verdaderamente problemático no es el robo en sí, sino el hecho, ante la perspectiva de un largo viaje para volver a casa, de no tener ayuda posible: que el seguro no responda, no tener internet en el teléfono, etcétera, hecho que probablemente constituya un incentivo para los ladrones, pues es obvio que actúan desde el rencor.
Si Margarida dispone el aparcamiento trasero a la casa todo será más seguro. No le recomiendo a nadie dejar el coche en la calle.
Es recomendable también, controlar los precios de las tarifas de datos, ya que la Wi-Fi que nos fue brindada solo funcionó el primer día, y se hace muy necesaria estando de viaje. 
Por otro lado, es difícil llegar a entender para un español (que tenemos fama de fiesteros y gritones) como es posible que en una zona residencial todas las noches se reúna gente en una plaza a beber y hablar hasta las cuatro o cinco de la mañana. El caso es que como la visita ha sido en agosto y el calor era insoportable, teníamos que tener las ventanas abiertas y era muy difícil dormir, pues la gente no tenía ninguna consideración ni civismo en este aspecto.
Esto no pretende ser una crítica destructiva; quizá tuvimos mala suerte, y aunque creo que hay aspectos a mejorar, el apartamento es una  buena oportunidad para conocer la ciudad, sobre todo por su relación calidad-precio y porque Margarida responde siempre con una sonrisa. Aun teniendo en cuenta los aspectos señalados, estoy seguro de que con el tiempo el recuerdo será bueno.
Un très bon accueil de la part de Margarida. L'appartement est propre et bien placé par rapport au centre ville. C'est une adresse que je recommande !
A Margarida foi muito simpatica e o apartamento estava impecável. obrigado :)

Margarida est une personne adorable! elle nous a laissé un guide de porto avec ses annotations pour que notre voyage soit le plus agréable possible, l'appartement correspond parfaitement aux photos. l'appartement est entre 2 stations de metro très facile d'accès, et proche de la rotunda.

Un espacio austero pero cómodo, bien comunicado con el centro aunque a un buen paseo. Tiendas en la zona. No hemos tenido problemas de aparcamiento ni de seguridad, la zona es tranquila. Los chavales y chavalas charlando hasta tarde ha sido un poco molesto, pero llevadero. Margarida encantandora y atenta. ¡Buena experiencia!
ottimo, Margarita simpatica e accogliente. l'appartamento pulito. la posizione abbastanza comoda per il centro. ottima esperienza. lo consiglio

Wir waren vier Tage in Porto und hatten eine tolle Zeit. Die Wohnung ist zwar basic, aber sie hat alles was man braucht. Sie ist einfach zu erreichen und gut gelegen - wir waren immer zu Fuß unterwegs. Margarida ist super sympathisch und sehr zuvorkommend. Sie hat uns warm empfangen.

Accueil très chaleureux de la part de Margarida, très réactive aux messages. L'appartement est très bien situé, proche du métro, de tous commerces et de l'entrée ou de la sortie de la ville , mais l'environnement est malheureusement bruyant (ce qui est indépendant de Margarida!) L'équipement est (trop) basique pour plusieurs jours mais Margarida saura rapidement améliorer tout ça. Nous sommes en tout cas ravies de l'avoir rencontrée.
Très accueillante et chaleureuse, une fille simple et disponible !! Très heureuse de ces deux jours

Margarida is really friendly and gave us good tips when we arrived. The accommodation was clean and cozy. Only issues were with the wifi, that sometimes didn't work. Overall, we've had a great experience!

Miranda is a very nice host, always good in communication and gave us a lot of tips and recommendations to make the best out of our time in Porto. The apartment is located 15-20 minutes walk from the city center. Since the building was build in the 70 there are quite a few things that indicated that it is not the newest apartment.

L'appartement de Margarida a été idéal pour notre séjour à Porto, meme si un peu excentré. Grand, très propre et bien équipé (même si le wifi bug pas mal), nous avons passé un excellent séjour!
Margarida a été super, disponible et arrangeante. Merci pour tout!

I had a nice time in the apartment. As others also mentioned, it's a very basic 70s apartment (which in Portugal means - no central heating, and it can get a little chilly in there in winter even though there are electrical heaters), but the neighbourhood is calm and safe, shops are near, as well as the metro station, for me the WiFi was working all the time (sometimes a little slow, but it worked). Also the wooden floor is nice, and the kitchen is small but modern and has all you need to prepare small meals.
Communication and check-in was very professional. The flat was super clean. I'd come back when I'm coming to Porto again!

Margarida is a great host. She waited for us in the apartement when we arrived even though we were really late. She was always available on the phone when we had any questions and we felt very welcome and well looked after.

I really enjoyed staying in Margaridas apartment. She is a wonderful host and her English is really good so it was easy to communicate. She gave excellent tips about Porto based on my interests.  Next visit I will definately book her place again.

name: Renovated Classic Design Studio with Sun Room
summary: Take in the regal elegance of this classic design studio set in a renovated former piano academy and factory. Discover a downtown getaway featuring original ornate finishes, custom made furniture, colorful decor, and a sun room.

host.about:
I worked for an international airline for many years, where I learned about customer satisfaction while traveling all over the world.
Over the last few years I have been renovating, decorating and equipping historic and modern homes in different countries.  I am very attentive to detail. With care and passion, the apartments are based on my experience as a landlord, host and traveler and they have everything you will need to feel at home.

reviews.txt: Very warm welcome from Hector. Took the time to tell us about things to do and about the city. The appartment has recently been beautifully renovated, absolutely stunning! We even pondered staying there an additionnal day just for the wonderful appartment. High end towels and ameneties. Close to a metro station, quiet neighborhood, simply perfect. Hector even took the time to order us a taxi for our early departure. Would ABSOLUTELY RETURN OR RECOMMEND!!
Genial la estancia. Todo perfecto.
I would highly recommend this flat for a long or short stay in Porto. It is well located and it is really tastefully decorated! Hugo was also really helpful and gave us loads of info on the city.

Todo era perfecto.  El apartamento es precioso, coincide con las fotos.  Hugo, quién nos recibió, nos ofreció todo tipo de información y su predisposición para que en nuestra estancia no nos faltara de nada fue total.
Amazing decorated apartment! Well situated. The owner gave us incredible and tasty addresses to enjoy our trip in Porto! I would highly recommend this apartment without any hesitations

Very nice & clean flat , with available and helpful hosts. 
I highly recommend this apartment for a citytrip in Porto !
We absolutely loved our stay in Porto. Our host Hugo was very welcoming and helpful . The apartment was very clean and comfortable and felt like home. Thank you so much for a fantastic stay.
Very pleasant stay. Close parking nearby, modern comfortable place, easy walk to the tourist center but far enough away to be separate from the crowds. Thank you!

O apartamento é muito confortável e acolhedor: 5*
Está muito bem localizado, junto a restaurantes, supermercados e transportes públicos.
Apesar de estar numa zona calma e agradável, fica a poucos minutos, a pé, do centro histórico.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Quiet safe neighborhood yet still very close to most of the major sites.
Great location and easy to park nearby. The apartment is just as you see in the pictures. Highly recommended.

La propreté  agencement avec goût idéal pour un couple
Géographique  proche des 2 gares et du métro proche de la veille ville  le soir si fatigue
Un restaurant sur la place a 150 mètres super

El apartamento es muy bonito en un edificio antiguo manteniendo su esencia, pero perfectamente reformado y muy acogedor. Tiene muchos detalles (amenities de baño, cafetera y cápsulas nescafe, barra de sonido para poner tu música con el móvil y Netflix) y está en muy buena zona. Aunque en el anuncio ponga que tiene aparcamiento, no es así, pero por la zona se aparca muy bien, eso sí, de lunes a viernes es zona de pago.

Beautifully designed flat in a quiet residential area but so easy to walk to the main attractions. Paid parking is easy to find just right outside the building and free on the weekend which is a plus. I didn't get to meet Maribel but she was extremely responsive with her communication. On the day of check in, Boris was so kind and he ensured we were able to find the flat and even waited outside the building for us (as the Airbnb direction was incorrect- please be sure to use the address provided by your host). Boris provided suggestions on where to go and places to eat. While there is no washer in the unit, overall a wonderful stay in magical Porto. Btw, there is a really delicious sandwich shop around the neighborhood that serves up cheap but yummy pork sandwiches right by the park. You won't miss it as there's always a long line.
Very nice and quiet place to stay in Porto. Very convenient location to visit the center and also move further with the metro 4 mm walk from the flat! I recommend.

Great place with lots of room - felt so luxurious. Wonderful bed, plenty of hangers & closet space & outstanding bathroom really added to comfort. Great value & host very responsive.
I recommend Casa de Tortas a few blocks away as a really great breakfast spot, with yummy food & wifi.

The host was very nice and helpful. The apartment was nice and clean. But I think it's to expensive for what it offers. The size is not as big as it looks on the pics and the real location of the apartment is about 4 blocks more far away form the city center. The apartment doesn't have a laundry (I could see it on the pictures of the listing). You have to use and external laundry which costs 7.- Euro each time. Long story short: It's nice but too expensive for what it really offers.

O apartamento é de muito bom gosto nos mínimos detalhes, roupas de cama e banho impecáveis . É muito confortável e tem todos os itens necessários e até o que não pensei, 2 guarda chuvas para o caso de frio. Maribel foi muito atenciosa durante a nossa estadia.  O local é bem silencioso para uma boa noite de sono. Tem transporte público e todas as comodidades necessárias.  Super Recomendo.
Importante q os faciliten la dirección por correo con anterioridad. Yo tarde un ratito en encontrarlo

El alojamiento tiene muy buen nivel. Muy bien equipado, con detalles y con gusto. La acogida es muy cálida. La disponibilidad de los anfitriones es máxima, se esfuerzan en ayudarte, lo pudimos comprobar. La zona es tranquila pero es que además dentro de la casa no se oye nada del exterior. Muy recomendable.

name: NEW FLAT + PRIVATE ROOFTOP IN SAY YING PUN
summary: New Flat with private Rooftop in Hong Kong Island,very convenient 100 meters from MTR and 10 min walk to Central & Soho area. The Flat has 2Bedrooms,1Bath,Living Room,Kitchen,Terrace,BBQ. Enjoy while I'm on Holidays!

host.about:
Hola,
I am a Spanish Architect Living and working in Asia for the last 6 years. Based in Hong Kong.
Hope you Enjoy your stay and of course anything you need or doubt you have please ask me... Enjoy your Day!

loc.address: HK, Hong Kong Island, Hong Kong

reviews.txt:
Bel appartement propre dans un quartier en devenir à Hong Kong ! 
Jorge fut très accueillant et disponible . L'immeuble et la rue très tranquille. J'y reviens à chaque fois !

I come to Hong Kong quite often, and it was my second stay at Jorge's apartments. Jorge is a really responsive host, he was always online to answer all our questions and very helpful leading up to the trip. 

The flat is clean, has an amazing terrace and really convenient location (my favorite district in HKG). It was awesome stay by all means. I would recommend this place to my friends and will come back for sure.
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: B. Arts IV
summary: Located where lived the bourgeoisie in the 19th century.  A rehabilitation project made by young architects from Porto, in a historic building.  A Queen size bed and all the amenities to enjoy the city with pleasure. We expect you to enjoy your stay with us to the fullest, making sure that you'll be provided with all of the modern amenities and supplies necessary for a wonderful stay. If you need any more information please let me know, I will be glad to help you.

host.about: Love travel and meet people!

reviews.txt: Klein aber sehr fein! Sehr gut gelegen mitten in der alten "Oberstadt" von Porto. Pedro wie Laura waren sehr hilfsbereit bei kleinen Fragen und waren sehr nett und hilfreich mit kleinen Tipps wo es gute Restaurants und Sehenswürdigkeiten gibt. Sehr zu empfehlen diese Unterkunft!! Reto

El sitio es perfecto para pasar unos días en Porto!! Es un apartamento muy bien posicionado, desde el que puedes llegar andando a cualquier punto de interés de Porto. El apartamento es precioso, con lo básico para cocinar y comer allí y con cama muy cómoda, muy tranquilo para descansar por la noche... 
Y la terraza comunitaria es preciosa y perfecta para desayunar en los días con primaverales con sol.
La única pega es el pequeño ruido que hace la calefacción por la noche que, por otro lado, se arregla apagándola.
Hemos disfrutado de nuestra estancia al máximo, sin duda volveríamos al mismo apartamento!!

We loved this place, very central to everything, but also so very quite, especially the garden, felt like a paradise. The apartment itself is very clean, modern, tasteful, with all high qualities amenities. Pedro and Laura are the perfect hosts and we would love to come back some time in the near future.
Thank you both again for everything.
Kind Regards
Elen & Darwin

name: Conveniently Located, Sunny Brooklyn Heights!
summary: Perfect for visiting family stays. Monthly sublets available. Can comfortably accommodate couples and single people. Very convenient to subways (one black away) and Montague Street shopping. Walk to end of block and stroll along the promenade. No pets !

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: photographer / artist

reviews.txt:
Really beautiful apartment with stunning views of the city. The place was immaculate, brand new, felt barely touched. Loved being by the water. We were only a few blocks from the L train, which is one stop from the city making it pretty convenient - though we ended up cabbing it most of the time. 
Willy, the host, was great, very easy to communicate with and everything was super smooth. No complaints. Hope to stay there again sometime. If you are a TV junky, do be aware there isn't one in the apartment, but we spied one in the common area you may be able to take advantage of.
Overall, 5 stars without a doubt!

We loved our stay in Brooklyn. 
The location could not have been better...
 contrast the quietness of this East River highrise  and then, within a few minutes  walk to the subway, we were in  Manhattan!!
The view from  the 14th floor was magnificent.
The place was neat and clean, fresh and new.
State of the art modern minimalism.
The door men were very nice and welcoming.
Great neighborhood, great building, airy and light decor, and all just a short walk away from the promenade!  Willy is a blessing....thank you for providing an accomodation so close to family!!

Willy is a wonderful host. Very helpful and flexible. Place is just great - very bright, clean room with calm, diffused light coming from big windows (so many of them!). Superb neighbourhood. Thank you Willy once more!

I would highly recommend all those reading this review to book this apartment. My girlfriend and I had a fantastic stay in Willy's apartment and we wish we could return.

We booked this place almost last minute as I had to move to New York to start a job and look at apartments. We're glad we went with this one. It is half a block away from the R and only a few blocks from basically every other subway line worth having in Brooklyn. We could be in Manhattan in a minute's notice. 

It is only a few blocks away from Montague St, the short shopping street in the middle of Brooklyn Heights, and a little farther away from Court St, the main shopping street this side of the Gowanus Canal. In short, the location is ideal. Don't pass this place up.

The apartment itself is spacious and light. The main room/bed room has two windows on three of its four walls and is constantly filled with light. The girl who lives there is a photographer, and it is obvious that she cares about the quality of the light in the room. To top it off, the apartment is appropriately accented with a few mirrors, which brightens the space even more. The bed, with its foam and vinyl mattress, is an absolute pleasure to sleep on. 

Those who come to New York fearing about grime and pests need not be afraid of this apartment. It is kept immaculately clean, and we stayed there ten days without seeing even a single fly. 

Sheets and towels are provided, as well as a mostly empty closet and lots of reading material. The internet in the apartment has its ups and downs, but is mostly and unfortunately fairly slow.

Again, you would be a fool to pass this place up, especially at this price.

Nice, clean and quiet apartment in one of the most beautiful neighborhoods in NY. Lots of natural light and windows in the room.
Very convenient access to trains/Manhattan and very close to the Promenade.

Willy was extremely accommodating despite last minute changes on my part due to travel problems and I would happily recommend her place.

Great location in downtown Brooklyn.  2 minutes from several Subway lines to Manhattan and close to shops, restaurants etc.  HUGE private studio apartment that is very bright and open.  

Would recommend any couple of individual to stay here.
Lovely appartment, very clean, excellent location, safe street, close to subway and easy to get to Manhattan, also accomodating host.

Willy was great, and always available! The place is FULL of light, great location and super close to the metro. It was my first time to NY and it was a great experience. I highly recommend staying at her apartment and would love to stay there again! Thanks Willy!

Willy is adorable, she was attentive and we received it in good humor and kindness.
She did everything to make us comfortable and we lacked nothing. She contacted us several times.
The apartment is beautiful, very bright and clean.
I recommend this great apartment.
It is very very good, all the subways in range.
The area is very good, the street is very pretty and the people of Brooklyn Heights are very nice.

I recommend this apartment, we definitely go back!

We loved the light airy feel to the apartment, and the neighborhood is beautiful and quiet.  It was close to everything, even Starbucks a block away!  Everything was sufficient for the time we were there.  If you stay longer than a week, you may need a few more amenities in the kitchen...but for our 5 days, it was fine, as we were out every day.  The bed was very comfortable, with views to roof gardens.

I will definitely go back!  Thanks Willy!
Great location that was super convenient to everywhere you need to go. Would definitely stay here again!
Excelente apartamento, bairro muito bonito. Tivemos uma maravilhosa estadia. A Willamain foi muito atenciosa. Gostamos de tudo. Obrigada.

First of all, we loved the neighborhood.  It was very close to several subway lines and shops, not to mention the river, from which there is such a beautiful view.  

Second, the apartment is a lovely alternative to getting a hotel.  While there were a couple of quirks, they weren't substantial in any way and the price was more than 50% less than nearby hotels.  The lighting in the place is stunning and the building tends to be very quiet.  Getting the keys was not a problem.  We had a bit of trouble getting in to the building a couple of times, but that was resolved with the help of a friendly neighbor who was our designated contact since the host is away.  The door to the apartment was a difficult to unlock as well, but that may have been my error.

Overall, I would very highly recommend staying at Willy's place.  It's comfortable, inexpensive, especially compared to other nearby options, and charming.  We would like to come back soon!
Nice appartment, clean, plenty of light. Highly recommended. Excellent neighbourhood, near to subways,shops, supermarket. Thank you for giving the place to all my family!
Willy's apartment is phenomenal -- the location can't be beat (heart of Brooklyn Heights), the space is charming, and Willy's a wonderful host. Highly recommended!
Lovely apartment just as we had hoped.  Great location.
Great Host!!, Always in comunication.  We loved the apt, the building and the neighborhood. Was a great experience and a great trip.

I spent a delightful week at Willy's hideaway apartment. I call it hideaway because the apt. faces the back of the building and you hear nothing except birds chirping, no street noise. The apartment is very small: essentially the large, airy and lovely bedroom you see in the photo and then a tiny kitchen and bathroom. But it is the perfect setup and the PERFECT location if you want to be in the heart of Brooklyn Heights. There is a desk in the bedroom and an Internet connection (not perfect, but mostly worked) so I was able to get some work done too.  Willy was delightful to interact with - accommodating and prompt. After exchanging mobile numbers, we were able to text back and forth, which is very efficient. The bathroom sink turned out to be completely clogged but Willy got a plumber to fix it the next day. She met the plumber there and dealt with the situation, so it was no trouble at all for us. Definitely recommend.
Nice apartment, Great location. Good host. Would return.

name: Cute studio with Sydney Harbour Bridge views!
summary: This bright and airy studio apartment offers a fabulous balcony view of the iconic Sydney Harbour Bridge and is conveniently located near buses, trains and the ferry. Just one train stop to the city, or a 30 minute walk across the Harbour bridge. Restaurants, cafes, bars & grocery stores within 10 minutes walk. Apartment has fully equipped kitchen with fridge, microwave, gas stove & oven, dishwasher and espresso machine. Free wifi (ultra fast NBN) and complimentary tea & coffee.

host.about:
Hey there! I am 29 years old, work in cinema and am an unabashed appreciator of all things nerdy. I am an avid movie buff with a passion for costuming and travel.

As a well-seasoned traveler, I hope to provide the kind of experience that I would expect and appreciate as a guest. Should you make a booking, you can expect a pleasant, no-fuss stay with maximum convenience. And of course a very warm welcome from yours truly! ^_^

reviews.txt:
Millie's studio was perfect! Fantastic location, easy walk to the train and amazing views of the bridge. 

Millie was quick to respond to my questions and very accommodating with my early check in. Would 100% stay her again. 

Thanks Millie :)

Our stay with Millie was absolutely wonderful. Matched the description with a lovely view of the Harbour Bridge. Very spacious apartment within 5 minutes from Lunar Park. Easy access via train and water ferry. Lovely stay!

Millie was a wonderful host. The studio was super clean and tidy, and had good wifi and a comfortable bed. Best of all, though, was the amazing view to enjoy from the little balcony. I will definitely recommend to friends.

Millie was a fantastic host! 

The studio located in the perfect spot - super close to the CBD, but not too close from the hustle and bustle as well. It's only a short 5-10 walk from the train station to the apartment, and the streets are well lit at night so it's safe. Studio itself was clean, neat and comfortable.

Will be staying here again if I find myself in Sydney again!

Fab stay, Millie was so helpful as our plans had changed due to work and flight cancellations but she helped us immensely and was no issues.
Absolutely love the location and view wished we could have booked for longer! Perfect home away from home so cosy and homely! Thank you so much for sharing your home enabling us to book it and making our 1st week moving to Sydney so nice!

Perfect experience! The location, the room, the view, the cereal, the xbox, everything is great! I'll definitely recommend to a friend or book again next time if I'm going to Sydney again. Thank you Millie!

My daughter and I loved staying at this gorgeous little apartment.  Although the space is small, the furniture and lay out work really well and the place was very tidy.  We felt comfortable in the space, especially because our host went out of her way to make sure we felt welcome. The location is fabulous - close to the train or ferry and within walking distance of the harbour bridge, Luna park, Kirabilli and Wendy's secret garden.  The view from the balcony is gorgeous and we were lucky enough to see fireworks on Saturday night and have some native birds come and visit us in the morning.  Thank you Millie! This is why I love airbnb!
Great place, helpful host, would highly recommend.

Millie's apartment is just as advertised. Very clean and tidy but it got a bit cold at night due to no heating system. Millie was prepared though and supplied two thick blankets which made up for it. Overall great experience and very close to the opera house and bridge.
Great location - so close to the train station, great place - nice, clean and tidy, Millie is a fantastic host.  I will be staying here again. Thanks Millie!
Millie was a wonderful host and all was as described - highly recommended.

Millie's place was so pretty and cosy. It's got everything you need. The apartment is also located in a very nice area close to the city and amenities. Every morning you wake up to the harbor bridge view! 
Millie was also very helpful and flexible to accommodate our needs. She was very easy to talk to and help us feel like home. Definitely a nice place to stay when traveling in Sydney.

This was a perfect location for our stay in Sydney. A five minute walk to the harbour bridge and lots of restaurants within minutes of the apartment. Millie was an excellent host and very willing to offer anything we needed. I'd definitely recommend this place to anyone.

Millie was a lovely host, super friendly and great at communicating in the lead up to our stay. The studio is really cute, compact and well designed with some nice touches - coffee machine, emergency toiletries. A great stay, thanks!
fantastic place. thanks so much

Millie's place was as she described it and we found it quite comfortable, everything we needed, a cute little place!  The situation is very convenient, the walk to Kirribilli shops, Milson's Point station and the Nth Sydney ferry was only minutes.  It was wonderful looking at the view over to the Harbour Bridge.  Millie met us on arrival and explained details of her place which was very helpful.
Great view great hospitallity...
Lovely studio apartment with a very welcoming host, who ensured all the comforts of home were taken care of, as well as extras such as toiletries and brekky.

Millie was an excellent host and had gone out of her way to make sure we felt welcome. She was always friendly and quick to reply to our questions. Her attention to detail and thoughtfulness included a handy one-page reference card (how to use the coffee machine, where to find the light switches, etc) and some menus from the local takeaway places. 

The unit was clean and matched it's photos and description. It was a short walk from the train station (easy even with a suitcase) and there was no noise from the train line. We would definitely stay here again. It was like staying at a tidy friend's house.

The view is superb.
So easy to get around with public transport a short walk away, the apartment was really clean & comfy, the view was amazing, Millie was easy to communicate with, I would definitely stay here again.

name: Breathtaking Ocean Beach Condo Kaanapali , Maui!
summary: An incredible ocean front breathtaking one bedroom Ocean Beach condo steps from the beach! Granite Kitchen Two TV's Very private  See the islands of Lana'i & Molokai from our lanai & living room! Watch whales and turtles from our deck! Amazing sunsets! Top Floor Beach Condo, very private! 3rd story, no elevator w/ amazing ocean views!! Enjoy our private beaches, surf, snorkel-relaxing pool! Tennis court, putting Green, ping pong & shuffle Board -wonderful intimate Resort! laundry on 1st Floor!

reviews.txt: Ken was very responsive, and answered all our questions. The condo is in a great location, and an amazing  value compared to all the resorts around the area. Loved the privacy and resort amenities.

Although we did not meet Ken in person, he was very responsive to any and all questions. The condo was very easy to find and looks exactly like the pictures. It is close enough to the beaches and downtown lahina. The only thing we didn't prepare for was how hott is was and this unit only had ceiling fans and no AC. We were pretty hot at night. Other than that we were SO happy with our condo and hope to come back sometime soon
Thanks Ken, was really a really nice spot and we really enjoyed our time here.

My partner and I stayed here and we had a really awesome experience. The complex is absolutely stunning with beautiful well maintained grounds and the pool area and views were absolutely gorgeous. The apartment was clean, well equipped and comfortable.  The only downside was that the bedroom is near the front of the unit and the traffic noise was quite loud, making it difficult to fall asleep. This is probably due to the fact the one of the window fixture in the bedroom is an open blind, offering great air flow but not much in noise reduction. However, this probably wouldn't bother a heavy sleeper or could be easily be minisimed with earplugs. On the whole we would definitely recommend!

Great place, amazing view, very clean. No wifi and short drive to main shops and restaurants probably the only down side. Would definitely stay again. Make sure you are good with stairs as it's at the top of a three story complex but makes for an amazing view all day of the ocean!

This was the perfect rental for my husband and I. This is our first AirB&B rental and we were pleasantly surprised! The views of the ocean were amazing, the resort is well kept and the landscaping is beautiful. Turtles were in the ocean at the edge of the property every morning, and we were usually able to scurry down with coffee or a mimosa and watch them swim and come up for air. The pool was rarely, if ever, used during our stay, so you could have it all to yourself. The BBQ are was clean and well-kept. This condo is on the third floor with stairs up, so if you have physical limitations it might be a struggle. However, the third floor placement allows for extremely quieter accommodations and an unparrelleled view of the ocean. The bedroom is on the street side, so road noise does creep in during the evenings. We easily slept and the noise didn't bother us at all. The fans and open windows kept us cool during the evenings with no need for AC (this unit does not have it). Although we didn't meet Ken in person, he provided us with all the information we needed to enjoy the condo without worry. This place is well stocked, clean and convenient. Highly recommended.

I was struck upon entering the condo by the immediately visible beautiful view of the Pacific from the lanai. That alone would have made staying here worth it, but on top of that, Keneke has stocked the condo chock-full of kitchen supplies and extra beach towels. Two advisories: the condo is on the small side for more than two people, although it can technically sleep four (two in the real bed and two on the pullout couch), and careful with parking here because other guests and owners can get a bit possessive, especially if they have large cars. Also, you definitely should have a car if you stay here because while a few markets/delis and shops are walkable, the town of Lahaina is not. I heartily recommend this wonderful clean condo!

Great view, better than the pictures. The grounds are beautiful and private. We did see turtles on the beach and whales from the lanai. Preferred the location much better than Kihei as it feels more quaint, but still has all the amenities.

Great place to stay. Sad to leave. 

Keep in mind, this condo unit is on the third floor and is not accessible. There's no elevator or escalator.
Great view, excellent facilities and a great location. Will  book this again when we return to Maui
Nice one bedroom condo with a beautiful ocean view, and easy access to the pool.  We never met the owner, but he was most responsive to us, and access to the space was easy.

Great condo with spectacular views and beach access. Do try snorkeling with the turtles in the rocky area. You probably won't find such giant turtles even on most commercial snorkeling tours. It's conveniently located close to super market, farmers market and restaurants. 
Bedroom could be a bit noisy in the day time with traffic but not a problem during the night. No Wifi in condo but we had our own cellular wifi device. 
Overall it's a great deal and highly recommend this place.
Good suite with amazing views in a quiet building. Close to all amenities, as well as a sem-private beach. Well worth the price.

Nice facilities, lovely private beach, the cleanest BBQ grills ever for guest use, very pleasant garden with putting green, tennis court (very well maintained, no cracks), and best of all.....amazing TURTLES! More turtles than even the snorkel boat that went to Turtle City. Access to the water was superb, there was even a ladder from the property for easy access into the ocean.

No wifi.  No air conditioning.  Love the condo but not this particular unit.  Not the cleanliest.  The condo has a great view, pool and private beach.  Would recommend staying in another unit.  Love the sunsets there!

This is a great location for “jumping off” from. Restaurants, coffee shops, etc are walkable. Easy to get in and out of. 
The place is small, as stated, but I wouldn’t want more than 2 people here. 
The 3 flights of stairs are difficult when hauling suitcases and groceries, and we’re in our mid 40’s and decent shape. 
Washer and dryer in the unit don’t work and appear that they haven’t for some time, there are pay laundry machines on site, but it’s not convenient, much nicer to have in suite working, who wants to spend their vacation on a laundry room? 
The lack of air conditioning doesn’t make it awful, but keeps it muggy and uncomfortable to sleep even with the fans going and windows open.
The complex is beautifully kept and clean, we would stay on this property again, but would chose a different unit. 
There is no lack of beautiful view or sea turtle sightings, they are everywhere, so cool to see them right on the beach out front.

The views can’t be beat! Loved the breathtaking ocean view from private balcony. Sea turtles galore! Peaceful and meticulous landscaping surrounds this place. Great beach to snorkel and very private. Swim with the turtles and plenty of variety of fish to enjoy. Walking distance to park, coffee, markets and shops. Everything you need to make you comfortable. Clean sheets, towels, pillows and comfortable bed. Will definitely stay here again.
Great location and views. The amenities are great! We will definitely come back. Mahalo ken

I found this place to be very much worth it. The location is just steps away from clear waters filled with sea turtles. We were able to cook from the home and it was equipped with the necessary amenities.  Local stores and markets are within walking distance. No a/ c however the fans made it comfortable. Well supplied unit - and Karlos is very responsive. We recommend this spot for a welcomed get away. Mahalo.

This place was perfect. A private beach outside your backdoor but don’t stay there. Maui is an island to explore so make sure you gas up the car and go. This condo is a great landing space after your adventures. It was very clean and had everything you need. Shops are close so you can cook at home if you desire. Enjoy a cup of coffee on the balcony or walk down and watch the turtles eating off the rocks. Nothing negative to say about my stay here. A wise choice if you decide to pick this for your Maui trip.

name: Quarto inteiro na Tijuca
summary: O quarto disponível tem uma cama de solteiro, sofá e computador tipo desktop para acomodação.

host.about: I am a retired chemist from glass-tubing manufacturing segment that actually is enjoying life through his granddaughters Flora and Ana, as well as has emphasized to contact friends all over the world, offering my apartment to receive some friends all over the world to take some nice time.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
Ótimo anfitrião! Muito atencioso.
Casa muito bem cuidada e extremamente bem localizada, com vista para a Floresta tropical e próximo ao Metrô.

name: Casa da Porta Amarela
summary: Pequeno apartamento, alegre e encantador, situado num genuíno bairro portuense, muito perto de restaurantes típicos e comércio tradicional. Tem um pequeno pátio privado. A 20 minutos do centro é um excelente espaço para férias.

host.about: Artista plástica, cenógrafa.

reviews.txt:
A quem estiver indeciso em relação à estadia na casa. 
Decidam bem, decidam pela Casa da Porta Amarela (ou vermelha ou azul). Uma decoração personalizada, pensada e acolhedora. 4 pessoas ficam aqui à vontade. Tem tudo o que é preciso e mais. Lençóis e quartos muito cheirosos. Tranquilo.
Localizada a alguns minutos do centro mas para nós não foi problema andar. Vale a pena aqui ficar, pela casa, pelos anfitriões. 
Obrigada por tudo! Hei-de voltar.

Don't look anywhere else. Just stay here, you'll have everything to make your stay even better. A house where you wish you could live. Very quiet, just like the pictures with an  amazing decor. I love Porto and I want to stay here when I visit again.

le logement étant à 10 min de centre, nous étions loin de touriste et nous avons pu plus profiter d'échange avec des portugais. beaucoup de commerce à proximité, restaurants...ligne de bus (305 )qui nous amène au centre donc pas de souci si on ne veux pas marcher. quartier calme. logement confortable , bien équipé même si nous n'avons pas profité de la cuisine ( nous avons déjeuner qu'à l'extérieur) . idéal pour découvrir porto. il y a des azuleros sur certaines façades de maison dans le quartier.

Le logement correspondait exactement aux photos.
Nous avons été très bien accueillis par Sissa qui avait mis à notre disposition de la documentation touristique (plan ville, brochures, livres) l'appartement est décoré avec gout et très fonctionnel. Propre et calme nous nous sommes très vite sentis comme chez nous. Très proche de ligne de bus ou mètro, pour visiter Porto c'est l'idéal

l appartement est situé dans une rue résidentielle très calme en restant très proche du centre.
Nombreux petits commerce autour donc très pratique pour vivre comme un habitant de porto

Très joli appartement bien décoré,très propre et très bien équipé (cuisine avec tout le nécessaire ,machine a laver, wifi y compris une cafetière nespresso)
Le gros plus de cet appartement est une magnifique terrasse fleurie en cours intérieure et sans vis à vis qui permet de se relaxer en extérieur.

l accueil par la propriétaire est excellent,elle a été très disponible .Nous avons reçu plein d information sur les choses à visiter,les bonnes adresses.

Dans le futur je choisirais a nouveau cet appartement

Our experience at this apartment was superb. Sissa, the host, was very nice and incredibly helpful at giving us advice on how to enjoy Porto. The apartment is spatious, very well decorated and provides just about everything you might need to feel at home. The kitchen in especially convenient. The rooms are really charming, featuring dim lights and traditional furniture. While not at the city centre, it is located a 15 minute walk from it and you have bus and subway stops down the road. Highly recommendable.

Sissa, thank you so much for letting us stay in your appartement. We enjoyed it so much. It was clean, tidy and cozy!! After a whole Day walking aroud Porto, The best was sitting in the patio with a glass of port.
Totally recomendable, also for families with children.

L'appartement de Sissa est très confortable et très propre, nous en avons été très contentes. Parfait pour passer quelques jours à Porto. De plus, Sissa a été disponible tout le long de notre séjour pour d'éventuelles questions. Je recommande!

Everything about this stay was perfect! Sissa is an amazing host; she welcomed us in person to hand the keys over, took the time to tell us about where to go and what to see in Porto and even offered us a great snack (delicious bread, cheese, homemade jelly and wine– more like a lunch) when we arrived. Staying there really felt like home. The green and flowery terrace is very intimate. If you wish to cook, the kitchen is very well-equipped. We were only two, but the apartment could perfectly host a family. I would not hesitate recommending this place to even the most picky of travellers!

Sissa est formidable, un accueil,une écoute digne d'un hôtel 3 étoiles.
Un appartement situé à l'écart de l'hyper centre , ( 10 min en bus) mais dans un quartier typique de porto avec des vrais petits commerces ou l'on y trouve de tout pour pas cher, très pratique quand on est en voiture ( il faut 5 min pour sortir de porto et avoir accès aux autoroutes).
Appartement très propre et confortable .

Sissa es una anfitriona extraordinaria. Desde el primer momento estuvo pendiente de nuestro viaje. Cuando llegamos tenía preparado un listado de lugares y restaurantes sin gluten porque nuestro hijo es celíaco y un pan casero de maíz. La casa es tan acogedora y bonita como en las fotos. Un lugar estupendo para visitar Oporto. Repetiremos seguro.

Uvítání bzlo velmi vřelé a přátelské a po celou dobu naší dovolené nám byla majitelka k dispozici. Popis bytu na airbnb.com odpovídá skutečnosti. Byt není velký, je však velmi útulný. Okolí bytu je širší centrum. V dosahu jsou dobré a levné restaurace, supermarket a hromadná doprava. Jediné  mínus spatřuji v hlavní rušné ulici, která je nedaleko.

Sissa a été très réactive quand nous l'avons sollicitée. La description et les photos de l'appartement sont fidèles à la réalité. Le patio est un vrai plus! Etre accueilli par une collation avec des produits de qualité fut bien agréable aussi. L'appartement est bien situé: il y a un petit supermarché pas loin, il est facile de trouver un endroit pour manger à proximité etc.
Nous avons reçu un très bon accueil, Sissa est toujours prête à répondre à nos questions et à proposer des sorties. L'appartement est parfait et correspond totalement à l'annonce. Un séjour idéal !

Accueil avenant et tres agréable.
Grand merci pour nous avoir attendu à une heure tardive.
Appartement fonctionnel.
Parfait pour 2 adultes et 2 ados.
Le patio ajoute un "plus".

Accueil agréable par Constance.Appartement confortable,  bien équipé etu très bien décoré 
Sissa gère son immeuble de façon très professionnelle.

Die Unterkunft war perfekt für uns als kleine Familie, das Zentrum ist mit dem Bus in 15 min zu erreichen. Sissas Tipps bzgl Restaurants und Spielplaetze waren super, die Wohnung war sauber und ordentlich, uns hat es an nichts gefehlt. Danke!

L'appartement est nickel et agréable, aucune mauvaise surprise par rapport aux photos. L'accueil de Sissa est fantastique, elle prend le temps de nous conseiller sur les visites à faire à Porto. 
C'est largement suffisant pour 4 personnes, on ne se marchait pas sur les pieds !
