Petit bémol, pour les non marcheurs, c'est un peu loin du centre ville à pied.

Gostamos bastante. O apartamento é muito aconchegante e muito bem equipado.
A anfitriã, Sissa, foi extremamente gentil acolhedora.

We stayed in Sissa's apartment for nearly one week and we had a really great time there.
Sissa warmly welcomed us with typical delicious pasteis des nata and grapes and she did give us lots of good tips for our stay in Porto. She was very kind and helpful and if we had any questions she always responded very fast. As well the communication before our trip has been very good and she did pass lots of information to me before so it was very easy to find the apartment.
The apartment is very tastefully decorated  and very clean and we found everything we needed and felt very comfortable.
I would totally recommend Sissa as a great host :) Thanks again for everything!

L'appartement de Sissa est vraiment très agréable à vivre : joliment décoré, bien agencé, très propre et refait à neuf (salle de bain et cuisine top). Le petit patio permet de se relaxer loin des agitations de la ville, et les chambres donnent sur une rue très calme. On y a très bien dormi (la literie étant particulièrement confortable !).
Sissa est très accueillante, gentille, et parle bien français ! :)
L'emplacement n'est pas central, mais permet de découvrir un quartier plus authentique que le centre historique et touristique, avec des boutiques et des restaurants typiques. En deux mots, plaira à ceux qui aiment sortir des sentiers battus ! 
Nous conseillons vivement cet appartement !!

name: Penthouse. Terrace.
summary: Beautiful penthouse fully furnished and equipped (WIFI, Air conditioning, Terrace, plasma TV, Washer, Dryer, etc .....). It is a duplex penthouse, sunny and very quiet.  3 Rooms 2 Bathroom This apartment has been completely refurbished and renovated.

host.about:
Amigo de sus huéspedes.
Viajero habitual.
Profundo conocedor de la vida cultural de la ciudad de Barcelona. Facilitador de buena información sobre la Ciudad. Ayudo a "integrar" al viajero en la Ciudad.

reviews.txt:
We stayed for a week in Manuel's beautifully furnished apartment and had our best time in Barcelona! Manuel is a very courteous and helpful host. 
Highly recommended for young and old!
Thank you Manuel!
The reservation was canceled the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Manuel has been an awesome host. He organized a driver who picked us up from the airport for 30 € only (a common airport shuttle would cost about the same for two persons). Besides he is a really friendly host and helped us out where ever it was required. The apartment was very clean and looks the same as on the pictures! The area arround the apartment is just perfect to explore barcelona. There is a grocery store just arround the corner with very helpful employees and you can walk within 15 minutes into the center of the city. However we can highly recommend this place to everyone who would like to explore Barcelona!

Kind regards Ben & Tony

My family and I stayed for 14 nights and were pleased with Manuel's lovely and beautiful apartment and we had our wonderful time in Barcelona, Manuel was very kind, helpful and friendly host.

Thank you so much for your warm hospitality. 

Regards Ahmad 

 (Website hidden by Airbnb) December 2013
I would highly recommend Manuel's apartment. The accommodation was clean, modern and spacious. Manuel was excellent to deal with and always more than happy to help.
Muito boa. O Manuel foi extremamente simpático o apartamento tem tudo o que é necessário e está muito bem localizado.

L'alloggio è grande, confortevole e ristrutturato di recente. Si trova all’ultimo piano di un palazzo posto in una via tranquilla alle spalle della più movimentata Calle Muntaner. Nelle piccole vie intorno si trovano molti bar e ristoranti oltre al bellissimo mercato. Siamo stati solo due notti e Manuel ci ha accolto al nostro arrivo. Si è reso disponibile per qualsiasi cosa abitando lui al piano di sotto. Siamo stati molto bene, grazie Manuel!

Manuel is a great host, his apartment is wonderful. Everything is new, clean and cozy. Lactation is good and convenient. We were very enjoyed in Barcelona. Highly recommend to everyone! Hope i could go back to Barcelona soon!!!

Este alojamiento ha cumplido ampliamente mis espectativas. Es confortable y acogedor, todo estaba muy límpio y su localización en la ciudad de Barcelona es magnífica. Pienso que la relación calidad-precio es adecuada.

Très bon séjour dans le logement de Manuel.Son accueil a été parfait.Disponible et sympathique.Appartement refait à neuf et idéal pour 5 personnes.Confortable et bien équipé.Très bien situé dans un quartier calme et assez chic en dehors du centre (St Gervasi).Commerces et restaurants très proches.A recommander pour découvrir Barcelone en famille, en laissant la voiture.(Marche à pied et métro).
房子非常好,位置距离观光巴士的蓝线和红线很近｡住在居民区中,很符合我们的想想和需求｡房东特别nice,帮忙派了车(司机特别帅),并在公寓中等待我们｡房间隔音稍微不好一点｡厨房和厕所的设施很齐全｡有一个非常好的阳台,可以呼吸新鲜空气和用早餐｡非常舒适｡下次如果人数合适,我们还会选择Manuel的公寓!赞!

Manuel was a wonderful host - he is very responsive and reliable. When my family arrived to Barcelona, he offered transportation service from the airport to the flat which made it easy them during their first trip to Spain!

The flat itself is spacious, clean and in a nice and peaceful area of the city (also accessible to the metro and quite central). All in all, the time spent in Barcelona was great and Manuel's flat felt like a home away from home.

Our host Manuel was helpful and flexible. The flat is nicely decorated and very clean, with a lovely terrace. The neighborhood was quiet and you really felt you were living in Barcelona and not just a tourist visiting.

The flat is good located, near subway station, in silent place. There is a good aquipment inside, enough place for 4 persons. There are shops and cafeterias near the apartament. The host was in permanent contact with us some time before our arrival. He oferred his help with delivering us from airport to the apartament. We can communicate with him in English without any problem. We are very enjoyed and we recommend this apartment and the host.

The place is nice and convenient. We bought the Barcelona Bus Turis tour and 1 of the main stop is just 10 mins walk from the apartment (I'm a slow walker). The host is responsive and accommodative. I would recommend this place to anyone who would like to pay a visit to Barcelona

Manuel is a very kind and accommodating host. Our family stayed in this this apartment for three months, with different family members leaving and arriving at different times, and he was friendly and helpful to everyone. When something needed fixing, he was there immediately with his handyman, who is also very sweet and helpful. The apartment is just like in the photos, though it is hard to capture how awesome it is to sit on the terrace and watch the birds and (on some nights) fireworks in the sky.

The air conditioning is in two rooms, the living/dining room and the master bedroom. This was plenty for the time we were there, but I bet it gets hot in August in the smallest bedroom. The kitchen could use a few more plates and utensils, as a family of four ended up doing lots of dishes, but that is minor.
The neighborhood is quite nice, shops and restaurants and groceries everywhere. The buses, tram, and taxis are at most a couple of blocks away, and the subway an extra block in the other direction. Very convenient and perfect for families. 
Thank you Manuel for a marvelous stay!
Such a great apartment! Manuel was a friendly and helpful host. We really liked to stay there.
Nous sommes tous satisfaits , propre, bien situé, très clair, espace suffisant

Manuel was a great host. Made sure to receive us earlier than the check in time and let us stay past the checkout time which was very nice. Super organized operation. The place was very nice and clean. Ton of space for a larger group. Only setback was spotty wifi but could be an issue since there were 3 of us. Location was good with a lot of good restaurants just across the street and around the corner.

Very quiet location. Not much social action around the neighborhood. But the metro is very near and can easily take you to las rambles in 5-10 min. I would recommend this apt simply for its cleanliness and low key environment

name: Minimalist Rooms in BCN, live it.
summary: Beatifull Minimalist Flat in Gran de Gracia Street, it has 3 rooms and will be for 4 Erasmus Girls Students, enjoy the comun area, the minimalist Kitchen Wify Flat TV , balcony and Central Air Condition 22 Degrees Celsius in summer 2 girls in one room aviable NOW!!!!!! 1 girls in one room aviable NOW!!!!! Habitación con Litera o dos camas individuales en moderno apartamento y recién re modelado, SOLO NIÑAS ERASMUS en BCN. Extra expenses 200€ per month will pay by roomies Master room in booked it

host.about: Muy deportista, tennis es mi pasion, caminar por la ciudad, hacer amigos internacionales con buen gusto y educados, hacer relaciones familiares de por vida y viajar mucho.

reviews.txt:
La experiencia de estancia en el departamento fue excelente, Oscar fue muy atento, incluso días antes de mi llegada a Barcelona, sus atenciones hacia mi y mi roomie fueron excelentes. El departamento esta muy bien ubicado, puedes encontrar todo tipo de tiendas, transporte público, restaurantes, etc a la vuelta de la esquina. El departamento está en excelentes condiciones y está increíble, muy cómodo y espacioso. 

Fue una excelente experiencia!!! (:

name: AMAZING VIEWS PENTHOUSE PARK GUELL
summary: The appartment is really well communicated (beside metro Alfonso X) that goes straigh to the beach and also to Paseo de Gracia or the center of Bcn. Feel in a well equiped Loft with a terrace with amazing views from the city

host.about: i like to travell, do sports and enjoy life. I hope to meet you as soon as possible!

reviews.txt:
very very good one room studio flat, well equipped and confortable, clean, with nice kitchen and a great cosy terrase with a view on sagrada familia.
ideal for a couple, ideal if you want to have a rest (there's no noise night and day), good rapport quality/price.
5 min walking to the underground that takes you to the city centre in a couple of stops, and a bus stop just on the door step.

We wanted a cheap trip to Barcelona and my sister recommended we use airbnb. As it was our first airbnb experience we were a bit nervous, however it turned out to be a dream holiday. 
We arrived at the flat and were met by Lola (the building guard) who gave us the keys and showed us around the apartment. It was perfect. Clean and tastefully decorated with all the kitchen appliances you could need! 
We chose the apartment for the balcony and views and were blown away. You can see the whole of Barcelona from the balcony, all the way to the sea. Perfect for a sunny evening with a bottle of wine! The best thing about the balcony is that you are not overlooked by anyone. It is completely private and being so high up you are not disturbed by the noise of the road. 
The flat itself is about a 10 minute walk from the metro station Guinardo and it's only a couple of minutes on the metro into town. The metro shuts around midnight so a few late nights we treated ourselves to a taxi back which cost about $11.
Lots of little supermarkets nearby to stock up and also several nice bars and cafes if you dont fancy the journey into town. 
All in all was a perfect trip. Fantastic apartment which was great value for money. Would 100% recommend Enriques apartment and will certainly be staying again in the future.
Really, amazing views! Everything was ok.

Un joli appartement pour un joli endroit!
La terrasse est hyper agréable, la vue est superbe ! Enrique est très prévenant, sympathique et discret. L' appartement est très pratique et nous a permis de faire pas mal d'économies ! Quartier très calme avec beaucoup de commerces. Par contre attention, ne pas avoir peur de marcher car l'appartement est sur les hauteurs de Barcelone, ça grimpe! 

A nice appartment on a beautiful place!
The terrace is very pleasant, the landscape is wonderful! Enrique is very attentive, nice and discret. This penthouse is very practical and permits us to take less expensive holidays. Very quiet district with a lot of supermarkets. But be careful ! Don't be afraid to walk cause this appartment is on the upper Barcelona. It climbs!

We had a magical days in this place. We dreamed and planned these days very carefully. Gaudi's masterpieces were in walking distance, beautiful view from the terraces pleased us and morning and evening! Convenience and hospitality house exceeded all expectations. I wish happy days to all  Enrique's guests)   M&S

Everything was great - the flat was in a good condition, cosy and tidy enough and of course a view from the terrace was fantastic. I also would like to notice a great location of the flat, good transport communication and the whole district itself (safe, with many shops and few tourists). Enrique was helpfull and easy to communicate. I would defenetly recommend this place for staying in amazing Barcelona.

Great flat! Clean and tidy, with a beautiful terrace with stunning views over Barcelona. We felt at home and really enjoyed our stay in the flat. 
The Guinardó neighbourhood is a great area. It is close to all the main tourist spots without being touristy. It is very well communicated and the people of the "barrio" are very friendly.
Communication with Enrique was great. He replied to all our queries in a matter of minutes!
We originally booked the flat for 4 days but we liked it so much that we decided to stay for another week. We would definitely recommend it.

Enrique was a great host. Communication was swift and all the questions we had before arrival were answered. Apartment was very clean & fresh towels were provided. The best thing about this apartment is that it has absolutely fantastic view from the terrace!!! As for the location it is really convenient as you escape touristy crowds and you are just few Metro stops from Centre of Barcelona. Highly Recommended!!!!

Enrique is very flexible concerning arriving time etc. The apartment is absolutly OK, but THE VIEW is the point.
Muchisimas gracias

The apartment is nice and looks exactly as at the picture.
Everything was great - the flat was in a good condition, cosy and tidy enough and of course a view from the terrace .
Enrique was helpfull and easy to communicate. I would defenetly recommend this place for staying in amazing Barcelona.

We had a great time in Barcelona, really a wonderful city. The view from the terrace was fantastic and we enjoyed it every night, after long walkings through the city. It's really close to the tube, which is very well organized.
Although we didn't know Enrique personally, we had help from the guard (a very nice old lady).
Thanks for this vacation.

Wir haben Barcelona vom 6.-15. Mai besucht und es war sehr schön und interessant. Enrique war zum vereinbarten Zeitpunkt im Appartment und hat 
uns alles wichtige erklärt. Das Appartment liegt zentral. Bus vor der Haustüre,
Metro 10 Min. entfernt. Sehenswürdigkeiten wie Sakrada Familia und Park Guell
sind gut zu Fuß zu erreichen. App.liegt im 7. Stock und die Aussicht auf Barcelona
ist toll. Auch Bäcker, Metzger und Supermarkt sind in unmittelbarer Nähe.Der
einzige Nachteil, neben dem App. liegt der Aufzugschacht und es ist deshalb
meist recht laut. Aber man gewöhnt sich an das Geräusch. Ansonsten ist das
App. einfach aber ausreichend für das was man braucht. Wir würden jedenfalls
bei einem nochmaligen Besuch wieder dort wohnen mögen. Bei möglichen Problemen ist Enrique auch telefonisch gut zu erreichen.

We had a great time in the appartment of Enrique. After walking around and visiting many busy places downtown all day, it was so nice to relax on the terrace and enjoy the great view over Barcelona. The quarter is quiet and feels save.

Nous avons passé un excellent séjour dans l'appartement. Les lieux correspondent à la description donnée. Il y a tout ce qu'il faut pour être comme à la maison. Le bâtiment est calme malgré l'ascenseur un peu bruyant.
Enrique est ponctuel et il a été facile de dialoguer (en Anglais) avec lui.
Je recommande donc.

We had a great stay in the apartment. It correspond to the description given. Everything you need to be at home. The building is quiet despite the elevator a bit noisy.
Enrique is timely and it was easy to talk (in English) with him.
I recommend.

L'appartement est très bien situé. Il y a 3 bus juste en bas de l'immeuble qui emmènent aux lieux principaux : plage, place Catalunya (de là on peut marcher vers les lieux touristiques importants)...
Le Parc Güell et la Sagrada Familia ne sont pas très loin à pied. 
Enrique nous a très bien reçu et nous a laissé des bons de réductions; par conséquent on a pas eu besoin de prendre la Barcelona Card (la T10 est suffisante). 
On est resté 11 jours dans l'appartement et cela nous a permis pas mal d'économie et le petit plus à été la machine à laver ce qui nous a permis de laver les serviettes de plages, maillots, etc et avec le beau temps on peut les réutiliser le lendemain. 

Par contre comme cité dans un autre commentaire il ne faut pas avoir peur des montées. Il y a une grande pente du métro jusqu'à l'appartement mais Barcelone est ainsi faite et il y a le bus si vous ne voulez pas affronter la montée. 
De plus l’inconvénient peut être l'ascenseur que l'on entend et qui peut être désagréable à 5h du matin quand on à un sommeil fragile comme moi mais on s'y habitue à force.
Fantastico! Appartamento molto bello e pulito! 5 minuti da metro! Vista stupenda! Perfetto per una coppia. Gracias de todo!

Just spent 4 days in the appartment of Enrique. The one room appartment is simple but fine. But the absolute highlight is the view from the terras! That is priceless. Sitting in the sun with a glass of wine overlooking the whole city. Loved it! The neighbourhood is not special but safe and fine. The metro is about 10 minutes walk (up/downhill) but there are some busses stopping right in front of the appartment door stopping everywhere in the city you want to go. There are supermarkets and bakery's around the corner. Enrique is à great host. We never met him but he answered our questions immediately.
We spent an amaizing week in that apartment. The place is great for a couple. The view is fantastic - those breakfasts on the terrace - unforgettable. We had a great time and we were sorry to leave.

This house was just perfect, the view of barcelona that you can see from the terrace is priceless and the area in which it is located is well connected to the city center and very close to Park Guell and the Sagrada Familia. Enrique is been very nice to us and he was always willing to help us,whenever we asked him about restaurants in the city etc. I would definitely reccomend this place!
Host was able to accommodate us on very short notice and was very good with his communication. I would deal with Enrique again.

name: Casa "Voltaria", o desejo de voltar
summary: Apartamento T3 duplex, com capacidade para 4 pessoas + 1 bebé. Localização excelente para explorar a cidade do Porto e os arredores. Os principais pontos turísticos ficam à distancia de uma agradável caminhada a pé.

host.location: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto District, Portugal

loc.address: Vila Nova de Gaia, Porto, Portugal

reviews.txt: Très bien accueilli chez Fatima dont l'appartement en duplex est très proche du centre de Porto (pont Eiffel et des caves à vins). Une bouteille de Porto nous attendait dans l'appartement. Place de parking facile dans la rue devant l'appartement. Tickets de métro à recharger mis à disposition.

Sem dúvida que o nome "casa "voltaria"" se aplica! Óptimas condições, óptima localização e a Fátima foi super simpática e prestável. Recomendo a 200%! Até agora a minha melhor experiência Airbnb. Tinha de ser em Portugal :)

Fatima est très agréable ! Dès notre arrivé nous avons été accueilli chaleureusement est avec en prime une bonne bouteille de Porto ainsi que des Pastel Nata. 
L’appartement est très fidèle aux photos est même mieux en vrai. Le quartier est très bien situé proche de toutes les commodités et du métro. 
Séjour super que je recommande. Encore merci à Fatima pour son hospitalité et sa disponibilité. :)

Nous avons été accueillis chaleureusement par Fatima, avec de gentilles attentions. Elle nous a donné toutes les explications nécessaires pour nos déplacements dans Porto et des lieux à visiter.
L'appartement est très bien situé, proche des commerces et des transports publics. Il est conforme aux descriptions et aux photos de l'annonce.
Fatima et son mari ont été très disponibles et réactifs à toutes nos demandes.

Accueil très chaleureux, tout est fait pour se sentir comme à la maison.
Petites attentions comme boisson fraiche, petits gateaux dès notre arrivée.
Conseils pour visiter Porto , brochures et  plans à disposition.
Aide pour traduire des infos du Français en Portugais se qui nous à bien aider 
pendant notre périple au Portugal .

Un grand MERCI à Fatima et Hugo qui nous ont reçu par un accueil chaleureux, très sympathique. Ils ont su faciliter notre séjour.  Leur logement très bien situé,  est agréable, soigné et possède tout le confort. Super prestation que nous recommandons sans hésiter !

Nous venons de passer 5 jours formidables dans l'appartement de Fatima et Hugo. Idéalement situé dans un quartier très calme à 5 minutes à pied du centre-ville de Porto par le pont Dom-Luis, cet appartement est vraiment très sympa (petits-déjeuners sur le balcon tous les matins, chambres spacieuses,...). Fatima et Hugo quant à eux sont des hôtes extrêmement agréables :  ils aiment recevoir, nous accueillent avec tout un tas de délicieuses attentions... et ont toujours cherché à nous rendre le séjour le plus agréable possible.  On s'est véritablement sentis comme chez nous. Tout était parfait!!! Merci encore à vous deux Fatima et Hugo pour votre disponibilité et votre gentillesse.

Fatima et sa famille sont charmants 
Très agréable maison près de tout 
A recommander

Nous avons été accueillis très chaleureusement avec une envie de partager des choses. Fatima est quelqu'un d adorable et plein de bienveillance. Le logement est très agréable,  calme, propre et donne envie de rester plus longtemps. Nous étions avec nos 2 enfants petits et le lieu est parfait pour une famille.
The host canceled this reservation 112 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

name: Charming Private Brooklyn Bedroom
summary: We have a spare bedroom for rent, in our cozy, beautiful, clean and comfortable two bedroom apartment. It's located right in the  heart of Greenpoint, one of Brooklyn's hottest/coolest neighborhoods at the moment. Please note, we're on the third floor, so if stairs are an issue, keep that in mind. Thanks.

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: I'm a writer and an administrator at a pre-school in Union Square. I wrote a novel that was published in 2012 called the Sleepy Hollow Family Almanac and my second novel, The Antiques, published in January 2017.

reviews.txt: We had a great time staying at  Kris' place! He was a wonderful host and his projector was awesome! My boyfriend and I would definitely stay there again if we ever went back to NY!
Kris and Kristen were great hosts! Very friendly, accommodating and helpful. The listing is close to just about anywhere you'd want to be in Greenpoint, and easily accessible by train.

Magnifique logement bien situé, avec grande chambre, très calme et literie très confortable.
La cuisine est bien équipée et le comptoir convivial pour les repas.
Kris nous a accueilli chaleureusement et a été très flexible sur l'heure d'arrivée et de départ.
Hôte vivement recommandé ! Et quartier à découvrir absolument !

We had a wonderful stay at Kris' place! It was extremely homey, clean, orderly, and inviting. Unfortunately, we did not get a chance to meet Kris and his girlfriend because they were out of town for the weekend. However, they were very easy to reach during our stay, were willing to answer any questions we had, and were accommodating even at a distance! My boyfriend and I fell in love with the Greenpoint area and would love to visit again!

My best friend and I stayed here for the weekend. Kris and Kristen were excellent hosts! Very fast response time, super accomodating and just great people all around. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone who needs a place to stay in Williamsburg. Thanks again for opening up your home to us!

I had a great experience staying at Kris' apartment! Kris was quick to respond during the booking and "check in" process which I appreciated, and he and his girlfriend were friendly and nice to be around during my stay. I didn't spend much time in the apartment but the room was exactly as pictured and a perfect place for me to come back and relax. The apartment location is fantastic and I was able to explore a lot of Greenpoint by foot - it's an awesome neighborhood and definitely worth spending some time here!
Kris was very helpful helping me get the key and the apartment is nice and clean and quiet. Bed was very comfortable.
Very awesome experience.

Kris ans Kristen appartment was very well located in Greenpoint. Their street is quiet and the neighborhood felt very peaceful. Communication was very easy with our hosts throughout the weekend and before. The apartment is very clean, and we thought it was decorated with a lot of taste. Thank you again Kris and Kristen!
Listing was accurate.  Quiet street, helpful hosts.

Kris was very responsive and welcoming. The location is 5 minutes walk away from the Greenpoint subway station which was very convenient, and the listing was exactly as shown in the pictures. Very quiet neighborhood and comfy bed.

Kris was a very good host, he and his girlfriend were very helpfull and nice persons. The place was exactly the same as in description, very clean near to subway. Also it was in quiet and lovely neighbourhood. We will definitely recommend this host!
Everything was as advertised and suited us perfectly.

Kris was easy to communicate with and flexible with check-in/check-out time. I felt safe and comfortable. The area is great, a block from the Expo center. I was in town for a conference and it was very convenient. Overall a really great experience.
Kristin & Kris, were so kind and understanding to our situation. I appreciated the continuous communication. Very nice couple and a great place to stay.

This is a really nice room in a really nice apartment in a really nice part of Greenpoint. It's a 15 minutes walk to L train station at Bedford avenue that gets you in no time to Manhattan. So if you want to avoid hustle and bustle of Williamsburg, this is a great alternative. The hosts are great and will make you feel very welcome in their apartment.
Great location, lovely room, comfy bed, and responsive host. But if you have lots of luggage or some health issues, be aware the apartment is 3-flights up.
Kris was a great host!

Pros: Quiet residential street, easy access to nearby shops and subway, clean apartment and comfortable bed, super-friendly hosts.
Cons: none! Would absolutely stay here again.

We had an amazing stay at Kris'. The place was as described, clean and confortable. The neighborhood is great with a lot to do. Kris and his girlfriend are very welcoming and friendly. We definitely recommend this place!

name: Tamarama Penthouse apartment
summary: If you want to be close by Tamarama and Bondi, this is the Beach Pad for you. Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac and only a stone's throw to the beach they call "Glamarama" and minutes walk away from Bondi and Bronte Beaches.

host.about: I am a Executive Producer based in Sydney that works in advertising and cross-media entertainment.

reviews.txt: Lizzy's Tamarama pad is a truly outstanding property.  It's amazingly well equipped, spacious, with stunning outlook (from an enormous terrace) and its beautifully maintained.  Lizzy is an absolute pleasure to deal with.  This is a unique property with a wonderful relaxed feel to it.  Also a perfect place to get some serious work done - its quite inspiring.

Lizzy was the best host, and we fell in love with her beautiful home in the best spot in Sydney.  
Her home is beautifully equipped with everything you need for a beach holiday, and Lizzy is just downstairs if you need anything. Tamarama beach is literally a 2 minute walk, and our kids spent a lot of time playing in the grassy patch if they weren't catching waves! We have had the best holiday and will definitely be back.

What a place!! What a host!! It s a dream, watching the beach earing the see lying on a dayboat bed. The place is huge and very close to amazing beaches and beautiful costal promenades... lizzie was a super host, very helpfull and carefull about us having a good time. 
The terrasse is superb
This place is marvellous!! We had a fantastic family time there we wont forgett

The big question for me is would I want to stay here again, and the answer is yes - in a heartbeat.

To watch the sun rise over Tamarama beach from the comfort of all the cushions in the 'boat' in the sitting room was a delight. Not an early riser? Don't worry, the lorikeets will have you up in plenty of time....!
Set between Bondi beach and Bronte beach which are easy to walk to. Superb local beach for family and easy to grab an uber to the city. really enjoyed the location and weather.

This place is pure magic! I had the most wonderful time with family and we had everything we needed in the house. The location the quiet and friiendly neighbourhood and the spectacular view of the ocean day and night makes this place a MUST to experience. Add to that a gracious host to welcone you and who is always around to assist. Highly recommended for families!

We had an fantastic stay in Lizzy's apartment. The location was excellent and Lizzy was so helpful and accommodating (making sure we had some breakfast provisions after we arrived late at night which was so very much appreciated). The apartment was more than spacious enough for our family of 5. The worst thing about this apartment was having to leave those amazing views behind when we left! I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone else and would stay here again.

Great place right on Tamara Beach. Very cosy and great host who kept in contact prior and through our visit making it very comfortable for us. Easy check in, nice walking areas & very close to cafe's Bondi and surrounding beaches, Bondi Junction for shopping and an easy drive to City. Big spacious apartment with beautiful views and good entertaining areas. And a nice day bed (boat) overlooking beach for the perfect afternoon nap.

We could have really beautiful time with my family in Lizzy's apartment.
The view was so wonderful that we enjoyed day and night at balcony.
For my 3 years old baby,everything is perfect. We wanna be back someday.
We really appreciate Lizzy's kindness and helpfulness.
Thank you for everything.

This is a fantastic apartment. The view is to die for. It’s very large. It has great facilities. And Lizzy is really helpful. We couldn’t have asked for a better place to stay. We came with 2 very small kids looking for a chilled out holiday in a cool area - this was perfect. Can’t wait to come back.
Lizzy's place is fantastic! Beautiful view of Tamarama beach and only minutes walk from lots of shops and restaurants on Bondi road. Apartment is full of beautiful touches. Highly recommended!

Great host, hospitality and place to stay at. We had a group of 5 and there was plenty of room. Would definitely recommend for anyone looking to visit Sydney and the eastern beaches.
Thanks Lizzy!

If you’re looking for a truly magical stay in Tama this is the place. During our week long stay we never wanted to leave the apartment that was peaceful and zen like. We enjoyed our mornings checking the surf from the balcony and then walking barefoot to the beach for multiple swims. 

Truly it’s a slice of heaven.

Lizzys house is an amazing spot in sydney.
Tamarama is so nice and close to bronte pool that i personally lovee
Also lizZy have alot of details with us. She is always responding in a small time!
The house is just perfect!
We are looking forward to come back
I really love this place and fully recomend it!!!!

Such a wonderful stay! Lizzy’s apartment is the best place to  stay in the Eastern Suburbs. Convenient, very clean, perfect for families and just above the beach! Last but not least, Lizzy is a great host, making sure we had all what we needed and very responsive. Thank you again for a wonderful stay!

This apartment is excellent - location is a stone's throw to the beach, coastal walk and great cafes, fantastic view, and a really well kept, comfortable and complete apartment for a family.  Thoroughly recommended

Lizzy's place is just perfect! It is beautifully decorated and has a lovely calm and airy atmosphere. Very well appointed with everything you would need and a lovely balcony and day bed boat over looking the beach to chill. We took our two small children and it is a very baby/child friendly space. We were very comfortable and I would definitely recommend Lizzy's place and should we be in Sydney again we would definitely stay there.
The house was beautiful and Lizzy was the most attentive host. The view from the house was heavenly and the neighborhood was perfect. Highly recommend!
Lizzy is a wonderful and kind host,  her plac is walking-distane to a great park and beach, fifteen minute to bondi beach as well
We loved staying at Lizzy’s place!  The location was fantastic!  The view from the apartment was spectacular!  Super cool Home and we especially loved the boat “couch” in the living room!

name: IPANEMA LUXURY PENTHOUSE with MAID
summary: IPANEMA Penthouse is located in the most famous and trendy area of Rio de Janeiro. It has a unbreathtake view of the Lake, Redimer Christ, Pedra da Gavea and 2 Irmãos mountains. Great for 2 people! If 4 (we can put 2 inflate coushion at the floor)

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Eu sou Designer, adoro viajar e adoro os finais de tarde na praia em Ipanema. 
Sejam bem vindos ao Rio de Janeiro.

I am objects designer and plastic artist and love travelling. I simply love hosting people! Welcome in Rio!

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Cesar goes well above and beyond to make his guests feel comfortable. He personally greeted me, recommended some restaurants (I went to one and had amazing sushi) and showed patiently how the pool and refrigerator work. The apartment looks even better than on the pictures. I especially loved the rooftop with 360 view. I really had a good chance to relax and unwind in Cesars place. One thing to mention is that the apartment has a great energy all round, I would highly recommend it to anyone.

This is my second time staying at Cesars place, this time for about a week. The reason I came back is because besides marvelous view and the setup the place has this amazing energy which is especially rejuvenating after a stressful work period back in NYC. Wherever you are in the apartment your eyes are almost constantly facing the green if the trees, water and the Christo statue in the background which is very relaxing. 

During my starving was around 35C in Rio so I spend a good time in the pool which is very deep, clean and enjoyable. Tivesse so good I barely went to the gym which is literally minutes away. 

Cesar was super kind, he is definitely not your regular Airbnb host. As he knows I like to cook potatoes he showed me how to cook Mandioca Brazilian potatoes with shrimps. It was an unforgettable cooking and gastronomic experience. 

I will certainly come back again next time I am in Ipanema.

Excelente localização, seguro e tranquilo. O apto é maravilhoso. Excelente vista e as fotos correspondem fielmente ao local! O anfitrião é muito atencioso, pontual e tudo muito bem detalhado! Vale a pena mesmo!
Muito obrigado!

O apartamento do Cesar é um sonho carioca! Com o Corcovado, o morro dois irmãos, a mesa do imperador e a lagoa todos no seu campo de visão! A recepção foi primorosa, a Patricia é uma assistente que nos ajudou em tudo além de preparar um delicioso café da manhã! (Voltar da Sapucai cansado e ter um café fresquinho com um pão de queijo quentinho te esperando não tem preço!!!) Recomendo fortemente e iremos voltar com certeza! Simplesmente sem pontos negativos! Obrigado Cesar e Patrícia!

Cesar é super tranquilo, educado e simpático.  Fez de tudo para tornar a hospedagem agradável. O apartamento é incrível! Super de bom gosto e com uma das vistas mais lindas que já vi no Rio. Super recomendo!!!

O espaço do Cesar é incrível.
* Bem localizado, com facil acesso a Lagoa / praia / restaurantes.
* Seguro (rua sem saida).
* Tem uma vista vista da Lagoa / Cristo Redentor que é única
* Bem decorado
* Reservado (voce fecha a porta da cozinha e tem o apartamento todo pra voce)
* O café da manhã da Patricia torna a experiencia ainda mais exclusiva.
* O Cesar é super atencioso e disponível, possui diversas dicas do bairro e do RJ que nos ajudaram no passeio.

Voltarei, com certeza!

Very nice and well decorated appartment with a speechless view of Rio! We didnt have the chance to meet Cesar but he was very available and helpful by phone and (Hidden by Airbnb) . He is for sure a super host!

Was an excellent experience right from the start. Cesar was very attentive and took care of our well-being more than he needed to: he offered breakfast and even supper during our stay. He was also giving great recommendations to restaurants. Would go back again!

This was a great apartment in Rio waking up every morning to a great view.  Great location close to the nightlife but just far enough away to avoid the noise.  I highly recommend this apartment to anyone.  The pool was a nice touch on hot days.

Ceaser's place is very much a rooftop penthouse. Beautiful original art pieces and wonderful furniture. Great to hangout on the roof or in the pool. Best of all though is the service his housekeeper offers. Breakfast every morning. Laundry items. And ceaser even cooked us a meal one day. Lovely place. Luxury living! We will be back
A estadia foi otima e nós só temos a agradecer ao Cesar pela simpatia e hospitalidade. O apartamento é incrível e super bem localizado. Foi uma ótima experiência e esperamos poder repetir em breve.
Cesar esteve sempre disponível, disponibilizou alguns itens extras, que tornaram nossa estadia ainda mais agradável. O espaço é maravilhoso, com uma vista incrível.

Cesar was an amazing host and his place was great! He was super helpful with suggestions and very accessible any time we needed anything. We ended up trying all the restaurants he recommended and weren’t disappointed! The place is fantastic and we made daily use of the pool and rooftop patio, both which had amazing views and were kept very well. We would definitely stay there next visits to Rio!

Cesar’s place was fantastic.  The views could not have been better. The apartment is designed beautifully and located on a quiet tree lined street. Ana, the maid, made us a wonderful breakfast every morning. Wonderful Airbnb!

Demorei bastante tempo a encontrar um hotel/apartamento  onde ficar no Rio de Janeiro. 
E não podia estar mais satisfeita com a escolha que fiz. 
O apartamento é exactamente o que se vê nas fotografias, super cool, num bairro bastante acessível e charmoso de Ipanema, rodeado de boas ofertas. E claro, a mencionar a vista indescritível para a Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas. Saudade!
O Cesar elevou a fasquia de Airbnb ao incluir pequeno-almoço diário na estadia. Um acto que muda a experiência e de uma simpatia irrepreensível.
Obrigada Cesar e anseio voltar muito em breve!   
Abraço, 
Mariana Colaço
Absolutely loved it - stunning place, superb amenities, great location and incredible views. Cesar is a great host - would love to stay again!

The view is FANTASTIC
The host is very very sweet
The pool and location is very nice.
thank you

Este lugar é único! O apartamento é muito confortável e tem uma vista incrível para o Rio de Janeiro. Fotos não fazem justiça. O café da manhã também é de primeira. A convivência com o Cesar é tranquilíssima e ele fez questão de que estívessemos sempre confortáveis. As dicas de restaurantes e turismo dele foram excelentes. Ele e a Ana também foram muito flexíveis com nossos horários.

My husband and I had a wonderful time at Cesar’s place. The location and condo are unique and the views are amazing. The condo is on a beautiful quiet street but within a short walk to beaches, restaurants, shopping, running paths and more. 

Cesar was a great host! He provided us with tons of helpful tips about the city, activities, and restaurants. He was easy to communicate with and always available for any questions we had. He definitely made us feel welcome, making us a great little meal when we arrived. 

To top it off, Anna, his maid, made us a traditional Brazilian breakfast in the mornings. 

Can’t say enough good things about our experience.

name: Charmante chambre - Berri Uqam
summary: Au sein du village de Montréal. A moins de 5 minutes du métro Berri UQAM et/ou Beaudry. Proche de toutes les commodités (Dépanneur, IGA, Dollarama). Juste à côté de la rue Ste-Catherine. Vous pouvez rejoindre le vieux port en 15-20 minutes à pied.

reviews.txt: Maelle a été facile à joindre.  L'appartement était propre, la chambre spacieuse et le lit très confortable.  Malgré l'emplacement près du quartier latin nous n'avons pas eu de difficulté à trouver un stationnement à proximité.  Nous y retourneront assurément ! Nous recommandons fortement.
Cute flat, nice housemates and close to a big metro hub to get you anywhere in Montreal. Thanks guys!

Même si nous n'avons pas eu l'occasion de rencontrer Maëlle, elle a tout fait pour que notre séjour se passe au mieux. Elle est très attentionnée (à la fin de notre séjour, elle nous a envoyé un dernier courriel pour savoir si tout s'était bien passé et si nous étions bien rentrés). Comme prévenu, on a été très gentillement accueilli par un de ses colocataires, Gautier, qui n'a pas hésité à répondre à nos questions lors du séjour. Les autres colocataires sont également très sympa. Bref, c'est une bonne adresse remplie de personnes gentilles et accueillantes.

Ce fut un agréable séjour, on a adoré la proximité des lieux, la chambre est bien confortable et la terrasse est magnifique.
Merci beaucoup Maëlle et à bientôt

name: 3 Quartos Ipanema c/Piscina
summary: Apartamento de luxo com três quartos localizado na área mais famosa de Ipanema, próximo da praia, Lagoa e dos melhores bares e restaurantes da cidade.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: The apartment is very comfortable and has excellent facilities in the building. On top of that the location is amazing and you can go walking to the beach, stores, supermarket, bars, etc. Lucas was an amazing host, very easy to connect with and always ready to help. I will definitely come back!
Muy buen departamento con todos los servicios, a 4 cuadras de la playa y a 2 del centro. La atención del anfitrión excelente y de destacar !!! Muy recomendable !!!

O apartamento é extremamente bem localizado, confortável e possui tudo que é necessário para uma estadia plena. O Lucas foi desde o começo super solícito e prestativo. Eu e minhas amigas adoramos o período que passamos no apartamento e já queremos voltar!
Todo muy bien
Great place and perfect location!

name: great Terrace&lift city center
summary: Bright, calm, quiet, comfortable, terrace, balcony gas heater, air conditioning, hot water, elevator, our dream, Heritage, walking distance to most important hot spots. Pedestrian streets, lively squares, modernism, Gaudi.....

host.about:
I'm Corius, traveller, friendly, sportive...
My best destination ever Papua
I like ride horses, sailing,running,skiing,scuba dive...

reviews.txt:
Patricia is very easy to communicate and a helpfull host!
The appartment is in a perfect area, quite and safe but very nice and easy to get everywere. We stayed 4 days and had all we need.
If its hot its great to have the little Terrace.
We recommend to take bikes, its real fun.
Thank you Patricia Jeanette and Nils

Patricia was a wonderful and very helpful host, she showed us where to go for groceries and good food and helped us book taxi's when the language barrier became a problem!

The apartment itself was beautiful, very centrally located, well kept and clean. We had plenty of space and the apartment had two terraces and a lovely kitchen.

Gracia is a beautiful part of Barcelona, thank you for making our stay so lovely!

Divya and Yvette
Quartere fantastico, Casa accogliente, tutti molto disponibili.

My wife and I stayed at Patricia's apartment in Gracia with our 9 months old son and we had a fantastic stay. 

Gracia is our new favourite area of Barcelona and the apartment is close to everything. We especially enjoyed the fantastic sushi place right next door that allows you to do take away which is perfect whenn travelling with a small child and the city square just 30 meters away. 

Patricia is a fabulous host and she even provided us with a baby cot and a baby chair for our son, so we didnt have to worry about that. That made the trip a lot more relaxing. 

If you plan to do more cooking, the kitchen could need a bit more equipment and we could for example only find 2 wine glasses and a limited number of kitchen utensils, but we nevertheless managed. 

All in all we really enjoyed our stay and we recommend Patricia as a great host. 

Best, Thomas, Mette and Theodor.

Hemos estado muy agusto en este piso! Estamos muy gratamente sorprendidos!
El barrio no puede tener mas encanto, centrico, con mucha vidilla, cerca de todo, en fin ideal para unos dias en barcelona. 
El piso es muy mono pero ademas muy muy comodo. 
Los anfitriones un encanto que se han volcado con nosotros 
Yo les doy un 10!

I stayed with my family (husband and daughter) in Patricia' apartment.  We were specifically looking for a quiet place not far from the center.  And we realized that it was quite difficult to find such place in Barcelona.  But Patricia's apartment was exactly what we were looking for.  It's located in Gracia disctrict which is 5 minutes walk from Passage de Gracia (one of the main streets of Barcelona which brings you to the Cataloniya square).  But at the same time it's a district where local people leave and it has a charm old Barcelona - historical buildings, nice cosy squares full of life, plenty of food shops and even market with fresh sea food, vegetables and Spanish specialities.  This is exactly the place where you can feel the real, not turistic Barcelona.  We felt very comfortable and safe there.  The apartment is simple but has everything you need - 2 big comfortable bads, kitchen with oven, microwave and all the necessary utensils.  There is also washing machine but we did not use it.  In one of sleeping rooms there is a small cosy balcony where you can enjoy your glass of wine or breakfest.  Due to the fact that both sleeping-rooms windows looks to the patio, it's absolutely quiet at night.  And you can only hear a sound of old clock which goes from the clocktower on the neighboring square which is the main square of Gracia district.  That gives you a wonderfull feeling of being in another century.  So, we got all we have expected and even more:).  And Patricia was also great as host.  We had only one problem with wi-fi in the first day which she fixed immediately that day.  It was very easy and comfortable for us to communicate with Patricia.  So, we would recommend her appartment to those who want to enjoy real Barcelona in a comfortable and quiet way:).

Patricia was a great communicator - no waiting for answers - everything went smoothly. Unit was clean and had plenty of room - we loved its location very close to a beautiful old square full of locals - lucky enough to see one of their traditional parades. It was a metro ride away from the Gothic and Born areas of Barcelona - very easy to get to these places. Not far from Gaudi's Cathedral. We liked the fact we were away from the crowds of tourists. Streets around are narrow and quiet. Unit was very good value.

What an amazing stay we had at Patricia's charming little aptt! It was clean, with all the amenities. It was just as mentioned in the listing. She welcomed us and also gave us some useful tips to navigate Barcelona. The Kabuki Sushi restt right below the Aptt was recommended by her and it was absolutely amazing. It was a safe and in one of the most desirable neighborhood's (Garcia) of Barcelona. Supermarket and a few bars were all within walking distance.
We loved both Patricia and her apartment. We could not have been better cared for and will definitely use them again next time!
Patricia and her friend were very cooperative and helpfull. the flat was really nice and clean - a good place to explore barcelona. we had a good time and can recommend this place.

I stayed with my mum there, and Patricias flat was perfect for us two! She gave us a lot of informations and even recommended us her favourite restaurants - so kind and helpful! 
The appartment was clean and in a lovely neighbourhood, I'd love to come back!

My parents and I had a really lovely stay at Patricia's apartment. It is in a fantastic neighborhood in Barcelona, far from tourists and very local but still relatively close to everything we wanted to do. There is a great market right nearby and a lovely square with a few nice cafés and a dynamite charcuteria. The apartment itself is very comfortable, with a nice terrace. Be aware that the lift is up a few steps from the entrance. 

Patricia was great to work with as well. We didn't meet her (her boyfriend let us in), but she was ready and happy to accommodate a short-notice extra person who almost joined us there.

We had a great stay at Patricia's flat! It was very comfortable for 4 people. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen wad very well-equipped for people who like to cook, like me! We really loved sitting on the terrace in the morning to drink our coffee. The place wad also really clean and it wad nice to have the option of air conditioning or windows open, as it can sometimes be very hot in Barcelona at night. Patricia was very welcoming and offered to order a taxi to pick us up at the airport. I love the neighborhood of Gracia. There are many interesting shops, restaurants and bars, not to mention 4 plaças and 2 great food markets. It is a quick metro ride to the rest of the city, but with a lot to offer in itself! To sum up, a perfectly located place to explore Barcelona! I recommend anyone to stay here.
Patricia and Jorge are extremely accommodating and helpful. We enjoyed every minute of our stay. The apartment is very comfortable and has everything you need. I highly recommend!

Patricia was lovely and friendly over email and then meeting her. The apartment is a lovely, spacious place to stay in the best area. A square with restaurants, ham and cheese delis, bakery and markets right on your doorstep! Would definitely stay there again

Patricia was a wonderful host.  Our flight had arrived way earlier than the scheduled check in time. And she was more than accommodating to letting us check in sooner. She was very helpful with tips and a map ready for us to go explore the town! The flat is exactly as pictured and described! She came in with new linens and glassware.
Super clean  and in a great location. Neighborhood was nice. It was great to get an authentic feel of a real Barcelona neighborhood away from all the tourist stuff.
Very nice appartement. Many thanks, Patricia!

I enjoyed life in Varcelona.  Nice clean place with children. You can use free wifi and clean kitchen. Traffic is also good and you can find many nice restaurant.  George and Patricia are very kind and helpful^^.

The flat was as described and comfortable. Patricia was very kind and accommodating. She went out of her way to help us. We did have some trouble with the washing machine not working properly but she rushed over quickly to help us resolve the problem.
Barrio Gracia was everthing we thought it would be and some.......great address,walking distance from the mayor attractions in Barcelona!!! Supermarkets are nearby and also good Restaurants.

name: CHARMING PRACTICAL RELAXING IPANEMA
summary: CHARMING QUIET SAFE PRACTICAL 1 double bed + 1 single mattress if needed  WIFI - TV - Air Conditioning - Fans in all rooms - Washing machine American equipped kitchen 5 min of the Beach and the Lagoon Restaurants,Bus and Metro nearby walking!

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about:
Native from north of France, Life leads me to Brasil 21 years ago and have been "Carioca" since 2001 - Living in the Marvellous City of Rio de Janeiro 
I evoluated from Computer Engineering to Yoga Teacher and now Conferencist,  Self Realization Mediation and Energetic Balancing & ThetaHealing Therapist.
Like nature, movement, dance contact, music (singer), Photography and cooking...
Each time more invested in balancing Body Mind and Soul, in everyday life!
I like receiving people at home and sharing what I like, and looking for making my guest feeling well in my apartment to enjoy their stay in a cool and secure way.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt: Christine was a great host from beginning; good communication, flexible checkin, answered any questions. Her apartment was a very peaceful oasis in a beautiful area of Ipanema. Apartment was larger than I expected, clean, comfortable bed, a/c and fans, wood floors, overall nice vibe and surrounded by Ganesha images. One direction was a few blocks to the beach, another to nice shopping in Leblon or for a jog around the lagoon. I did not need to take taxi anywhere, subway station was a few blocks away and everything I needed was within walking distance. I would highly recommend to a respectful guest looking for tranquility and a quality stay in Rio De Janeiro.
Absolutely no complaints. Very well kept, clean and nice apartment in a very good location. The area is very safe as well, and only about a 10 minute walk from Ipanema beach. I highly recommend it!
Great location in Ipanema, very safe too. Christine is very sweet and helpful.
On a guarded residence, pleasant apartment comfy and really well located,  very close to Ipanema beach and the lagoon. Kind of place that make you feel like home.

Muy buena & tranquila ubicación en el barrio de Ipanema, el apartamento es lindo y tal y como aparece en las fotos con todo lo que uno necesita para pasar unos días. Christine es muy simpática, flexible y disponible.

O apartamento é igual às fotografias do anúncio. Muito bem decorado e bem localizado em Ipanema, numa rua super tranquila.
A Cristiane foi muito atenciosa connosco, Recomendo a todos os hóspedes este apartamento.

L'appartamento e comodissimo e molto accogliente. Si trova in una strada alberata e silenziosa, vicino a ristoranti, negozi e molto vicino alla spiaggia di Ipanema. La zona é molto sicura. Christine é stata gentile, disponibile e solerte nelle risposte. Un' opzione raccomandabile.

Pasamos una muy linda estadía en el departamento de christine. Es muy limpio y comodo, tal cual se ve en las fotos.
Su ubicación es muy conveniente ya que esta a pocas cuadras de la playa de ipanema y también de la de copacabana y cerca de la estación de metro.
Christine fue muy amable, se adapto a nuestro horario de llegada y nos dio el departamento en perfectas condiciones.
Con respecto a Rio me gustaría conocer la ciudad fuera de la época de carnaval también, seguramente sea una experiencia totalmente diferente.

Our trip in Rio was really good, the city is amazing snd the Olympic atmosphere increased is beauty. The place is very well located on a backroad in Ipanema, which in my opinion is the best area to stay in Rio.

Regarding the flat location and value for money are the critical success factor. It was a really good deal seeing the prices durong the Games. The flat itself is decent, nothing fancy. It has some lacks here and there, but it's still good for a short time when you are travelling and spending most of the time outside.

Christine is really nice and helpful. She makes sure everything is alright and the communication with her is really easy and efficient.

Christine was an amazing host for us. We went to Rio for the Games and hence had HEAPS of questions about getting around, security etc. and she was very helpful in answering those. We arrived at midnight and had no trouble find the unit or getting in. Communication with Christine was fast and easy. The unit is lovely and very comfortable. GREAT location. Easy walk to shops, cafes, restaurants, the beach, subway etc. Ipanema is a lovely neighbourhood and felt very safe while we were there (and the people very friendly and helpful).

Great flat in a great location! The beach is a short walk away and Ipanema has a good choice of restaurants and is always very lively. It is also a great place to go all around Rio with the metro. 

Christine is a great host and suggested a number of nice places to go to!
Muy lindo apartamento, cómodo, cerca del metro y la playa.

A nice cozy apartment perfect for short stays in Ipanema.  I chose affordability over luxury and all my expectations were met.  Christine is very friendly and helped resolve a small issue I encountered in the apartment even though she was away on a trip.

Cést un trés bonne choix. Le appartement a resulté plus grand que sur les fotos et trés comfortable por nous. La cuisine est parfaitement compléte. Nous avons aimé le quartier parce que tout est proche, mais dans un environment vraiment tranquille. Christine n'etait pas à Rio ces jours-la, mais on nous communiquait tout le temps. Je recomende!


This is a good choice! The appartement is really bigger than in photos and has resulted súper comfy for us. The kitchen is fully equiped por enthusiastic chefs. We loved the neighboorhood because  is close to everything but in a really calm environment. Christine wasn´t at Río during our stay but we were communicated all the time.
Nice place to be hosted at. Cozy and practical.

name: The Porto Concierge - White Martin
summary: Totally renewed and fully equipped apartment two minutes ahead the Metro Station (Estação S. Bento) entrance. Excellent location to visit Porto by any means! Free Wifi is available on all areas of the apartment. Towels and bed Linen are provided for your stay. Free luggage storage at The Porto Concierge - Welcome Center.

host.about: The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.The Porto Concierge ajuda os proprietários de imóveis que pretendem alugar as suas casas mas não têm a possibilidade de receber os seus convidados. Alugar uma casa é um trabalho árduo: garantir a sua limpeza e a manutenção da casa, receber os seus convidados quando chegam e estar disponível para eles durante a estadia. Se vive longe ou se simplesmente não tem tempo suficiente para fazer tudo isso, não se preocupe, nós podemos ajudar.

reviews.txt: We've been lucky to be the first ones to use the apartment!! All is new, great quality as per photos. Excellent location, really in city heart. We loved it and hope to come back soon. Thanks!

Cet appartement était vraiment superbe, très propre et très bien équipé! Beaucoup de lumière également! L'emplacement est vraiment idéal pour visiter. Il est très central donc tout se fait à pieds.
Merci pour tout!

Hi. The apartment is very nice as in the pics and situated in the perfect area - close to everything. It does not have heating as it states however as soon as we asked we were told they would bring us a heater asap. We were greeted nicely and introduced to the house and area. All in all very recommendable
Great communication with clean and neat apartment right in a great location. Thank you for everything!

We had a great time in Oporto. The apartment is in the centre and very easy to walk to all sites as well as just explore the streets. It is well furnished, comfortable bed, very clean and everything you need for a comfortable stay. A relaxing space to recoup after a big day and a nice perspective of the city from the small balcony. We will come again. Thanks.

The apartment is beautiful, immaculate and well located, a short walk from Sao Bento station and walking distance from most sights in Porto and the riverfront.  The welcome gift was appreciated, the kitchen was well equipped (although we ate out and didn't need to use it) and the apartment was exactly as described.  Isabel was a gracious host who kept in good communication.  There was a small issue with check-in (the concierge was late to drop off our keys) and if you are a light sleeper you may want to bring earplugs as noise from the upstairs neighbours tended to reverberate through the floorboards.  Overall, it was an excellent base for our short stay in Porto (far more authentic and beautiful than a hotel room) and we would be happy to return. Thank you.

The apartment is absolutely awesome, as you can see on the pics. It is in a great location to visit Porto. It was clean, the bed very comfortable and there is everything you need for a perfect stay. I would be definitely happy to return! 
Thanks Vania for being so kind and welcoming!
So far the place was great. It's well located, renovated decor, spacious and comfortable. It's also pretty well equipped. I'd definitely recommend that place for those looking for a cozy home.

Nice apartment with good location, we had a great stay there.
Be aware that there is no parking with the apartment, and we ended up spending  a lot of money on a parking garage. We recommend comparing prices for parking.

Tout à fait conforme à a description!Isabel a répondu à toutes mes questions avant notre voyage.
Séjour super.
Emplacement très pratique pour visiter Porto.
Très bel appartement, lumineux, bien décoré, propre, confortable.
Nous avons apprécier qu'Isabel mette à notre disposition un lit parapluie pour notre fils.
Petit bémol: le bruit de la rue! mais je crois que tous les appartements de Porto ne sont pas équipés du double vitrage.
Si je devais revenir à Porto, je retournerai sans hésitation dans cet appartement.

The apartment is just like the photos show. Very clean, confortable and bright. The location is perfect for visiting porto. The concierge who did the checkin was very nice and flexible for the meeting time. I recommend this apartment.

Our trip to Porto was great. The flat was in an amazing location that was very central. It was beautiful and very clean and the concierge service was wonderful at checkin. We very much appreciated the restaurant tips!

It was really nice! The apartament is in the city center and it's beautiful. It has everything you need and it's really new.
We stayed a weekend at Porto and we enjoyed it a lot. Such a beautiful city whith a big culture offer.
Although, it was really helpful the información about the city that fue agent told us.
Logement neuf. Nickel. Petit cadeau d'arrivée. Rue au coeur de la ville, animée, donc un peu bruyant parfois la nuit mais ça fait partie de cette vie de quartier. Très lumineux.
Apartamento muy bien situado, amplio, muy luminoso, limpio, bien equipado y perfecto para disfrutar Oporto. Tanto el recibimiento como la estancia fueron perfectas. 100% recomendable.

Our stay was very pleasant. The apartment was spacious and well equipped with fridge freezer, washing machine, hair dryer and kettle. The apartment was clean and located 3-5 minute walk from Sao Bento Railway station and 10 minute walk to the bus station. It is near all the major sites and a 15 minute walk to The Riberia with restaurants, boat trips and Port caves. 
The only suggestion would be for the concierge management, in that we were booked for a 15:30 check- in and were left waiting outside until 16:20 on the footpath/sidewalk until Louisa from the management company arrived, I understand traffic can be a problem, but would have appreciated a text or phone call as to the delay. I had to message the management service to find out any information and was only told someone was on the way - but no time indication.
We asked where would we find a grocery store and again Louisa did not have this information, nor recommendations. 
The door to the apartment jammed and she could not get it opened, luckily my husband was able to 'pound' on the door to help us get in. When we tested the door to get out of the apartment again, she was unable to open the door. If my husband had not been with me, I or any women would not be able to get in or out of the apartment. Louisa said she would report this problem and hopefully, it will be resolved before the next people arrive. 
I would recommend this apartment when visiting Porto for location, and general facilities in the apartment.

Isabella and her team are very professional and provided us any support and help.
The apartment is very nice and located in in center of Porto .

We had a pleasant stay and warm welcoming t the city by a nice reception, a city map and gifts. 
The street is a little bit noisy, you should make a compromise between quietness and distance to the city center trade off!

There are only two points that you should notice before choosing this apartment: check-in is flexible, but after 14:00. 
2. Under the house rules, the host requests to empty out the trash. It has been indicated that there is always a garbage deposit in the street nearby. We could not find it, on your check-in do not forget to ask the reception to show it to you!
We had a very nice stay. The apartment is very spacious, clean and comfortabel. We were friendly welcomed and the apartment is in a very central location.

Great location really close to the station and in the middle of town. Based on previous reviews i was expecting a noisy street outside but after 10pm or so it's pretty quiet in that respect. One thing not mentioned in previous reviews however is the noisy floorboards of the upstairs neighbours. Being wooden and bare (the floorboards) we were hearing (and feeling the vibrations of) the neighbours very clearly and they stayed up till around 2am every night we were there.

name: ECONOMIC APARTMENT
summary: Welcome to your home just in the heart of Istanbul... :)

host.about: .We would like to give you, your home or office comfort at More Residence. Modern decorated flats with open kitchen, shower and home sofa you can use as a home or office or home-office. More Residence is located in Taksim - Beyoglu district only 1 min. walking distance from amenities.

reviews.txt: Great place, near  Taksim Square, about 10 minutes from it by walking. Very polite, friendly and helpful host, we are impressed. Appartement is clean,big enough,with regular service. All in all-awesome! Thank you for everything. Regards from Marijana & Željko

name: Bondi Beach Dreaming 3-Bed House
summary: This peaceful house in North Bondi is 300m to the beach and a minute's walk to cafes and bars. With 3 bedrooms, (can sleep up to 8) it is perfect for families, friends and pets. The kitchen was recently renovated and a new lounge and chairs installed. The house has a peaceful, airy, laidback vibe  - a perfect beach retreat. Longer-term bookings encouraged. Parking for one car. A parking permit for a second car can also be obtained on request.

host.about: I like furry friends and stylish surrounds.

reviews.txt: Great House. Only there for two nights. Conveniently located good vibe

Our stay at Bondi was lovely. Cat welcomed me, was friendly and helpful. The house was very comfy. Close to the beach, coffee shops & cafes. Unfortunately the mozzies were a bother in the only bedroom without nets but this was overcome with extra spray.  And parking is a bother but that is how it is in Bondi. I can recommend and would stay there again.

We loved staying in this house. We had 4 sisters and our mother for a relaxing 5 night stay. There were two bathrooms which was perfect and the house was cosy and clean. Great little backyard for a few wines in the sun. Thank you.
Great house and location. Peaceful and comfortable - and close to the beach and Bondi buzz. Cat was welcoming and helpful. Fresh coffee and milk in fridge was a nice touch.
Great pad in the heart of Bondi. A Feeling of absolute calm when you walk in. Great proximity to the beach, cafes and bars. House has everything you need for a short or long stay.

It was great time at Cat's place. Very close to bondi beach about 5 mins walk. And quiet and relax beautiful place. I love to stay again when my next visit. My family was happy too:)
Thanks again Cat:)
Cats place is a very relaxing environment. Perfectly situated, close to the beach and shops. She's very helpful and always replies to your requests. You couldn't ask for a better house/host.

Cat's flat was ideal for our needs -- three generations visiting North Bondi together. Two bathrooms felt like luxury (as did the king size bed), and the flat was super convenient to great restaurants (Mamasan and Avila were both tasty in their own ways, and right around the corner) and the beach. Shopping and tasty gelato (our kids were staunch advocates for the Messina Gelato) were only a slight stone's throw further away on Hall St. 

Having coffee available in the morning was a particular treat (thank you again, Cat), and there were ample cookbooks to review if we had had the time to really use the kitchen. Communications with Cat were easy for checking in and out; we didn't need to trouble her during our visit because the replacement light bulbs were easy to find when one fixture burnt out. We would definitely consider staying here again.

Had a great weekend away with friends. Great house and location walking distance to cafes and the beach. Amenities were good and Cat also provided beach towels for us to use. Would definitely come back.

Cat was a great host. The house is lovely, very close to the beach, a great organic bakery and restaurants. The kitchen was well stocked with basic essentials and some cookbooks. Cat was very quick to help out when I couldn't find the water heater switch. Would definitely recommend this house for anybody who wants to stay at Bondi.

Myself and 5 friends stayed in the house for 4 nights and had a great time. The house is an amazing beach house. Good room sizes and lounge area. 3min walk to the beach and a wide range of cafes near by. 10/10!
The house is near the Bondi Beach,about 15minutes drive to City｡Nice house…

Cat was very flexible allowing us to check in early & leave our bags until later in the day when checking out. The house was great, it had everything we needed & Cat was very prompt with dropping over a hair dryer when we needed one! Such a relaxing space & so close to everything! Perfect for our girls trip. Would love to return in winter to make use of the great fireplace!

Wow! Cat's place is amazing, well located, lot of shops, coffees (Jed's is a dream) around, a perfect beach house! I'd love to come back very soon!! Cat was very flexible with the chek-out, we had an extra afternoon at beach.
Cat was extremely attentive in providing for my families needs. She was flexible with check in times and the house was well presented and very much as described. A lovely experience.

Spacious beautiful Australian home. Its location couldn't have been any better; the beach, bus stop, and grocery store were only a short walk away. Cat was very accommodating, had a well kept home, and fast internet. Our only regret was that we couldn't stay longer.

The place was beautiful and so so close to the beach and cafes! It was the perfect girls weekend away and we all left feeling super relaxed! The place is exactly like the pictures. I've already recommended Cat's place to many friends. Thanks Cat.

Cat made us feel really welcome, the house was clean and tidy, great facilities and great location, close to the beach but not on a busy road.  The house was ideal for us, two families and our mother in the 'annex'. We would definitely recommend the property and would return.
Relaxed vibe, perfect for families or couples, fabulous location, close to great shops, restaurants and iconic Bondi Beach.

From start to finish, our stay at Bondi Beach Dreaming was enjoyable.  It was homely and comfortable and kitted out with just about everything you could possibly need.  Will definitely book again here.  It is a short walk to Bondi beach, and shops, bars and cafes.  It felt safe, secure and private.  The beds and linen were comfortable and high quality, and the overall feel, was like being at our "home away from home".

name: Private apartment, small and comfortable.
summary: We are close to the International Airport of Rio de Janeiro, with easy transport access and in a safe neighborhood, close to bars, markets, pharmacies and etc. The lease is for the whole apartment, it will make you feel more at home.

host.location: Rio de Janeiro, State of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
host.about: Gosto de receber pessoas, fazer amizades e mostrar um pouquinho dessa cidade maravilhosa onde vivo.

loc.address: Rio de Janeiro, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

reviews.txt:
A minha estadia foi a melhor possível. Recomendo muito a escolha. Ambiente aconchegante e perfumado, de muito bom gosto, bem equipado. Bairro e prédio familiar, de fácil chegada, próximo ao aeroporto internacional, próximo a comércio e praia de lindo visual pra Baia de Guanabara. O anfitrião muito prestativo e solícito. Tudo de bom!!! 
Nos sentimos em casa.

Apartamento perfeito!!Leander foi muito educado,prestativo e pronto para ajudar em qualquer duvida.Fica proximo ao galeao taxi em torno de 28 reais!Bairro seguro,ap impecavel,tudo lindo e cheiroso!!Agora tenho a minha estadia toda vez que precisar ir ao RJ..

Leander me fez sentir em casa! Super dedicado e atencioso, deu-me suporte, dicas e orientações de locomoção, o que tornou minha estadia perfeita! Apartamento lindo, de muito bom gosto, super limpo e bem equipado. Indico a todos q forem ao Rio de Janeiro. Por causa do zelo de Leander, mais a beleza, elegância e tranquilidade do bairro retornarei em breve ao Rio! Nota 10!!!
Foi excelente a minha estada, sem surpresas, tudo igual ou melhor ao descrito e às (Website hidden by Airbnb) certeza voltaria a ficar no local se estiver disponível.

Foi maravilhosa a minha estadia, embora por pouco tempo. Fui muito bem recebida pelos anfitriões, muito atenciosos e solícitos. O ambiente impecávelmente limpo, confortável com tudo o que se precisa. Perto do aeroporto, que traz muita comodidade, bairro agradável.Adorei e recomendo a todos!!!!

A estada no Rio de Janeiro se tornou melhor por conta da presteza do Leander e Nathalia (sua esposa). Desde quando reservei o apartamento, dois meses antes já nos comunicávamos e ele sempre atencioso e prestativo. Fui com meu pai e tínhamos dicas de tudo dadas por ele. A descrição do apartamento é perfeita, local bem tranquilo, confortável, com todo suporte para fazer comida, tudo pertinho, inclusive a praia da bica, pra quem quiser correr, fazer caminhada pegando aquela brisa, além de quiosques legais pra sair à noite. Passam vários ônibus para diversas áreas do Rio quase em frente ao apartamento. O bairro é bem tranquilo, nos sentimos muito seguros, a região da Ilha do Governador é bem militarizada por conta das bases da aeronáutica e marinha que ali estão. Enfim... super recomendada a acomodação no apartamento do Leander.

Queremos parabenizar os anfitriões,  pela atenção, zelo e carinho conosco.
O apartamento é maravilhoso,  aconchegante,   impecável em tudo,  transporte público fácil.
Enfim realmente sentimo-nos em casa, queremos voltar em breve.
Very nice and clean apartment. Hosts were very friendly and helpful, even picked us up from the airport. We would stay with them again.

Tudo que foi prometido foi cumprido... O anfitrião estremamente atencioso, deixou tanto eu quando minha família muito avontade, indico muito fica na ilha do governador, pois o bairro é super tranquilo, lugares ótimos, tenho certeza de quando voltar ao RIO quero focar na apartamento do LEANDER... Muito obrigado pela experiência...

Achei a estadia excelente. Eu precisava pegar um voo no dia posterior no Galeão e achei super cômodo encontrar um lugar legal pra ficar que fosse perto do aeroporto. Mas além de um excelente apartamento, o Leander é um excelente anfitrião. Desde o princípio foi bastante comunicativo, respondia rápido às minhas mensagens, mostrava interesse em ajudar e inclusive foi quem me pegou no aeroporto e me levou no outro dia novamente. Como se não bastasse, quando cheguei no apto no primeiro dia, fui recebido com uma jarra de suco de uva e pães com manteiga: uma forma sutil de boas vindas. Obrigado, Leander. Parabéns pelo flat e pelo seu atendimento. Voltarei com certeza em outro ensejo.

Quem ficou no apartamento foram os meus pais, que não deixaram de elogiar muito a limpeza e o conforto do apartamento e a atenção/cuidados que receberam do anfitrião Leander. O apartamento é pequeno mais muito bem arrumado e limpo, é muito aconchegante. Passa ônibus para todo o RJ na porta, tem padaria, farmácia e tudo que precisa perto. RECOMENDO e com certeza voltaremos!

Nathalia is a very social, charming and perfect host! She welcomed us very generousely and we were able to ask her for infos about our stay. The appartment is very clean and tidy, cozy and perfectly equipped with everything you need. We enyojed our stay and recommend her to everyone! We wish her good luck for the future!

Atendimento perfeito, Leander super prestativo, nos ajudou em tudo e esteve à disposição o tempo todo.
O apartamento não é grande mas super bem planejado e completo, fomos em 4 pessoas e não tivemos problemas com espaço.
Guia com pontos turísticos e tudo que havia por perto, mercado, padaria e outras atrações.
Bairro seguro e tranquilo. 
Vale muito a pena

Leander foi muito gentil e atencioso. Nos deu muitas e valiosas informações e estava sempre disposto a ajudar, muito flexível. O apartamento é super limpo e organizado e tem ótima localização com facilidade de transporte (parada de ônibus em frente). Recomendamos fortemente!

Leander foi muito gentil e atencioso. Nos deu muitas e valiosas informações e estava sempre disposto a ajudar, muito flexível. O apartamento é super limpo e organizado e tem ótima localização com facilidade de transporte (parada de ônibus em frente). Recomendamos fortemente!

Os comentários ao Leander e a Natália realmente não são de graça. Eles são incríveis! Pessoas extremamente prestativas, educadas e gentis! O apto deles é super confortável, bem decorado, moderno e equipado! Tudo muito limpo e cheiroso! Super indico o lugar!
