reviews.txt: Sabrinas place was very spacious, located conveniently and mostly well equipped. It was perfect for exploring the city since it's connected well to public transport and you could also take a walk into the cbd. The only downside is the missing Wifi (which I was unaware when booking) but I guess this will be fixed soon since they just recently renovated the apartment. The apartment was very clean (only the windows and mirrors not 100%- not so important) Communication with Sabrina was easy and pleasant. Would recommend to stay here, especially a larger group of people or a family!
Lovely accommodation and great location.

Location was convenient to CBD (short cab ride about $10 or nice walk across Darling Harbor Bridge 15 min walk if you stop to watch people and the sites).  Several restaurants are close by along with a larger Coles grocery market and liquor store right across the way.

Great communication from Sabrina about the location, features and checking in.  Sabrina reached out several times during the stay to confirm our stay was meeting our expectations.

Apartment was very comfortable, well appointed and supplied.
I stayed at Sabrina's house with my girlfriend, sister and brother-in-law. Her apartment was spacious, modern and in a great location! Would highly recommend to anybody.

Stayed at Sabrina's place for almost a week.  As I need to checked in early due to young kids, Sabrina was helpful in granting early check-in :) 
The place was neat and clean upon check-in. Initially there was only one heater and request to have extra heaters were met on the same day. Sabrina bought two new heaters and I am very thankful for that.  Another good thing that happened was the new wifi installed ;) 
Location wise is very good. Minutes walk to Darling Harbour and the Central Station Light Rail. Bus 389 is round the corner to take you to the Sydney CBD which is only one stop away. 
Generally we enjoyed Sabrina's place and will go back again.
Fantastic apartment with a great location, a very helpful host, and everything was provided. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay!

El apartamento es hermoso, es muy cómodo y amplio, tiene una decoración muy moderna. La ubicación es excelente, cercana a todos los puntos de interés de Sydney. Sabrina fue muy atenta y amable, y siempre estaba dispuesta a ayudarnos y brindarnos información para que nuestra estadía fuera inolvidable. Definitivamente volveríamos a alojarnos en este apartamento.

Great host, offered us with late check out, and late check in 1000pm, very professional, easy going and flexible, great location, 10mins to 20 mins walking distance to fish market, darling harbour, China town, with free parking onsite. Highly recommend and will be returned for our next trip to Sydney.

Sabrina was responsive to our questions and very helpful when we met; tea, coffee and milk had been made available on our arrival which was a really nice touch
We arrived by car and they have a private parking bay underneath the apartments which was invaluable and made things so easy 
This is a great location and the description of the apartment and amenities are very accurate and of high quality and we could not fault anything
When next in Sydney I will look to see if this apartment is available as a first choice

Location of apartment was fantastic. Walking distance to The Star, Fish Market and Darling Harbour. The apartment was also very organised and clean. Loved that there was ample sunlight that passed through the apartment. Parking space was a little tight. Recommend to get a smaller car if you intend to rent one. There are certain things to take note, response from host was not very prompt. Asked for late check out several times and only managed to receive a reply after 3 texts and emails. Parking garage was renovating the day I arrived but was not informed earlier and had to pay for parking several hours. Overall, a good experience.
Very welcome
Good location.
So close to harbor & city great place to stay!

The apartment is in the middle of everything in Sydney, full of dining and shopping options, close to transportation and excursion stops. We have small children and they very much enjoyed the area, as well as the apartment itself. The apartment is very clean, pleasant, and amenities for travellars are all ready to be used. Sabrina answered all of our questions promptly. Thanks so much!

Great, spacious and clean apartment in an awesome location. My only suggestion would be two sets of keys, as myself and my colleague with whom I was staying had different dinner plans and had to coordinate to meet up in the city somewhere so we could return home at the same time. Would stay again, thanks.

Excellent welcoming with clear instructions to secure a soft landing in a very clean apartment in a great location. All comfort and convenience, we did not lack of anything related to kitchen, bathrooms, laundry, ... as well as wifi, board games, "connected" TV ready for enjoyable moments spent inside.

This apartment is run (and owned?) by a management company. It clearly isn't actually anyone's home and has the clinical, impersonal feel of a hotel. But it's well equipped for a stay in the centre of Sydney and the location is very convenient for Darling Harbour. I never met the named host; I was 'checked in' (their words) by someone else who was clearly in a tearing hurry. Beforehand I was just told I would be met, I didn't know where this would be but I couldn't get into the building and had to wait outside in the street. 
There is no hairdryer or air conditioning (this will make it v hot in the height of summer) and the oven is complicated to work. The design of the building means the apartment overlooks and is overlooked by other apartments and there was some noise at night from neighbours as the units are close together. There is also traffic noise. We were only given one set of keys which was extremely inconvenient. On the plus side the apartment building has a small pool and gym.
Accoglienza buona.posizione ottima. Apt. Gradevolissimo
Very professional Airbnb host. Recommend!

Sabrina was a great host
Everything went well, apartment is very nice.

name: 2 confortables habitaciones en el centro de BCN!
summary: Hola! Mi apartamento se encuentra en pleno centro de Barcelona (Ciutat Vella), al lado de la Rambla, Plaza Catalunya, todos los servicios y algunos de los monumentos más importantes de la ciudad.  Tengo 2 habitaciones disponibles: una con cama doble y la otra con cama individual. Perfecto para una pareja o grupo de 3 personas.  NO SE ADMITEN PERSONAS QUE VIAJAN SOLAS. Os espero en Barcelona. Muchas gracias y saludos cordiales!

host.about: Я наполовину русская, наполовину испанка. Живу в Барселоне много лет, но выросла в Москве. Работаю переводчиком и риэлтером по недвижимости. Люблю животных, музыку, кино, путешествия.

reviews.txt:
Квартира в 7 минутах ходьбы от Рамблас и это удобно,Хозяйка очень милая
,помогала советами и предоставила полную свободу во всей квартире,Мы остались довольны

Алена замечательный человек, прекрасная хозяйка, она приготовила и научила нас некоторым испанским блюда, обаятельная и привлекательная девушка. Очень уютная квартирка со всем необходимым. У нас был замечательный отдых благодаря Алене. Спасибо большое.

Это была моя первая поездка в Барселону. Мне понравилось. Жила в историческом центре, весьма колоритном. В шаговой доступности метро, магазины, кафе, достопримечательности и море. Хозяйка - очень веселая и доброжелательная девушка. В первый же день сориентировала меня на местности, далее я сама везде гуляла. Дома всегда ждала меня котяра необычная. По сути : комната чистая, уютная, окна во двор выходят, ночью всегда тихо. Если хочется вечером погулять - все безопасно. Рядом с домом всегда работают небольшие продуктовые магазинчики, если в выходной не успели купить поесть. От метро Para-lel (5мин. хотьбы) быстро добираетесь до всех Саград и музеев.На море я пешком ходила, вода отличная была. Если устали можно в кафешке у дома на Rambla del Raval посидеть. Там очень большой поток туристов. В общем, хорошо там.

Staying with Aliona is a pleasure.
Aliona is a nice, cheerful and friendly person, extremely helpful. It gives tips on how to navigate the city.
The apartment is clean and tidy, comfortable bed, clean sheets and towels.
You can freely enjoy the spacious kitchen to prepare meals.
The building has a lift and not have to carry luggage.
The apartment is located in an ideal spot. The main street of La Rambla (we go straight to the green metro line), you can walk in 5 minutes to the port of the same.
To Catalunya can be reached on foot in 10 minutes. Close to the charming Gothic Quarter.
If someone does not like the crowded La Rambla can enjoy a coffee and a bite to eat on the Rambla del Reval - out on the square right out of the apartment.
If I ever return to Barcelona it would definitely be with Aliona.

Aliona спасибо за замечательный отдых с вами.
Małgorzata i Ewa
Мы надеемся, что вы посетите снова когда-нибудь в Барселону и остаться с тобой. большое спасибо
Обожаю Алену, очень гостеприимно, чисто. В пешей доступности все достопримечательности города.

Хорошая и прохладная квартира в отличном месте: рядом метро, рядом набережная и пляж, рядом главная площадь, вокруг полно продуктовых магазинов и, опять же, рядом два огромных центральных рынка и многое другое (магазины одежды тоже близко, целая улица). В общем, когда мы после отъезда анализировали место — пришли к тому, что расположение просто невероятно удобное. Все классно. 

Алёна — отличный и невероятно гостеприимный человек. Район понравился: не обращайте внимание на внешнюю суету и своеобразность, там очень спокойно. 

Спасибо еще раз, Алёна)
Алена, очень уютно встретила и проводила меня со свечами! Мне было спокойно и комфортно. Я получил то, что ожидал и остался очень доволен. Буду в Барселоне ещё, увидимся. Рекомендую всем!

Very nice, comfortable room! The location is amazig, it only takes you a few minutes to get to the centre (las ramblas) of barcelona. Ailona was very friendly and generous, would definitely recommend the apartment!

L'appartement d'Aliona est idéalement situé : près de la Ramblas est d'une jolie place avec de nombreux bars/restaurants ! La plage n'est qu'à 15mn en bus, c'est tres pratique.
Aliona est une jeune femme très sympathique, et très souriante ! Notre séjour fut très agréable, elle est pleine de bon conseils et toujours de très bonne humeur !
Aliona was a great host and made us feel as we were at home. The location is amazing, in the heart of the Raval.

thanks a lot! was great to stay at your home! 
Apartment is located perfectly to do Sightseeing and still in a quiet side street. I can recommend and will visit you again with pleasure.
Very pleasant stay :) Aliona is so helpful, and she paid effort in making sure that we understand everything. Miss her cats!

Гостили у Алены 10 дней)
Квартира понравилась:чисто,все необходимое под рукой. Шикарное местоположение ,до центра до Бакерии 5 мин пешком.
 Алена гостеприимна,всегда готова подсказать-показать. Всем рекомендую.

Проживание в этом доме-это был первый опыт размещения с Airbnb и,тем более,проживание с хозяином.Было много опасений.Но на самом деле,все оказалось замечательно.Хозяйка Алена была очень гостеприимной и приятной в общении.В этом смысле было очень комфортно.Квартира расположена в отличном месте-фактически на бульваре Rambla Raval со знаменитым котом,la Rambla,Boqueria,метро-5мин,plCatalunia,набережная,Готический квартал-10-15 мин-все в пешей доступности.Сама кватртира просторная,все как на фото,кухня полностью укомплектована всем необходимым для самостоятельного приготовления еды,также были предоставлены кофе,оливковое масло и другие базовые продукты-не было неодходимости все это дополнительно покупать.В общем мы остались очень довольны подобным опытом и,ещё раз спасибо,Алене,за гостеприимство и приятную компанию
Aliona was so friendly and was very flexible with check in and check out. Her apartment was very well kept and cozy in every way.

SOS!!! Я ни знаю кто до нас оставался в этом доме но комментарии писали толи близкие люди толи друзья Алены, начну с того что Алена даже не интересовалась где мы и как добираемся на мой смс отвечала одним ОК не встретила нас в дверях, хозяйки дома алкоголичка и вела себя отвратительна не гостеприимна хамка и грубиянка, на фото все идеально выглядит на самом деле же  в доме полная антисанитария, грязь и вонь страшная, туалет в страшном виде не передать словами, от грязи на кухне мы даже брезговали пить воду со стакана в доме, матрасы ужасные в 1 же день разболелась спина, окна выходят на улицу где в пол ночи орут кричат, это был ад все не описать словами, не кому не рекомендую там оставаться если вам дороги ваши нервы и здоровье, мы не могли дождаться день отъезда что бы бежать с этого дома, Алена приходила ночью в 3 ПМ и шумела до 5 утра, мы не спали практически не одну ночь, остались 4 ночи это был ужас!!! Да и в доме не один кот а целых 2!!!
 İt was terrible 4 days in my life.... İ dont know why this people recommend this dirty and odorous home. ( it was not a home it was stall ) Alione was drinking all over the day. It is not sefity to stay in her home. She is coming in home evening when we sleep at 3:00PM and started tear the door. And she come home with man. And all evening they drinking.  She has 2 cats and evening they  also began running over the home. İt was terrible. We can not sleep. And in the morning when we said her about that she says when your are  going at last not any apology.  Her home wassss terrible. All home all apartment odorous. İn one word host was bitch……

Хотелось бы высказать Алене огромную благодарность за ВСЕ! Квартира очень уютная, чистая и "атмосферная". Алена человек веселый, отзывчивый и открытый, мы практически сразу подружились ;). Эта чудесная девушка не просто предоставила нам свои апартаменты, но и во многом помогала нам с навигацией по Барселоне, покупкой билетов и другим очень важным моментам, необходимым для самостоятельного туриста. Локация очень удобная, квартира чистенькая и уютная. В доме 2 прекрасных и ласковых кота, в которых мы сразу влюбились! Проще говоря, если предоставится шанс побывать еще раз в Барселоне -то останавливаться буду только у Алены

Aliona es una excelente host! Es super alegre y amable. Su casa es muy cómoda y amplia. La ubicación es cercana a todas las atracciones turísticas. Cerca de Montjuic, La Rambla, Plaza Cataluña, Barrio Gótico. Gracias por recibirnos!

Короткий отзыв:
Снимайте отличная квартира по соотношению цена качество.
Длинный отзыв:
1) Расположение – отличное расположение. Почти равно удалено от всех развлечений. Недалеко от метро (рядом метро и автобусы), пляжа, музеев, парков и вокзалов. Удобно что рядом находится много магазинов, ресторанчиков и рынок Бокерия. 
2) Квартира чистая, просторная, 2 удобные комнаты где помещается 3 человеческие (обгорелые после пляжа, напившиеся сангрии и наевшиеся хамона) особи. В каждой комнате вместительные шкафы, спасительный вентилятор и кровать. Просторная кухня где можно приготовить только что купленного на рынке тунца (креветки, мидии) и там же большой стол где поместятся все и всё. Обычный душ и туалет (совмещённый). Человек-сосед с дрелью не обнаружен, спали с открытыми окнами вполне спокойно, и шумели на улице какие-то строители за неделю только 1 раз. 
3) Кошки. Все любителям кошек сюда. 2 классных игручих создания приятно дополнять отдых. Если у вас сильная аллергия на кошек, то решайте сами. 
4) Хозяйка. Алёна – отличный человек с которым за неделю очень сдружились. Дала много полезных советов о Барселоне. Приятный собеседник. 
Если (когда) поедем ещё раз, обязательно вернёмся в эту квартиру. 
Минусы. 
- Дверь в туалет не закрывается на ключ. Решается тем что стучишься прежде чем войти. 
- Нет кондиционера. Но за эти деньги есть только вентилятор и губозакатывающее устройство. 
Итого: Снимайте отличная квартира по соотношению цена качество. 10 Елен Летучих из 10.

Casa super accogliente, due splendidi gatti e una proprietaria di casa straordinaria! Ti ringraziamo con tutto il cuore per come ci hai accolto e per come ci hai fatto sentire veramente a casa nostra. È stato un soggiorno perfetto e senza alcun tipo di problema. Saremo rimasti lì per molto più tempo se ci fosse stata possibilità. Non c'è nulla da cambiare. Check-in e check-out super flessibili e super disponibile per il nostro arrivo. Sicuramente da consigliare a chiunque voglia passare una bella vacanza a Barcellona in tutta tranquillità e senza pensieri. Essendo la prima esperienza con Airbnb è stato tutto fin troppo perfetto. Ancora grazie infinite per tutto Aliona e ti mandiamo un abbraccio e un bacione grandissimo!

name: Executive Luxury design Apartment
summary: 84 Queen St has an eclectic countryside feel and features neutral sisal carpets, ceramic tiles, a stainless steel kitchen, warm walls throughout and an Italian marble bathroom. There is natural light throughout, including a skylight in the kitchen

reviews.txt: This apartment is absolutely exquisite. The fittings and furnishings are very high quality and comfortable.  The place is like a beautiful parisian retreat.  The location is close to great cafes, shops and Centennial Park, 10 mins from city and beaches.  It truly is a home away from home.  We are originally from Sydney so we know our areas which is why we chose to stay here.  We used to always stay in hotels but NOW we will endeavour to stay here whenever we come to Sydney.  Louise was wonderful, extremely helpful and timely with all our questions.

An amazing place situated in the heart of Woolahra, it was just perfect for the night of our wedding. Louise was unbelievably  accommodating, allowing us to drop off some things the day before our stay, setting up candles and flowers, leaving us a fruit platter and great provisions for breaky the next morning and responding to a 12am locked out call! She is a gem - thanks again Louise! The French provincial/art deco styled apartment was luxurious with a super comfy bed, relaxed atmosphere and situated 2 mins walk from Queen street's yummy cafes and delis! We would definitely recommend this place to anyone interested, it is worth every cent and we look forward to staying here again!

My daughter and I stayed at Louise's apartment. It is absolutely fantastic. Great location, nice little cafes and most of what you could need. Perfectly clean and comfortable. A beautiful shaded veranda great bathroom and kitchen. I would recommend this apartment to anyone.

In a word WOW! We loved it here. It had all the comforts of home and more as well as welcoming touches such as fruit and fresh bread.   The amenities were everything you could want and more. The quality of everything was outstanding. We could easily live here and not want for anything. 

Well done Louise on a fabulous abode! Stunning! We will definitely stay here whenever we are in Sydney.

Thank you!

Perfect! Perfect! Perfect! From the time you walk up the stairs to this beautiful, fully stocked terrace you feel right at home! The pictures can't even begin to describe the warmth and and comfort of this immaculately furnished, fully equipped 2 bedroom apartment! With on site parking, a laundry, the most comfortable bedding I have ever slept in, an amazingly sunlight filled kitchen and in one of Sydney cutest suburbs this place was perfect for anyone wanting to visit Sydney! Close to shops, cafés and restaurants and only minutes drive from the cbd staying here was one of the best decisions I have made when visiting Sydney! Louise is wonderful and caters to your every need and is easy to contact! I highly recommend staying here to anyone who is wanting to visit Sydney for any period of time!! :)

Louise's apartment is simply beautiful - the only hesitation I have about recommending it is that it will become so popular I won't be able to stay there again! My colleague and I stayed there for two nights whilst on business and it was so much nicer that the normal corporate apartment - but still had all the small touches you expect (bath robes, toiletries, hair dryer, etc...). It would also be a perfect place to stay for a pleasure. The location is great - right in the Woollahra village - and close to the city. Louise has exquisite taste and the apartment is decorated with a lot of style and panache.  She was an excellent host who communicated with me swiftly and effectively - our check-in was completely hassle free - and we were welcomed with fresh bread, fruit, and milk. We will definitely look to stay here again and highly recommend it to the airbnb community.

Louise's apartment exceeded all expectations!! Fantastic location, spacious and so tastefully decorated. The most comfortable bed in the world and the bathroom...where do I stop.The welcome bottles of wine, the fruit, movie pass, Louise you are so special. I will stay here every time I come to Sydney. Must agree with another reviewer though, this should be kept a secret as everyone will want to come! Thankyou Louise.

I love staying in this apartment, it really is the perfect position in Sydney, its always spotless and beautifully presented. 
I almost don't want to share a review, just in case its not available in the future..

Queen Street is a terrific location with a vibrant village atmosphere, cafes, specialty food stores, boutiques and more. The apartment is full of delightful surprises and charm. So much more than any hotel room. Louise's 5 star hospitality includes sharing her designer furnishings and collectibles with you, the immaculate presentation of the apartment, her warm communication style and her attention to detail to ensure you enjoy every moment of your stay.

Apartment exceeded our expectations. Spacious, clean and with every convenience you might need. Milk, bread and fruit on arrival was an amazing bonus as well as the offer to check out late. Perfect location, easy walk to shops, park, markets and transport. Communication was friendly and prompt. Will stay again when in Sydney.

What an amazing place! Highly recommend. Even nicer than the photos. We were left a welcome fruit bowl and so forth. Couldnt have asked for more. ! Would definitely stay here, (i'm glad we didnt book the Hughenden nearby, as for the same price this place was incredible) . The spare sunroom with its own bed for one was perfect for the 2rd person staying, and the fact there was wifi, a balcony, amazing location , what more could one ask for. Thanks Louise!

LOVED IT! Such an amazing apartment in a great location.
The host was great- we arrived to a fruit bowl and muesli. I could not recommend it more highly.
The listing was accurate, although the pictures were nice they don't reveal how lovely this place really is. Great location, friendly host, I would love to stay again.
Another lovely stay. Thanks Louise.

We loved our stay. The  apartment is super-stylish, quiet, relaxing and really well appointed with all the bits and pieces required to make it feel like a home from home (a superb bed AND fast wifi). The "welcome pack" of fruit, bread, milk and eggs with tea and coffee (Nespresso - thank you Louise!) were more than welcome for a couple of weary travellers. The apartment's location is perfect - smack-bang in the middle of Woollahra village with it's lovely shops, pubs and coffee places and a hop, skip and a jump into the CBD. It is perfectly located if you are planning to spend some time in the Eastern suburbs of Sydney.  To top it all off, Louise was very responsive and really helpful. Thanks a lot Louise, if you'll have us, we will be back the next time we are in Sydney.

We had a great stay in Woolahra. we enjoyed the beautifully designed flat and the convenience of living in walking distance of Queen Street and Centenial Park. Louise was a great host, meeting is on arrival, going through all the practicalities and popping by just when we left as well. The flat is well equipped, clean and comfortable.

Where do I start? The apartment was just lovely and the pictures really don't do it justice. Very spacious, plenty of luxurious little extras, spotlessly clean, comfy lounge and bed, great leafy secure courtyard with parking and a private sunny balcony. We had absolutely everything there that we could possibly want and really felt completely at home... which is saying a lot coming from a couple of fussy individuals like us. In addition, the thoughtful food items waiting for us was a pleasure and Louise's communication and consideration for us was really appreciated. It is just so nice to deal with someone that is so well organised and on top of things. Lastly, the location was just great. So surprisingly quiet... and we found some lovely restaurants and boutiques at our doorstep. I would love to come back sometime and stay a week to just relax and enjoy exploring the neighbourhood. Thanks Louise :)

It's been a lovely stay at Louise apartment. It is conveniently located with bus stops just a few blocks away, 20~30 mins to city centre and bondi beach. It's also very nice of Louise to offer the welcome pack full of fruits and bread and milk. The apartment is just as shown on the pictures, very spacious and stylish vintage furnitures. The area is quiet and safe, with very nice neighborhood. I already look forward to another stay at Louise apartment.

An incredible apartment. Imacculately presented, with stunning furniture and design throughout. A welcome pack including fridge essentials and fresh bread was provided, as well as bathroom shampoo, soap etc. Beautifully light-filled, my bridesmaids and I felt like royalty getting ready and the photos are sure to be amazing. Thanks for your hospitality, would recommend to any visitors to Sydney!!

I can not speak highly enough of Louise's apartment. If you are after the quintessential eastern suburbs stay and experience- this is it. Fabulous, roomy apartment in great location. Louise went out of her way to accomodate us at last minute and made us feel very welcome. Loved it. Robyn

name: Newly Renovated Studio Midtown East
summary: This furnished apartment is a stunning, newly renovated, private and luxurious, studio apartment in the heart of Manhattan. Residential, safe block that is VERY close to all! Fully furnished apartment, with everything one might need!

host.location: New York, New York, United States
host.about: NYC Real Estate licensed broker, property owner and property manager professional with over 20 years of experience  and service.

reviews.txt: Evan & Maria were great. Their studio apartment had been recently renovated so everything was new and fresh. The location was fantastic and so was the service. I would definitely stay here again and I suggest that you stay here too.

4 girls in this studio over 5 days. This was perfect for us. The location is amazing and you have great bars and restaurants in walking distance! Evan and Maria are the nicest hosts I've ever had the pleasure to interact with. Soooo helpful and attentive! Would I stay here again? YES absolutely!!! 5 stars for this listing and the hosts and the location :) exactly as appears in the pictures. Thank you again Evan and Maria!!!

Evan & Maria were great hosts. They answer all my question and always show interested if i had any doubts of anything. I stay at the apartment with my parents and my sister and it was great! Perfect please and perfect location! I'll totally recommend this place for 2 or 4 people!

Great place, and Evan and Maria were very welcoming. This was my first Airbnb rental and I didn't know what to expect but I will be back. I came to NY for 2 weeks of work and found that I prefer the privacy and the availability of a small kitchen over a hotel any day. The studio is within a minute of several restaurants and a well-stocked small supermarket, and in walking distance of major tourist attractions.
From the beginning to the end the process felt really professional, I enjoyed the availability of our host. The neighborhood is great and the apartment was perfect.
The host made me feel very welcomed, wanted to know when I arrived and was there to greet me. The place was better than advertised and the neighborhood was great for someone who is visiting.

Evan and Maria greeted me when I arrived and helped me carry my bags up the stairs to their beautifully renovated apartment. Although it was a tiny bit smaller than I expected, the apartment is very thoughtfully arranged with plenty of storage space.  I stayed in the apartment for 2 weeks and never felt cramped.  In fact I hated to leave!  This lovely apartment is located in a very convenient neighborhood, and I'm certain I will return.  Thanks for a great stay!

Perfect rent in NYC! The renters are charming and try their best to accommodate with your check-in/out hours. The bed furnitures are excellent and the house offers clean and high-end kitchen equipment. Do not hesitate to rent!

I had a late check in and Evan was gracious enough to allow me to do this. The location of the apartment was convenient and the apartment itself was immaculate.  My first time in New York was great, and I would recommend this location to anybody here a stay.  They are a very nice couple and will give you great advice on where to go in the city.

Appartement cosy, refait à neuf et très bien placé.
Evan & Maria ont été des hôtes parfaits, toujours disponibles et très arrangeants.
Je recommande vivement cet appartement.

We loved our stay at Evan and Maria's chic home in Midtown! It was our first time in New York and enjoyed that it was central to so many things. The home is extremely well thought out as well. I liked how they maximized the entire space! And Evan was extremely helpful and accommodating! He responded back to all my messages promptly with very clear communication. I would highly recommend staying here again for our next NY visit!

Let me start by stating that it was my family's first time in the Big Apple and also our first time using AIRBNB so we have no idea what to expect when we arrive. Before I started with the inside of the apartment, like any property the most important is location, location and location. Evan & Maria's apartment is located at the heart of Manhattan. It is a walking distance to the Rockefeller Plaza and also to Times Square. There are several restaurants near the apartment and a deli just around the corner to get anything you wanted. 

Okay, now we begin with the apartment. It is very beautiful. Not only you can get anything you wanted but also you can tell the owner put a lot of their heart in to it. It is beautifully decorated and also very clean. 

On a personal note, we have the booking wrong, so we have to checked out a day earlier than we intended to. Evan and Maria were very nice and courteous about it. He texted us to let us know that we have to check out and patiently await our arrival, since we're on a ferry to Liberty Island, and help us find a hotel to move.

All and all it was a great experience even with the moving around and one thing for sure, if I ever in NY I will most definitely try to book Even and Maria super homey apartment.

Thank you Evan & Maria and good luck with the baby ...

yours truly,

The De Haans

Evan and Maria were accommodating with my check in and check out. They were clear with their instructions and welcoming. The apt. had a bottle of wine and chocolates which we appreciated! We had a chance to meet Maria and she gave us wonderful food recommendations!! Thank you Maria for telling us to call in our bagel order vs. waiting in line! The actual apt. is well decorated and very functional. We were very comfortable. 
Great location and lovely hosts!

We had the good fortune to stay in this amazing apartment for 4 nights while vacationing in the city for our 25th wedding anniversary.  The apartment is just as it appears in the photos: impeccably clean, modern, updated and cozy.  The bed and pillows were incredibly comfortable and provided a restful nights sleep after long days exploring the city.  Our adult daughter slept on the futon, and she was in heaven!  There were extra pillows, sheets and a comforter in the closet, and I'm not exaggerating when I say that she was more comfortable here than in the hotel room we stayed at during our first half of our trip.  The apartment had everything we needed: dishes, Keurig coffee and coffee maker (my #1 priority!), iron, hair dryer and much, much more!  There was a fantastic bottle of Pinot Noir that I thoroughly enjoyed and a jar full of Hershey's kisses (which we ate entirely too many of)!  Evan and Maria thought of everything; there is even an iPhone charger to use!  For NYC, it was very quiet and peaceful, which came as a pleasant and unexpected surprise to us.  The location can't be beat, close to great restaurants, parks,  & subways.  I'm sure I'm forgetting something, but let me end by saying that this apartment is so great that I want to live in it!  In fact, our daughter hopes to relocate to the city soon, and she took note of just how well Evan and Maria utilized the space and all the most wonderful details.  Well done.  Bravo!!!
Really clean updated apartment and the communication from both Evan and Maria was fantastic.
Room was very clean. With the queen bed and a sofa bed, our family of four were pretty comfortable. It's within walking distance to UN and other fun things in NYC.

Very nice, clean, new Studio at a quiet location @manhattan.  Nice shower, airco, complete kitchen. We were here with our 2 kids, what works really good. Easy to find, always accesible because of doormen next door. Friendly chat with Evan.

We had a wonderful stay at Evan and Maria's studio. 
From the very first email to checking out everything was smooth and pleasant.
The apartment is ideally located for visiting the Big Apple.
It is very well equipped, the bed is very comfortable, the bathroom is spacious and most importantly the apartment is very clean.
We hope that on our next stay in the city the apartment will be available.
Highly recommended!!!

Perfect Location!! This beautifully furnished, modern apartment in New York was exactly what we were looking for. We were within walking distance to Time Square, Fifth Avenue, Broadway  and there was a little supermarket close by too. 
The hosts were super accommodating allowing us on short notice to check out later, and sorting out any problems or queries we had straight away. Loved our stay in New York. Would recommend this place and the city to everyone.
Very nice tiny apt in the middle of NYC. Just remodeled and very clean. Too tittle if you're planning to stay with a bigger group of friends.

name: Ultra Comfy Flat & Perfect Location
summary: This is a spacious comfy garden floor flat with a large kitchen and a small balcony to have fresh air.

host.about: I live in Cihangir and love to meet people and share our lively neighbourhood with them.

reviews.txt: Pelin was an amazing host! We unfortunately lost a wallet and she was very helpful in trying to get it back. She made sure we were taken care of the whole trip and even made bookings for us as some places did not speak English very well. The place is better then the photos for sure. It is a nice big space with everything you need.
Perfect localization, very clean and satisfying stay... we loved the apartment of Pelin.... I definitely come back when I visit Istanbul again!!!
The apartment was nice and spacious. Convenient location for Beyoglu, Sultanahmet, trams & ferries. Great view near to the apartment. Pelin was quick to respond to problems or queries
We had a comfortable stay.
The appartement is ok but it’s in a basemant so any noise can be heard

The flat is comfy and very spacious. It is very furnished and well situated, close to T1, Taksim place, Galata Tower and shops.
Pelin is a very nice and helpful host. I would recommand you this place !

Пелин быстро отвечала на сообщения, подробно описала, как доехать до квартиры от аэропорта. Хотя мы опоздали, она все равно подождала нас, хотя у нас не было связи. За что больше спасибо.
Квартира приятно удивила и оказалась лучше, чем мы ожидали. Она очень большая, оборудована всем необходимым.
Прекрасное расположение в 15 минутах от площади Таксим в приятном районе с маленькими улочками и большим количеством баров и кафе. При выходе из дома открывается потрясающий вид на Босфор!
Надеемся приехать сюда снова.

Pelin is a very open and positive host. Despite some issues with our arrival, she did not say a word of criticism and wait for us patiently. The location is perfect for walks in a central Istanbul, but without crowds of tourists as in Sultanahmet. But you should consider the significant hill, if you are comming with a trolley or a wheelchair. However, the place was comfortable for staying with our 6 months old baby, and we enjoyed it a lot. The last but not the least is the resaurant in 1 minute from the place with a breathtaking view (thank you, Pelin, for the advice!)
We had an amazing stay in Istanbul, thanks to Pelin and it's perfect appartment, wich is very big and ideally situated in this city. I recommand this place !
The flat is spacious, very clean, cozy, with everything you need. Location is also convenient to move around this beautiful city. Can't wait to be back!!
it's a very cosy, big flate and Pelin is amazing, very attentive, helpful. Highly recommend this place

name: Studio on main entertainment street
summary: Cozy studio with very high ceilings - room with a double bed, big enough for travelers planning on doing a lot of exploring! Right between St-Denis and St-Laurent - the two lively restaurant and bar streets in the entertainment district of Montreal.

host.about:
I'm an Australian living in Canada, working for a startup, and travelling when I have time (and money)!

23 countries and counting - get in touch for recommendations, because that's something I can talk for hours about. Over a glass of wine is even better!

South America is my next big dream...

reviews.txt: The studio is nice and comfortable, located just next to rue Saint Denis. Maria was very helpful and responsive. She prepared everything perfectly:) We had no problems with finding the place and move around.

As for location, you can't get any better! It's in the heart of Montreal. A short walk from le Vieux Port/ Old Montreal (1.5km with a slight hill). Be forewarned that since it's in the middle of downtown, it's not going to be quiet.This is no fault to the hostess, just that this city rarely sleeps - which, depending on who you are is a blessing or annoyance. Laundry is 10 blocks away since the hostess isn't in town, the sheets may not be clean so you'll have to do them yourself. Maria is always available via text so very helpful. If you drive, underground parking is a block away. Rental bikes are also close by. I would definitely stay there again for a quick weekend visit to Montreal.
The host left a pleasant note with some directions about the wifi and wished us a great trip. The description matched the room perfectly. The neighbourhood was lively and exciting!
Good home base!
Ultra-quick confirmation, fast communication and the apartment that fits the description perfectly. Great host.

Pros: Great location. Great host. Cozy studio. Bed is comfortable. Clean. Perfect to spend a night or two in.

Cons: Not for light sleepers (loud fridge, loud entrance door that residents tend to slam).
Very convenient and flexible. Thanks maria

We had a great overnight stay here. The location is perfect and Maria had left us with everything we would need for a comfortable stay.  She was very quick to respond when we had a question about parking. We would love to stay at Maria's again next time we're in Montreal :)
Host able to have key ready early thanks

The studio was cute, clean and comfortable. The keys were right where Maria said they would be. The neighborhood, as promised, was within easy walking distance of many bars, restaurants, and other attractions.
Great place. Accessible host. Convenient location. And overall amazing time.
Great host would stay again
Location can't be beat! Great value in a lively and fun neighborhood!

Maria’s place was great! It's a great location, there are lots of bars/restaurants to choose from within a 2 minute walk. If you are coming in by bus, this spot is only a 3 minute walk from the station.
Great location, perfect for a single traveller or a couple!
Central location, suitable for a short stay.
Great little space at a super affordable price! We absolutely loved our stay here
Appartement à 10min à pied de la gare de bus, très pratique pour les personnes désirant faire une étape avant de voyager.

name: Rustic Gaudí - Sagrada Família
summary: New, modern, bright and fully equipped. Has two bedrooms, one bathroom, living and kitchen,  a terrace and a balcony. Metro in 1 minute and Sagrada Familia at 5. Speed WIFI. Up to 5 people. Fully refurbished! You rent the whole apartment, not shared.

host.about:
Hi! Me and my husband Cesc, we are both teachers, prouds of our beautiful city. Our hobby? Our city! We try to know always the best places, the best plans, the best tips, ... just what your need to plan a special trip to Barcelona.

We take care of our apartment until every detail, and cleanliness is one of our maximum goals.

We are avid travellers, and is for this reason that we know exactly what you need when you are out of home.

We'll do our best to make your trip unforgettable!

reviews.txt: This nice and cozy apartment is located near Sagrada Familia. It has 2 bedrooms that are suitable for 2-3 people. The owners are really friendly and welcoming. A pleasant, recommended place.
Elisabet and Cesc have a great appartment, comfortable, in a great location. It's well equiped, clean and cosy. Thinking of visiting Barcelona again, it would be my first choice!
They made it realy uncomplicated to welcome us, especially when our flight was delayed an we couldn't be at the appartment on time. The appartment is nice and clean.

Cesc,  Elisabet's helpful and uncomplicated husband, welcomed us at the apartment and introduced us to the surrounding area and to their lovely flat, where we really felt comfortable and at home. The residence is perfectly placed in the centre of Barcelona (near Sagrada Familia, metro + bus stations), it's an excellent starting point for sight-seeing trips. Everything you need is nearby (bakery, restaurants, pharmacy, SuperMarket,  some shops and public transport). The bedrooms are located in the backyard, and were really quite (only at the first night the neighbours were ab bit noisy; the following nights we slept with opened window without problems. The bathroom is small, but cute and functional. In the kitchen nothing lacked to our needs. For 2-3 person and some couple of days/week  it's perfect, we would rent it again.  Everythink went well. Thanks to Elisabet & Cesc, best wishes.
Very nice, comfortable, clean and cosy appartement. Ideal location. Really nice and warm welcome thanks to the owners Elisabet & Cesc!!
Vår värd höll kontakt med oss via mail hela tiden. Helt perfekt. Då vi kom till Barcelona mötte han oss och var mycket hjälpsam och vi kunde nå honom lätt genom telefon under hela vistelsetiden.

Charmant appartement fidèle aux photos
Chambre au calme
Accueil chaleureux
Transports et commodités à proximités
Séjour très agréable

We enjoyed our stay in this apartment, the space was cosy and comfortable. Within walking distance to lots of Barcelona's attractions and super easy with the metro station. The bedroom was quiet for a restful sleep. Elisabet was a friendly host, we would recommend the apartment.

Thank you for sharing your apartment with us! It was very comfortable -- and perfect for our group of three. Elisabet and Cesc were very nice to work with. When we arrived (a little tired from the travel), Elisabet was very helpful in showing us the apartment. I found the larger bedroom great for sleeping -- back from the street and therefore nice and quiet. We enjoyed sitting in the living room together after a long day of walking and sightseeing. This was my first time using an airbnb apartment and I enjoyed feeling I was "at home" rather than at a hotel. I also really liked the neighbourhood. I felt that I was living among the locals and enjoyed picking up coffee in the local pastry shops. Although the apartment is located pretty close to the Sagrada Familia, I didn't feel I was in a touristy area. The apartment is very close to a couple of metro lines, and we used the metro a lot. It was fast and efficient -- and got us wherever we wanted to go in the city.

Great place to be!!!
Very warm welcome at 2am in the morning :-)
很好的居所,交通方便,房間整潔,空間寬敞,thank you for sharing the apartment, very nice place to stay, hope to see u soon

Una estancia genial, el apartamento muy bonito y acogedor a escasos 5 minutos de la Sagrada Familia y muy cerca del metro.

Sin duda para repetir!

Elisabet and Cesc are very helpful. The apartment is just as beautiful as in the photos. It's very well located in a safe area, close to sagrada familia and hospital sant pau. The metro is just 1 block away and we used that a lot. At night there are lots of delicious places to eat very close to the location. The only conns are the small bathroom, typical in this type of apartment,  and 2 single  beds in the bedroom instead of a double bed. It was very quiet at night. I recommend this lovely apartment :)

It was a really pretty nice and clean apartment like in the pictures. Everything you need like a supermarket, bank, restaurants is close by. Cesc our renter was really nice and reliable.
I would love to book this apartment the next time again.

Very nice lady. Very patient to explain every questions. We arrived late, so Elisabet's father wait for us and open the door. The apartment is convenient to go everywhere. The facility is quite good. Recommend it.
Great appartment! Just perfect ...

Our experience at this apartment couldn't have been any better. Cesc arrived later to meet us and explained the area and apartment to us. All the amenities are there and we easily felt at home. The apartment itself is ideally located as there are very good travel links nearby (metro and bus) and it's also a 5 minute walk from the Sagrada Familia. I would highly recommend this place to stay - it was perfect!

Nous avons passé une magnifique semaine à Barcelone! 
Et quel plaisir, après avoir parcouru la Ville de long en large de se retrouver dans ce havre de paix qu'est l'appartement d'Eisabet (nous y étions pendant la deuxième quinzaine du mois d'août).
L'appartement est véritablement idéalement situé, proche des stations de Métro et proche de nombreuses commodités (boulangerie, supermarché, restaurants).
Accueil parfait .... avec le grand grand grand sourire de Cesc!

Un superbe séjour dans l'appartement d'Elisabeth. Nous avons été extrêmement bien accueillis. L'appartement est très bien situés proche du métro du bus des commerces et des restaurants :). De plus les chambres sont au calme ce qui est important à Barcelone !

My visit at Elisabet & Cesc's place was perfect to see any of Barcelona or just relax into the culture of the neighborhood.
Elisabet accommodated me by letting me come early and Cesc took me to the airport 4 days later.
Excellent food from coffee to paella and grilled meat and veggies all near by. 
The apt is clean and cozy with all the necessities. Very nice kitchen and able to do some laundry!
Plenty of information with maps and I felt safe ....
I hope to come back someday thank you

name: Cottage in Haiku
summary: Stunning secluded bay at the end of our road in a quiet area. 10 miles from Paia and 6 miles from Haiku. Close enough to town but far enough that you can enjoy the country jungle life. We share everything from our farm with our guests seasonally available liliko, coconuts, fruit trees, bananas, and Avocado. This area that reminds you of what Hawaii once was. The Cottage is situated to capture tradewinds keeping things cool. Perfect location where you won't deal tourists crowds.

host.about: Lucky we live Hawaii. Friends often describe me as eclectic. I am easy going. Love to play tennis, surf, & hike. I've traveled extensively, for short vacations and long periods of time. I've been know to stay at 5 diamond hotels, my tent, in the open air on my white water raft or in my 88 VW bus in the wilderness. I farm my own land for profit.  You won't find me sitting inside watching TV. I find my peace outside. "Wilderness is not a luxury but a necessity of the human spirit, and as vital to our lives as water and good bread."  Edward Abbey

reviews.txt:
This place was amazing
Kandy was so quick to respond and so accommodating -even when I was a little needy a couple of times (I needed a wine opener and I had one within the hour)
It's a hidden gem and just what we needed to reset life
It had every modern luxury while being tucked away in the jungle and right next to the bay
Thank you Kandy so much for having us
We thoroughly enjoyed our stay

From the moment I entered the property I felt at peace, lots of light, tastefully decorated and clean. The place was very quiet and private,and so was the neighborhood , a short walk takes you to an amazing cliff view of the ocean. The steady breeze at night and the fragrent smell of flowers was great . The beds were high quality and comfortable. I enjoyed getting up in the morning and picking oranges from the trees on the property for some fresh squeezed juice.  Our host Kandy was available to help with any needs and made you feel welcome. I would definitely rent this place again on a return trip to Maui .
Kandy and her husband were amazing hosts. I felt like we were part of there family on their property. Would recommend this place to my mother. We will be back.

Ce logement privatif est très bien placé pour se rendre à tous les points de l'île. De plus il possède tout le confort qu'on peut espérer avoir chez soi (cuisine tout équipée, grande chambre, etc.). 
Kandy est une personne sympathique et accomodante avec laquelle vous n'aurez aucun mal pour arranger votre départ/arrivée mais aussi poser vos questions.
Amazing place, very clean and great hosts. It has everything you want and more.

The cottage is in a beautiful and quiet street , in the north shore of the island .
Its for people who want to get away.
If you need food and grocery Paia is not too far . (15-20 min)
We met our host , and she explain us about the property.
That's a beautiful property with verity of trees, and fruits around .
In the morning we enjoyed fresh orenge juice directly from the trees . 
the cottage is very nice and well equipmened .
There is everything you need there .
Towels, beach chairs , cooler and more . 
The place was pretty clean.
All tough it was kind of hard to reach our host.
I text Kandy asking about place to see around, but I got a late response and not much information,
In general , the experience was very nice and we all enjoyed it .

We went to Kandy's for our honeymoon and had the worst airbnb experience we have ever had (and we use airbnb a lot).  She stopped communicating with us and then tried to lock us out of the house one night when we went back. Thankfully we found an open window, got in, evacuated our belongings immediately and had to pay for a hotel for the rest of the honeymoon. Completely outrageous.

Beyond that, the place was disappointing. It smells like mildew and she doesn't have screens on many windows so you're stuck in a mildewy sauna. I would not recommend it and would advise people to be extremely careful with Kandy.
This place was an amazing experience!  you're deep in the jungle but still close to Paia. Extremely family-friendly our kids loved it! I will most definitely visit again

Kandy was very accommodating, and provided such a lovely place to stay. She responded quickly if we had questions, and is very much a professional in the world of home away from homes. The house is quiet, cozy, and worked well for a family with teenagers.

Thank you Kandy, It was a great trip!

We enjoyed our time at the cottage so much, we didn't want to leave! As Airbnb hosts ourselves, we love to be the 'guests' when we can, and Kandy was a wonderful host. She communicated excellently with us leading up to, during, and after our stay, with quick answers to our questions and suggestions for how to best enjoy the property and surrounding areas. We found both a fresh chicken egg and several avocados to enjoy within moments of our arrival - yum! The cottage was very clean, comfortable, and incredibly relaxing. We would certainly recommend!

My family loved this 2 bdrm cottage.  It's located on an incredibly beautiful piece of land, quiet and away from the hustle--a perfect place to stay when exploring the road to Hana.   The place is tastefully decorated and extremely comfortable.  We particularly liked lounging in the screened porch room. It's a little far from town, but sometimes that's necessary to fully unwind! The only thing I would change about our stay is the number of nights.... We should have stayed a week at least!

Our stay at Kandy's place was great! Throughout the course of our vacation she was very helpful. The location is quiet and beautiful. The backyard provides fresh fruit, truly making you feel the island vibe. Our stay consisted of 5 people for 2 weeks; the house had plenty of room for everyone to feel comfortable. We will definitely consider staying here again in the future.

Jungle relaxation, just what we needed after a week of hectic ocean front resort land visiting. Fruit everywhere, evening winds cooling breeze, even some nighttime rain tip tapping on the roof. The house is charming, comfortable, and more than enough room for 7 of us.  Kandy and her family are lovely, kind, and generous and made us feel like guests, not just visitors.  I would recommend this property to anyone wanting a respite from the heat and traffic of the oceanfront and easy hop up to road to Hana or upcountry explorations.  Oh, and the outdoor shower- bliss under a night sky filled with stars and moonlight.

5 of us stayed here and there was plenty of room.  The house is very clean and spacious.  We had a vegan Thanksgiving dinner on the huge screened-in porch and one of Kandy's very friendly chickens was our guest of honor!  My personal favorite was the outdoor toilet and shower - cleaner than many indoor bathrooms I have used :)  I would definitely stay here again.
We loved staying in this Private Paradise! My kids enjoyed the yard and it was relaxing and very pleasant.
Beautiful place with an amazing outside living room. Kandy was very helpful.

I have read Mark Twains descriptions of his time in Maui. Guess what my time at this house made me think of those descriptions. A beautiful property with lush vegetation and fruit trees of many kinds which you can partake of. Just down the road is a path that has an absolutely stunning view of the Maui coast with a path to a beautiful rocky beach. The house is comfortable and cool and is a great place to relax and rest after exploration. Every amenity you could want or need is there for you. We enjoyed the barbecue very much and loved that we had the washer and dryer. In short I will attempt to stay here any time I visit Maui this place is an outstanding value. Lastly Kandi is a very responsive host and obviously wants her guests to be impressed, we were, thanks a bunch.

Kandy is a great host. The location is quiet, spacious and equipped with almost everything we need during our stay. 

The house is located in a peaceful jungle area, with very localized decoration and furniture, it has variety of facilities and cultural props to play with while we stayed there.

Kandy is also very responsive and helpful to answer our questions. We'd definitely recommend this place to whoever visit Maui.

Do not stay there!!!! The house is not bad first floor but the secobd bedroom is an attic with a chipped beam and my mother hit her head eneterung it as one side is too low. The host will make you strip the bed and wants money and the gusests to to do zero all the cleaning after. She exaggerated the dishes are dirty as my eldery mother must have forgot to wash afork or two. Crazy many requirements for someone with excellent airbnb re iews and years of use so far. Pay more and get a better host. Greefy lady harassing the guests. The house has some paint chip.issues inside.  Very isoleted yet you can see all the neoghbours in the complex.

Great place. Looks better than the photos. Very well designed, very comfortable, cool furniture. Fully stocked kitchen with everything you might need for a great meal. 

My only issues were the lack of drinkable water provided with the house. I was not aware of this prior. Also a bit buggy, but didn't bother us very much.

name: 1stt FIRST SAVED PROPERTY
summary: BLABLABLA:) - READ "Tcessible / ADA, call resort directly to ensure U receive. If U need ADA U MUST inform us BEFORE booking.
